original: @51a # // rgya gar skad du b'a da n+ya ya britti bi panydzi t'artha n'a ma /üîΩbod skad du /
analyzed: @51a # // rgya gar skad du b'a da n+ya ya britti bi panydzi t'artha n'a ma / bod skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit: Vadanyayavipanchitartha-nama

original: rtsod pa'i rigs pa'i 'grel pa don rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i rigs pa'i 'grel pa don rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba /
translated: In Tibetan: Rtsod pa‚Äôi rigs pa‚Äôi ‚Äôgrel pa don rnam par ‚Äôbyed pa zhes bya ba

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Manjushri

original: sna tshogs yon tan dam pa rin chen phung po'i 'od kyis rtag tu mun pa bcom gyur cing //
analyzed: sna tshogs yon tan dam pa rin chen phung po'i 'od kyis rtag tu mun pa bcom gyur cing //
translated: The light of the mass of precious sublime qualities always destroys darkness

original: gang zhig rnam pa sna tshogs sems can 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i don du brtson gyur pa //
analyzed: gang zhig rnam pa sna tshogs sems can 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i don du brtson gyur pa //
translated: For those who strive to attain the various fruits desired by sentient beings

original: ma lus 'gro ba phan pa skyed par dgyes pa 'jam dpal de la gus par phyag 'tshal nas //
analyzed: ma lus 'gro ba phan pa skyed par dgyes pa 'jam dpal de la gus par phyag 'tshal nas //
translated: Having respectfully paid homage to Manjushri, who delights in benefiting all beings without exception

original: rtsod pa'i rigs pa rnam par 'byed pa dri ma dang bral mdor bsdus pa 'di brtsam par bya //
analyzed: rtsod pa'i rigs pa rnam par 'byed pa dri ma dang bral mdor bsdus pa 'di brtsam par bya //
translated: I will compose this brief, stainless analysis of the logic of debate

original: gang dgos pa dang bral ba de rtog pas sngon du byed pa rnams kyis brtsam par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang dgos pa dang bral ba de rtog pas sngon du byed pa rnams kyis brtsam par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: That which lacks purpose should not be undertaken by those who engage in preliminary analysis

original: dper na bya rog gi so rnam par nges byed la sogs pa bzhin /
analyzed: dper na bya rog gi so rnam par nges byed la sogs pa bzhin /
translated: For example, it is like the case of the crow's tooth.üîΩThis chapter is also purposeless.

original: rab tu byed pa 'di yang dgos pa med pa'o zhes dogs par byed pa'i dogs pa de yongs su spang bar bzhed pas dgos pa bstan pa'i ched du rigs pa smra ba rnams kyang zhes pa la sogs pa'i ngag nye bar bkod do //
analyzed: rab tu byed pa 'di yang dgos pa med pa'o zhes dogs par byed pa'i dogs pa de yongs su spang bar bzhed pas dgos pa bstan pa'i ched du rigs pa smra ba rnams kyang zhes pa la sogs pa'i ngag nye bar bkod do //
translated: To completely eliminate such doubts, in order to demonstrate the purpose, the words the logicians also and so on are presented.

original: yang ji ltar ngag 'dis dgos pa nye bar bstan zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar ngag 'dis dgos pa nye bar bstan zhe na /
translated: How does this statement demonstrate the purpose?

original: 'di ni re zhig gzhag go //
analyzed: 'di ni re zhig gzhag go //
translated: This is set aside for the time being.

original: don rnam par bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: don rnam par bshad par bya ste /
translated: The meaning will be explained.

original: rigs pa ni tshul gsum pa'i rtags kyi mtshan nyid rigs pa ste /
analyzed: rigs pa ni tshul gsum pa'i rtags kyi mtshan nyid rigs pa ste /
translated: Reason is the definition of a reason having the trimodal mark.

original: 'dod pa'i don grub pa 'dis 'dren cing thob par bya'o zhes byas so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don grub pa 'dis 'dren cing thob par bya'o zhes byas so //
translated: This is what leads to and obtains the desired goal.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rtags rnam par gsum kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshul gsum pa kho na'i rtags bar ma chad par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rtags rnam par gsum kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshul gsum pa kho na'i rtags bar ma chad par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, only the trimodal reason and so on will be explained without interruption.

original: de rjod par byed pa'i tshig go zhes gzhan @51b rnams so //
analyzed: de rjod par byed pa'i tshig go zhes gzhan @51b rnams so //
translated: The words that express that are the others.

original: de smra ba'i ngang tshul 'di yin pa de la de skad du bshad do //
analyzed: de smra ba'i ngang tshul 'di yin pa de la de skad du bshad do //
translated: This is the manner of speaking of the one who speaks thus.

original: de yang tshar gcod par byed de pham par byed do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de yang tshar gcod par byed de pham par byed do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: And he is the one who defeats, the one who conquers.

original: tshar gcod pa ni rigs pa smra ba'i phan pa'i skabs nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshar gcod pa ni rigs pa smra ba'i phan pa'i skabs nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For the occasion of the one who speaks rightly is the very occasion of the one who is defeated.

original: rigs pa smra ba ni tshar gcad pa'i 'os ma yin pas /
analyzed: rigs pa smra ba ni tshar gcad pa'i 'os ma yin pas /
translated: The one who speaks rightly is not the one who is to be defeated.

original: tshar gcod par byed pa 'di srid par 'os pa ma yin mod /
analyzed: tshar gcod par byed pa 'di srid par 'os pa ma yin mod /
translated: It is not proper that he should be the one who defeats.

original: gzhan mkhas pa la phrag dog pa'i blo can gyis de yang pham par 'gyur ba mi srid do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan mkhas pa la phrag dog pa'i blo can gyis de yang pham par 'gyur ba mi srid do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But the one who is clever in the art of defeating others, the one who is jealous of the wise, he is the one who is defeated, and it is not possible that he should defeat.

original: kyang gi sgra ni bsdu ba'i don nam khyad par bsdu ba'i don to //
analyzed: kyang gi sgra ni bsdu ba'i don nam khyad par bsdu ba'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù has the sense of including, or of including a distinction.

original: gang rnams la tshar gcod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang rnams la tshar gcod pa yin zhe na /
translated: In regard to what is he the one who defeats?

original: rtsod pa dag la zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: rtsod pa dag la zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He is the one who defeats in debates.

original: sgrub pa dang sun 'byin pa yang dag par brjod pa rnams la rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgrub pa dang sun 'byin pa yang dag par brjod pa rnams la rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: in regard to those who express proofs and refutations, he is the one who analyzes.

original: la la las rgol pa dag la zhes 'don to //
analyzed: la la las rgol pa dag la zhes 'don to //
translated: Some read ‚Äúto those who refute.‚Äù

original: de la 'gal ba brjod pa'i rgol ba de rnams la yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de la 'gal ba brjod pa'i rgol ba de rnams la yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //
translated: The reply is that it is to those who argue by stating contradictions.

original: ji ltar 'gal ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'gal ba yin zhe na /
translated: How is it contradictory?

original: sgrub pa dang sun 'byin pa yang dag par brjod pa rnams la dpyad nas de dang 'gal ba'i don bsgrub pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub pa dang sun 'byin pa yang dag par brjod pa rnams la dpyad nas de dang 'gal ba'i don bsgrub pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because, having analyzed the correct statements of proofs and refutations, one engages in establishing a meaning that contradicts them.üîΩHow is it that logicians refute with faulty reasons such as ‚Äúunreal nonestablishment‚Äù and so on?

original: rigs pa smra ba rnams la yang yang dag pa ma yin pa ma grub pa la sogs pa gtan tshigs kyi skyon gyis ji ltar sun 'byin pa yin zhe na yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rigs pa smra ba rnams la yang yang dag pa ma yin pa ma grub pa la sogs pa gtan tshigs kyi skyon gyis ji ltar sun 'byin pa yin zhe na yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The reply is ‚Äúunreal designations.‚Äù

original: 'dir yang dag pa ma yin pa ni dam pa ma yin pa'i rnam par gzhag pa 'am mi bden pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang dag pa ma yin pa ni dam pa ma yin pa'i rnam par gzhag pa 'am mi bden pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ste /
translated: Here, unreal means non-genuine designations or false designations.

original: yang dag pa la smod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa la smod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is a deprecation of the real.

original: de yang 'bras bu'i ltag chod yang dag pa ma yin pa tshar gcod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de yang 'bras bu'i ltag chod yang dag pa ma yin pa tshar gcod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Moreover, it is the characteristic of refuting unreal sophistry.

original: de'i rnam par gzhag pa ni sbyor ba yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i rnam par gzhag pa ni sbyor ba yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The establishment of that is the application.

original: ngo tsha med pa de skad du ci ste brjod ce na /
analyzed: ngo tsha med pa de skad du ci ste brjod ce na /
translated: Why is that shamelessness called that?

original: g-yo rgyu can zhes pa bya smos te sgrin po sgyur can te /
analyzed: g-yo rgyu can zhes pa bya smos te sgrin po sgyur can te /
translated: It is said to be the cause of deceit, i.e., it is clever, it is deceitful.

original: gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la phrag dog pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la phrag dog pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is envy of the excellence of others.

original: gang gi phyir de de ltar tshar gcod pa de'i phyir de sun dbyung ba'i don du yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de de ltar tshar gcod pa de'i phyir de sun dbyung ba'i don du yin no //
translated: Because of that, it is the cause of that.

original: sgyu can rnams sam yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par gzhag pa de rnams sam /
analyzed: sgyu can rnams sam yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par gzhag pa de rnams sam /
translated: The deceitful ones, or those with false establishments,

original: de tshar gcod pa 'am /
analyzed: de tshar gcod pa 'am /
translated: or those who are destroyed,

original: yang na gsum char sun 'byin pa ni de dgag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na gsum char sun 'byin pa ni de dgag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: or all three are refuted in order to refute that.

original: rgyu mtshan des rab tu byed pa 'di brtsams so //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan des rab tu byed pa 'di brtsams so //
translated: For that reason, this chapter is composed.

original: yang na de'i don du zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: yang na de'i don du zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Or, it is connected with the meaning of that.

original: de sun @52a * //
analyzed: de sun @52a * //
translated: That is refuted,

original: dbyung ba byas nas yang dag pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: dbyung ba byas nas yang dag pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa yin te /
translated: and then one engages in correct conduct.

original: de sngon du song ba thams cad skyes bu'i don yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de sngon du song ba thams cad skyes bu'i don yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is the purport that all that has gone before is for the sake of man.

original: nang gi rjes su 'brangs nas rab tu byed pa 'di zhes yul nye bar brjod do //
analyzed: nang gi rjes su 'brangs nas rab tu byed pa 'di zhes yul nye bar brjod do //
translated: The section is called on the object because it is a part of the internal chapter.

original: nang gi de kho na nyid du yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nang gi de kho na nyid du yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the internal is completely fulfilled.

original: de lta ma yin na nang yongs su ma rdzogs pas yul nye bar mi 'gyur la sgra sbyar bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na nang yongs su ma rdzogs pas yul nye bar mi 'gyur la sgra sbyar bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, since the internal would not be fulfilled, the section would not be on the object, nor would it be properly named.

original: brtsams so zhes bya ba ji ltar da ltar gyi dus su ston zhe na /
analyzed: brtsams so zhes bya ba ji ltar da ltar gyi dus su ston zhe na /
translated: How is it that the author says I have composed in the present tense?

original: da ltar dang nye bar yang da ltar bzhin du bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: da ltar dang nye bar yang da ltar bzhin du bshad pa yin no //
translated: The present is near to the present.

original: 'brel pa yang brjod par bya ba yin gyi de lta ma yin na byis pa dang smyon pa'i tshig bzhin du rtog pa sngon du gtong bas gzung bar mi bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'brel pa yang brjod par bya ba yin gyi de lta ma yin na byis pa dang smyon pa'i tshig bzhin du rtog pa sngon du gtong bas gzung bar mi bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But the connection should be stated, otherwise, like the words of a child or a madman, it will not be accepted because it is not preceded by thought.

original: bden te / dgos pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir longs shig tu ma brjod do //
analyzed: bden te / dgos pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir longs shig tu ma brjod do //
translated: It is true, but it is not stated because it is included in the purpose.

original: de ltar na de sun dbyung ba'i don du 'di brtsams so //
analyzed: de ltar na de sun dbyung ba'i don du 'di brtsams so //
translated: Thus, this treatise was composed in order to refute that.

original: des na de'i dgos pa ni rab tu byed pa 'di'i bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: des na de'i dgos pa ni rab tu byed pa 'di'i bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
translated: Therefore, the purpose of that is the thesis of this chapter.

original: dgos pa dang rab tu byed pa de yang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas 'brel pa shugs la bstan to //
analyzed: dgos pa dang rab tu byed pa de yang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas 'brel pa shugs la bstan to //
translated: And that purpose and the chapter are characterized by the relation of the probandum and probans, so the relation is implicitly taught.

original: gzhan pa'i de ma thag pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa gang yin pa de ni brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan pa'i de ma thag pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa gang yin pa de ni brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: Any other relation characterized by immediate succession, etc., is not to be expressed,

original: bya ba yang rab tu byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba yang rab tu byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the action is not a part of the chapter.

original: 'di ltar de rnams yod kyang dgos pa med na rab tu byed pa mi rtsom pa 'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar de rnams yod kyang dgos pa med na rab tu byed pa mi rtsom pa 'am /
translated: Thus, even if those exist, if there is no purpose, the chapter is not begun;

original: de med kyang dgos pa yod na brtson par 'gyur ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: de med kyang dgos pa yod na brtson par 'gyur ba kho na yin no //
translated: or, even if that does not exist, if there is a purpose, it is begun.

original: de'i phyir rab tu byed pa'i rtsom pa'i dgongs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par brjod pas rtog pa dang ldan pas dgos pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rab tu byed pa'i rtsom pa'i dgongs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par brjod pas rtog pa dang ldan pas dgos pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the intelligent one should state the purpose by expressing the forward and reverse relations of the intention to begin the chapter.

original: de ltar bstan pas 'brel pa bstan pa kho na yin no snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar bstan pas 'brel pa bstan pa kho na yin no snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the author thinks that the statement of the purpose is a mere statement of the connection.

original: rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams rab tu byed pa'i lus ma brjod par 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de bas na dgos pa bzhin du 'jug pa'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir rab tu byed pa'i lus kyang brjod par bya ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams rab tu byed pa'i lus ma brjod par 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de bas na dgos pa bzhin du 'jug pa'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir rab tu byed pa'i lus kyang brjod par bya ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But those who are logical will not engage in a treatise without knowing its body. Therefore, since the body of the treatise is a part that engages the reader according to the purpose, it should be stated.

original: de lta yin yang dgos pa'i ngag gis bstan zin pa'i phyir 'brel pa bzhin du de yang logs shig tu brjod par mi rigs so //
analyzed: de lta yin yang dgos pa'i ngag gis bstan zin pa'i phyir 'brel pa bzhin du de yang logs shig tu brjod par mi rigs so //
translated: Even if that is so, since the purpose is stated by the statement of the purpose, like the connection, it is not reasonable to state it separately.

original: gang gi phyir de sun dbyung ba'i don du 'di brtsams so zhes bya bas bshad zin pa de'i phyir de sun dbyung ba @52b nyid du lus yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de sun dbyung ba'i don du 'di brtsams so zhes bya bas bshad zin pa de'i phyir de sun dbyung ba @52b nyid du lus yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it is explained that this is composed in order to refute that, therefore the body is for the purpose of refuting that.

original: gang gi tshe de sun dbyung ba'i don du 'di brtsams so zhes bya bas snga ma'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe de sun dbyung ba'i don du 'di brtsams so zhes bya bas snga ma'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin no //
translated: Since it is explained that this is composed in order to refute that, the previous reason is not established.

original: 'gog pa'i tshad ma gzhan gnyis kyang 'dis bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i tshad ma gzhan gnyis kyang 'dis bstan pa yin no //
translated: The other two valid cognitions that refute are also indicated by this.

original: rab tu byed pa 'di ni rtog pa dang ldan pa'i nus pas brtsam par bya 'am gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa 'di ni rtog pa dang ldan pa'i nus pas brtsam par bya 'am gzung bar bya ste /
translated: This chapter should be undertaken or studied by those who are capable of reflection,

original: de dgos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir dang / 'brel pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bstan bcos gzhan bzhin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: de dgos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir dang / 'brel pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bstan bcos gzhan bzhin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
translated: because it has a purpose and is related, like another treatise. This is a natural inference.

original: de ltar dgos pa brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar dgos pa brjod pa yin no //
translated: Thus the purpose has been stated.

original: rab tu byed pa ma lus pa'i don bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bshad pa /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa ma lus pa'i don bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bshad pa /
translated: A verse with a summary of the meaning of the entire chapter is stated:

original: sgrub byed yan lag mi brjod cing //
analyzed: sgrub byed yan lag mi brjod cing //
translated: Not stating the parts of proof,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on.

original: sgrub byed yan lag mi brjod pa dang / skyon mi brjod pa gnyis po ni rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba dag gi ji lta ba'i rim gyis tshar gcod pa'i gnas su 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgrub byed yan lag mi brjod pa dang / skyon mi brjod pa gnyis po ni rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba dag gi ji lta ba'i rim gyis tshar gcod pa'i gnas su 'gyur te /
translated: Not stating the parts of proof and not stating faults are the two grounds for defeat, in accordance with the order of proponent and opponent.

original: pham pa'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: pham pa'i gnas yin no //
translated: They are grounds for defeat.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni gnyis po de dag las gzhan pa rkang mig gis brtags pa'i dam bca' ba yod pa sgrub byed brjod pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin pas mi rigs phyir zhes bshad do //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni gnyis po de dag las gzhan pa rkang mig gis brtags pa'i dam bca' ba yod pa sgrub byed brjod pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin pas mi rigs phyir zhes bshad do //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúbecause it is illogical‚Äù is explained as follows: ‚Äúother‚Äù means that which is other than those two, and the proposition that is investigated by the eye of the foot is the basis for refutation because it is illogical.

original: mi 'dod pa ni tshar gcad pa'i gnas su mi 'dod do zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa ni tshar gcad pa'i gnas su mi 'dod do zhes sbyar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúNon-acceptance‚Äù is connected with the phrase ‚Äúis not the basis for refutation.‚Äù

original: re zhig 'di ni bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa yin no //
analyzed: re zhig 'di ni bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa yin no //
translated: This is the summary verse.

original: 'dod pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par dbye ba brtsam pa yin te /üîΩ'dod pa'i don ni sgra rtag pa la sogs pa bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa de sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par dbye ba brtsam pa yin te / 'dod pa'i don ni sgra rtag pa la sogs pa bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa de sgrub pa ste /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe desired object‚Äù and so on begins the analysis.

original: rtogs par byed pa ni sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa ni sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: The desired object is the object that is desired to be established, such as the permanence of sound. The proof of that is the means of understanding.üîΩThat is the proof.

original: des na sgrub par byed pa'i sgra 'dis 'di yod pa bsgrub par bya ba bshad pa 'dir 'dod pa yin gyi sgrub par byed pa zhes bya bar bshad pa rgyu ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na sgrub par byed pa'i sgra 'dis 'di yod pa bsgrub par bya ba bshad pa 'dir 'dod pa yin gyi sgrub par byed pa zhes bya bar bshad pa rgyu ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúproof‚Äù in the statement ‚ÄúThis is the proof of the existence of that‚Äù refers to the desired object, not to the cause.

original: de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa ni 'dod pa'i don sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa ni 'dod pa'i don sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yan lag go //
translated: Therefore, the means of proof is the member characterized by the establishment of the desired object.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: bshad pa sgrub par byed pa ste /
analyzed: bshad pa sgrub par byed pa ste /
translated: The explanation is: the means of proof,

original: skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: the producer.

original: yan lag gi sgra brjod pa 'dis yan lag gi sgra 'di ni 'dir rgyu'i rnam grangs yin gyi cha shas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yan lag gi sgra brjod pa 'dis yan lag gi sgra 'di ni 'dir rgyu'i rnam grangs yin gyi cha shas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The expression of the term ‚Äúmember‚Äù here is a synonym for ‚Äúcause,‚Äù not a part.

original: de yang 'dir sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag gis ni tshul gsum pa'i rtags bstan to //üîΩsgrub par byed pa'i yan lag brjod pa ni tshul gsum pa'i @53a * //
analyzed: de yang 'dir sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag gis ni tshul gsum pa'i rtags bstan to // sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag brjod pa ni tshul gsum pa'i @53a * //
translated: Moreover, here the member of the means of proof indicates the reason of the three modes.

original: rtags nges pa 'chad pa yin no //
analyzed: rtags nges pa 'chad pa yin no //
translated: The expression of the member of the means of proof explains the definite reason of the three modes.

original: de'i sgrub bar byed pa'i yan lag mi brjod cing ma smras pa gang yin pa de ni sgrub pa'i yan lag mi brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sgrub bar byed pa'i yan lag mi brjod cing ma smras pa gang yin pa de ni sgrub pa'i yan lag mi brjod pa'o //
translated: The non-expression of the member of the means of proof, which is not expressed or stated, is the non-expression of the member of the proof.

original: de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being shown:

original: sgrub pa'i yan lag ma yin pa ni phyogs dang nye bar sbyar ba la sogs pa'i tshig ste /
analyzed: sgrub pa'i yan lag ma yin pa ni phyogs dang nye bar sbyar ba la sogs pa'i tshig ste /
translated: The non-member of the proof is the words such as ‚Äúposition‚Äù and ‚Äúapplication.‚Äù

original: sgrub pa'i yan lag ma brjod pas de ltar mi rtogs so zhes 'dir bstan to //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i yan lag ma brjod pas de ltar mi rtogs so zhes 'dir bstan to //
translated: Since the member of proof is not mentioned, it is not understood in that way.

original: de lta na sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma brjod pa ni sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag brjod pa med pa ste /
analyzed: de lta na sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma brjod pa ni sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag brjod pa med pa ste /
translated: Thus, the non-mention of the member of proof is the non-mention of the member of proof.

original: rgol pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: rgol pa tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no //
translated: It is the occasion of defeat for the challenger.

original: des ni tshigs su bcad pa de'i snga ma'i cha bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: des ni tshigs su bcad pa de'i snga ma'i cha bshad pa yin no //
translated: Thus, he explains the first part of that verse.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma brjod pa ji ltar tshar gcad pa'i gnas su 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma brjod pa ji ltar tshar gcad pa'i gnas su 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How can the non-mention of the member of proof be an occasion of defeat?

original: de khas len pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de khas len pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúbecause of the acceptance of that.‚Äù

original: 'dod pa de bsgrub par bya ba khas blangs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa de bsgrub par bya ba khas blangs pa ste /
translated: The acceptance of the thesis to be proven is the acceptance of that.

original: 'di bdag gis bsgrub po zhes dam bcas nas so //
analyzed: 'di bdag gis bsgrub po zhes dam bcas nas so //
translated: Having promised, ‚ÄúI will prove this,‚Äù

original: spobs pa med pas byed par 'gyur bas mi smra bar 'dug par gyur pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: spobs pa med pas byed par 'gyur bas mi smra bar 'dug par gyur pa'i phyir te /
translated: because of the absence of confidence, one sits in silence.

original: spobs pa med pa ni 'dir sngar rtogs pa'i don brjed pa dang 'jigs pa nyid gzung ngo //
analyzed: spobs pa med pa ni 'dir sngar rtogs pa'i don brjed pa dang 'jigs pa nyid gzung ngo //
translated: The absence of confidence is taken here as the forgetting of the previously understood meaning and fear itself.

original: 'dis ni sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ye ma brjod pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ye ma brjod pa gsungs so //
translated: This is saying that the proponent does not state a means of affirmation at all.

original: brjod pa na yang gal te nus pa med na de'i tshe brjod kyang ma brjod pa kho na ste /
analyzed: brjod pa na yang gal te nus pa med na de'i tshe brjod kyang ma brjod pa kho na ste /
translated: Even if he does state it, if it is not capable of establishing the probandum, then even if he states it, it is as if he did not state it,

original: rang gi bya ba mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: rang gi bya ba mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs nas gsungs pa /
translated: because it does not perform its own function.

original: sgrub byed kyi yan lag bsgrubs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ste /
analyzed: sgrub byed kyi yan lag bsgrubs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ste /
translated: Thinking of this, [NƒÅgƒÅrjuna] says, ‚ÄúBecause the means of affirmation is not established.‚Äù

original: de khas blangs nas zhes 'jug go //
analyzed: de khas blangs nas zhes 'jug go //
translated: The opponent accepts this.

original: 'am gyi sgra ni snga ma la ltos pas rnam par brtag pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'am gyi sgra ni snga ma la ltos pas rnam par brtag pa'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúor‚Äù has the sense of ‚Äúif‚Äù in relation to the previous [line].

original: sgrub byed kyi yan lag bsgrubs pa med pa ni tshul gsum rnams la nges pa med par bstan pa'o //üîΩde'i phyir mi smra bar gyur pa las ngad bsgrubs pa med pa las kyang sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag mi brjod pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub byed kyi yan lag bsgrubs pa med pa ni tshul gsum rnams la nges pa med par bstan pa'o // de'i phyir mi smra bar gyur pa las ngad bsgrubs pa med pa las kyang sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag mi brjod pa'o //
translated: The means of affirmation is not established because there is no certainty in the three modes.üîΩTherefore, from the perspective of one who remains silent, the means of affirmation is not stated because it is not established.

original: de las kyang dam bcas pa'i don mi byed par phyir rgol ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas so zhes dkyus dang dang sbrel lo //
analyzed: de las kyang dam bcas pa'i don mi byed par phyir rgol ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas so zhes dkyus dang dang sbrel lo //
translated: From that, the opponent is defeated because the meaning of the thesis is not accomplished.

original: 'ga' zhig tu rgol ba zhes klog ste /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu rgol ba zhes klog ste /
translated: In some [texts] it is read as ‚Äúthe opponent.‚Äù

original: der ni de sgras mi brjod ces pa dkyus ma dang sprel lo //
analyzed: der ni de sgras mi brjod ces pa dkyus ma dang sprel lo //
translated: There, the word ‚Äúthat‚Äù is connected with the basic [text], ‚Äúis not expressed.‚Äù

original: yang gang gis de las bzlog pas bsgrubs pa med pa las dam bcas pa'i don mi byed pa'i phyir rgol ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas nyid do zhes pa sgrub byed kyi yan lag bsgrub par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: yang gang gis de las bzlog pas bsgrubs pa med pa las dam bcas pa'i don mi byed pa'i phyir rgol ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas nyid do zhes pa sgrub byed kyi yan lag bsgrub par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: Moreover, since the meaning of the thesis is not accomplished by the absence of proof that is contrary to that, how could the branch of proof be established, since it is a basis for the defeat of the opponent?

original: gang gi tshe yin /üîΩci'i @53b ngo bo las yin zhes pa 'di'i lan gdab par bzhed pas /
analyzed: gang gi tshe yin / ci'i @53b ngo bo las yin zhes pa 'di'i lan gdab par bzhed pas /
translated: When is it?üîΩWhat kind of nature is it?

original: rnam pa gsum kho na zhes pa la sogs pas dang po'i gnas skabs mdzad de /
analyzed: rnam pa gsum kho na zhes pa la sogs pas dang po'i gnas skabs mdzad de /
translated: In order to answer this, he composes the first section beginning with ‚Äúonly three aspects.‚Äù

original: rtags rnam pa gsum kho na yan lag ste rgyu'o //
analyzed: rtags rnam pa gsum kho na yan lag ste rgyu'o //
translated: The three aspects are the only branch, the cause.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩsgrub pa'i ste /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / sgrub pa'i ste /
translated: Why?üîΩOf the proof.

original: 'thad pa'i ngo bo can gyi'o //
analyzed: 'thad pa'i ngo bo can gyi'o //
translated: Of the acceptable nature.

original: ci sgrub pa'i zhe na /
analyzed: ci sgrub pa'i zhe na /
translated: What is the proof?

original: gsungs pa / mngon sum ma yin pa ste lkog tu gyur pa'i ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / mngon sum ma yin pa ste lkog tu gyur pa'i ste /
translated: It is said: ‚ÄúOf the non-manifest, the hidden,

original: rjes su dpag byar gyur pa'i dngos po'i'o zhes pa ji srid pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag byar gyur pa'i dngos po'i'o zhes pa ji srid pa'o //
translated: the thing that is to be inferred.‚Äù

original: rnam pa gsum kho na zhes bzhi la sogs pa rnam par gcod pa'i nges par gzung bar gsungs so //
analyzed: rnam pa gsum kho na zhes bzhi la sogs pa rnam par gcod pa'i nges par gzung bar gsungs so //
translated: The three alone is stated as a restrictive specification that excludes four and so on.

original: nges pa 'di ni ji ltar zhe na /üîΩgang gi phyir /
analyzed: nges pa 'di ni ji ltar zhe na / gang gi phyir /
translated: How is this restriction?

original: sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba rnam pa gnyis su rnam par gzhag la /
analyzed: sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba rnam pa gnyis su rnam par gzhag la /
translated: Because the probandum is established as having two natures: the nature of affirmation and the nature of negation.

original: sgrub pa'i ngo bo yang rang bzhin gyi ngo bo dang rgyu'i ngo bor 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgrub pa'i ngo bo yang rang bzhin gyi ngo bo dang rgyu'i ngo bor 'gyur te /
translated: And the nature of affirmation is twofold: the nature of essence and the nature of cause.

original: de la gtan tshigs 'brel pa ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la gtan tshigs 'brel pa ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the reason is related to that.

original: don gzhan 'bras bu ma yin pa yod par gyur pa na gzhan yod par 'gyur ba ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don gzhan 'bras bu ma yin pa yod par gyur pa na gzhan yod par 'gyur ba ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not reasonable that when an existent other object is not an effect, another existent would be an effect.

original: snam bu yod par gyur pa na rnga mo bzhin no //
analyzed: snam bu yod par gyur pa na rnga mo bzhin no //
translated: For example, when a cloth exists, a camel does not.

original: don gzhan rgyu ma yin pa ldog pa na 'bras bu ma yin pa gzhan ldog pa yang rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don gzhan rgyu ma yin pa ldog pa na 'bras bu ma yin pa gzhan ldog pa yang rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin te /
translated: It is also not reasonable that when a different object, which is not a cause, is eliminated, another object, which is not an effect, is eliminated.

original: rnga mo ldog pa na snam bu bzhin no //
analyzed: rnga mo ldog pa na snam bu bzhin no //
translated: For example, when a camel is eliminated, a cloth is not.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa ma tshang ba ni go bar byed pa nyid du rigs pa yang ma yin te /üîΩsnam bu yang rnag mo'i go bar byed pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //üîΩrang bzhin du gyur pa'i sgra ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang / rgyur gyur pa ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs las khas blang bar bya'o //üîΩdgag pa ni dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa'i mi dmigs pas ji lta bar bsgrub par bya'i gzhan gyis ma yin no zhes de bzhin du rgyas par phyis bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa ma tshang ba ni go bar byed pa nyid du rigs pa yang ma yin te / snam bu yang rnag mo'i go bar byed pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro // rang bzhin du gyur pa'i sgra ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang / rgyur gyur pa ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs las khas blang bar bya'o // dgag pa ni dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa'i mi dmigs pas ji lta bar bsgrub par bya'i gzhan gyis ma yin no zhes de bzhin du rgyas par phyis bshad par bya ste /

consequence.üîΩAnd it is not right to say that the reason is the invariable concomitance of the consequence, because that is not the invariable concomitance of the consequence.

original: de ni 'dir mdor bsdus pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'dir mdor bsdus pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And it is not right to say that the reason is the invariable concomitance of the consequence, because that is not the invariable concomitance of the consequence.

original: yul la ltos nas yul can rtags rnam par gzhag par bya ste /üîΩyul can yang dgag pa 'am sgrub pa zhig tu 'gyur na /
analyzed: yul la ltos nas yul can rtags rnam par gzhag par bya ste /üîΩyul can yang dgag pa 'am sgrub pa zhig tu 'gyur na /
translated: And it is not right to say that the reason is the invariable concomitance of the consequence, because that is not the invariable concomitance of the consequence.

original: sgrub pa yang don gzhan pa 'am don gzhan ma yin ba sgrub pa zhig yin /
analyzed: sgrub pa yang don gzhan pa 'am don gzhan ma yin ba sgrub pa zhig yin /
translated: Is the proof of something else or the proof of something that is not other?

original: don gzhan sgrub pa yang rgyu 'am /
analyzed: don gzhan sgrub pa yang rgyu 'am /
translated: If it is the proof of something else, is it the proof of a cause,üîΩan effect,

original: 'bras bu 'am /üîΩgnyi ga ma yin pa zhig bsgrub par bya /
analyzed: 'bras bu 'am / gnyi ga ma yin pa zhig bsgrub par bya /
translated: or neither?

original: 'bras bu brjod pa yang rgyu'i spyi sprin la sogs pa ldog pa'i dngos po tsam gyis rtags su @54a * //üîΩbrjod pa 'am /
analyzed: 'bras bu brjod pa yang rgyu'i spyi sprin la sogs pa ldog pa'i dngos po tsam gyis rtags su @54a * // brjod pa 'am /
translated: If it is the expression of an effect, is the reason merely the fact of the cessation of a universal cause, such as a cloud,

original: rgyu'i bye brag sprin la sogs pa nus pa thogs pa med pa gang yin pa zhig yin /
analyzed: rgyu'i bye brag sprin la sogs pa nus pa thogs pa med pa gang yin pa zhig yin /
translated: or is it a particular cause, such as a cloud, that is unobstructed in its capacity?

original: dgag pa yang dgag par mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po med pa'i mi dmigs pa'am dmigs par bstan pa zhig yin /
analyzed: dgag pa yang dgag par mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po med pa'i mi dmigs pa'am dmigs par bstan pa zhig yin /
translated: If it is a negation, is it the non-apprehension of a non-entity that is the object of negation, or is it the teaching of an apprehension?

original: mi dmigs pa de yang dmigs pa log pa tsam gyis mtshan nyid du 'gyur ram /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa de yang dmigs pa log pa tsam gyis mtshan nyid du 'gyur ram /
translated: If it is a non-apprehension, is its characteristic merely the cessation of an apprehension?

original: de dang rung bar mtshungs pa'i gnas skabs kyi don 'ba' zhig dmigs pas sgrub par byed par brtag / de la gdon mi za bar 'brug sgra la sogs pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i sprin gyi rgyu tsam las kyang 'bras bu char pa la sogs pa dang ldan paüîΩma yin te /
analyzed: de dang rung bar mtshungs pa'i gnas skabs kyi don 'ba' zhig dmigs pas sgrub par byed par brtag / de la gdon mi za bar 'brug sgra la sogs pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i sprin gyi rgyu tsam las kyang 'bras bu char pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa ma yin te /
translated: but also endowed with the cause of the cloud.

original: bar du gcod pa srid pas 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bar du gcod pa srid pas 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the possibility of an obstruction, there is error.

original: de'i phyir rgyu tsam go bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu tsam go bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the cause is not understood.

original: rgyu'i khyad par yang nus pa thogs pa med pas brjod pa la rjes su dpag par bya ba shes pa'i snga rol du 'bras bu 'byung bas dbang po'i shes pa'i gzung bar bya bar 'gyur bas de yang rtags ma yin no //üîΩ'bras bu rgyu'i rtags su ni rigs te /
analyzed: rgyu'i khyad par yang nus pa thogs pa med pas brjod pa la rjes su dpag par bya ba shes pa'i snga rol du 'bras bu 'byung bas dbang po'i shes pa'i gzung bar bya bar 'gyur bas de yang rtags ma yin no // 'bras bu rgyu'i rtags su ni rigs te /
translated: The difference of the cause is also not a reason, because the result would be the object of the sense consciousness, since it is expressed by the unobstructed power prior to the knowledge of the inference.

original: de med na mi 'byung bas de las mi 'da' ste /
analyzed: de med na mi 'byung bas de las mi 'da' ste /
translated: The result is a reason for the cause, because it is not beyond that, since it does not occur without that.

original: rgyu dang ldan pa las 'das par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang ldan pa las 'das par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not beyond that which possesses the cause, because it would be beyond the cause.

original: gnyi ga ma yin pa yang 'brel pa med pas go bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyi ga ma yin pa yang 'brel pa med pas go bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it a revealer if it is neither, because that is unrelated.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that would lead to absurd consequences.

original: don gzhan ma yin pa ni 'khrul pa med pa'i go bar byed pa yin no zhes bya bar rigs so //
analyzed: don gzhan ma yin pa ni 'khrul pa med pa'i go bar byed pa yin no zhes bya bar rigs so //
translated: It is reasonable to say that a non-different object is a non-erroneous revealer.

original: dgag pa yang dmigs pas ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: dgag pa yang dmigs pas ni mi rigs te /
translated: But it is not reasonable to say that a negation is a revealer,

original: 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is contradictory.

original: ji ltar dmigs pas med pa la nye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar dmigs pas med pa la nye bar 'gyur /
translated: How can a negation be related to non-existence by perception?

original: de'i shes pa log pa tsam ni 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i shes pa log pa tsam ni 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
translated: The mere cessation of its cognition would be erroneous.

original: shes pa gcig pa tshogs pa 'ba' zhig mthong bas med pa'i tha snyad du bya bar rigs te /
analyzed: shes pa gcig pa tshogs pa 'ba' zhig mthong bas med pa'i tha snyad du bya bar rigs te /
translated: It is reasonable to designate the absence of something by the mere perception of a collection of individual cognitions,

original: gal te yod na dmigs par 'gyur ba kho nar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te yod na dmigs par 'gyur ba kho nar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because if it existed, it would certainly be perceived.

original: tshad ma yang gang 'thad pa med pa'i yul la de'i yul can 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshad ma yang gang 'thad pa med pa'i yul la de'i yul can 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: And it is not reasonable for a valid cognition to have an object that is not established,

original: rta'i rva bzhin no //
analyzed: rta'i rva bzhin no //
translated: like the horn of a donkey.

original: gzhan gyis brtags pa'i rang bzhin la sogs pa las gzhan ldan pa la sogs pa yang 'thad pa med pa'i yul du bshad pas zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis brtags pa'i rang bzhin la sogs pa las gzhan ldan pa la sogs pa yang 'thad pa med pa'i yul du bshad pas zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: Since it has been explained that possession, etc., are not tenable with respect to anything other than the intrinsic reality, etc., imagined by others, this is a case of non-observation of a more extensive category.

original: chos mi mthun pa'i dpe ni sngon po la sogs pa'i shes pa dang 'bras bu'i @54b rtags la sogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa'i dpe ni sngon po la sogs pa'i shes pa dang 'bras bu'i @54b rtags la sogs pa nyid do //
translated: The dissimilar example is the cognition of blue, etc., and the effect, etc.

original: sgra don gyi rgyu mtshan can du 'thad pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gnod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sgra don gyi rgyu mtshan can du 'thad pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gnod par byed pa'o //
translated: The reason is that it is tenable that the object is the causal-sign of the meaning of the word.

original: de ltar cis grub ce na /
analyzed: de ltar cis grub ce na /
translated: How is this established?

original: 'di dag go bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di dag go bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because these are not the means of understanding.

original: 'di ltar yul can nyid dang go bar byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa ni rnam grangs yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar yul can nyid dang go bar byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa ni rnam grangs yin no //
translated: Thus, the subjective aspect, the means of understanding, and the means of manifestation are synonymous.

original: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba rnam pa gsum yin pas de'i go bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyang rnam pa gsum kho na yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba rnam pa gsum yin pas de'i go bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyang rnam pa gsum kho na yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: Therefore, since there are three types of objects to be comprehended, there are only three types of reasons that are the means of understanding them.

original: rnam pa gsum gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa gsum gang yin zhe na /
translated: What are the three types?

original: rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: The term ‚Äúnature‚Äù and so on is stated.

original: ngang gi sgras ni rang bzhin dang / 'bras bu la ltos nas bsdu ba yin te /
analyzed: ngang gi sgras ni rang bzhin dang / 'bras bu la ltos nas bsdu ba yin te /
translated: The term ‚Äúown‚Äù refers to nature and effect.

original: 'di dag gis mngon par 'dod pa'i gtan tshigs bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di dag gis mngon par 'dod pa'i gtan tshigs bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that these are taught as the reason for the desired conclusion.

original: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i dbye ba rnam pa gsum ni mngon sum ma yin pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag yin gyi /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i dbye ba rnam pa gsum ni mngon sum ma yin pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag yin gyi /
translated: The three types of non-observation of nature and effect are the limbs of proof by non-perception.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu dang 'du ba dang 'gal ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba bstan pa'i don du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dang 'du ba dang 'gal ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba bstan pa'i don du ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not for the purpose of teaching the types of cause and effect, assemblage, contradiction, and so on.

original: 'o na dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa las mi dmigs par bshad pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa las mi dmigs par bshad pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: If you ask, ‚ÄúWhat is the non-observation of that which is suitable to be observed that is explained?‚Äù

original: de nyid mngon sum gyi grub pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid mngon sum gyi grub pa yin te /
translated: It is established by direct perception.

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rigs pas yan lag yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rigs pas yan lag yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is a limb by the reasoning that will be explained.

original: mi dmigs pa tsam ma yin na de ji ltar thun mong du bshad ce na /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa tsam ma yin na de ji ltar thun mong du bshad ce na /
translated: If it is not mere non-observation, how is it explained in common?‚Äù

original: de ltar spyi'i sgra yin yang 'di sgrub par byed pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag tu dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa'i mi dmigs pa kho na la 'jug go //
analyzed: de ltar spyi'i sgra yin yang 'di sgrub par byed pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag tu dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa'i mi dmigs pa kho na la 'jug go //
translated: Thus, although the word ‚Äúnon-apprehension‚Äù is a general term, it is used here in the specific sense of the non-apprehension of the perceptible, which is a part of the proof.

original: 'di ltar spyi'i sgra yang sgra gzhan dang nye ba'i skabs kyis spyi'i yang bye brag la rnam par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar spyi'i sgra yang sgra gzhan dang nye ba'i skabs kyis spyi'i yang bye brag la rnam par gnas pa yin no //
translated: Thus, even a general term is restricted to a particular meaning by the context of other terms.

original: gang bye brag gi sgra dang nye ba kho nas bye brag tu gnas pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang bye brag gi sgra dang nye ba kho nas bye brag tu gnas pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that a general term is restricted to a particular meaning only by the proximity of a particular term.

original: 'on kyang skabs dang shugs la sogs pas kyang yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: 'on kyang skabs dang shugs la sogs pas kyang yin no zhes bshad do //
translated: But it is also restricted by the context, the force, etc.

original: ji ltar mi dmigs pa tsam gyis bsgrubs pa yang sgrub pa'i yan lag tu srid pa ma yin no zhes phyis bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar mi dmigs pa tsam gyis bsgrubs pa yang sgrub pa'i yan lag tu srid pa ma yin no zhes phyis bshad par bya'o //
translated: Later on, it will be explained how mere non-apprehension is not possible as a part of the proof.

original: mngon sum ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs kyi dbang du byas pa yin pas 'di la rtsod pa med do //
analyzed: mngon sum ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs kyi dbang du byas pa yin pas 'di la rtsod pa med do //
translated: Since this is from the point of view of an inference that is not a direct perception, there is no dispute about this.

original: 'dir yang rnam pa gsum sgrub pa'i yan lag tu sgrub pas bzlog pa gang sgrub pa ma yin par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir yang rnam pa gsum sgrub pa'i yan lag tu sgrub pas bzlog pa gang sgrub pa ma yin par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Here, too, since the three modes are established as the members of a syllogism, how can it be that any of them is not established?

original: de la zhes bya ba sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba sogs pa smos te /
translated: To this, the author says, ‚ÄúIn that case, etc.‚Äù

original: 'dir bsgrub par bya ba @55a * //
analyzed: 'dir bsgrub par bya ba @55a * //
translated: Here, the predicate

original: smos pa ni mi rtag pa la sogs pa chos tsam la brjod de /
analyzed: smos pa ni mi rtag pa la sogs pa chos tsam la brjod de /
translated: is said to be a mere property, such as impermanence,

original: cha shas la spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cha shas la spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the universal is imputed to the parts.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni chos dang chos can gyi spyi ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni chos dang chos can gyi spyi ma yin te /
translated: The predicate is not the universal of the subject,

original: khyab pa nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab pa nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that there would be no pervasion.

original: sgra la sogs pa'i chos can gyis khyad par du byas pa'i mi rtag pa ni dpe'i chos can la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa'i chos can gyis khyad par du byas pa'i mi rtag pa ni dpe'i chos can la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Impermanence, which is qualified by the subject, sound, etc., is not found in the example subject.

original: khyab pa sgrub pa ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa tshad mas bsgrubs pa 'dis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa nges par rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: khyab pa sgrub pa ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa tshad mas bsgrubs pa 'dis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa nges par rigs pa yin no //
translated: The establishment of the pervasion is accomplished by means of the valid cognitions that establish the positive and negative concomitance. Therefore, it is correct to ascertain the positive and negative concomitance by means of this.

original: chos can ni shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag dang ldan ba sgra la sogs pa la yod pa'i dngos po bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can ni shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag dang ldan ba sgra la sogs pa la yod pa'i dngos po bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The subject is the thing that exists in sound and so on, which is endowed with the particular that is desired to be known, in order to prove it.

original: phyogs kyi chos grub pa'i tshad mas yod pa'i don yang brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos grub pa'i tshad mas yod pa'i don yang brjod pa yin te /
translated: The meaning of existence is also stated by the valid cognition that establishes the property of the subject.

original: 'dis kyang phyogs kyi chos nges par can bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis kyang phyogs kyi chos nges par can bshad pa yin no //
translated: This also explains the ascertainment of the property of the subject.

original: khyab ba sgrub pa'i chos can la yod par bshad pa ji ltar phyi'i khyab pa thams cad bsdus pa yin snyam pa la /üîΩ'dir dpe ni /
analyzed: khyab ba sgrub pa'i chos can la yod par bshad pa ji ltar phyi'i khyab pa thams cad bsdus pa yin snyam pa la / 'dir dpe ni /
translated: How is it that the explanation of the property of the subject as existing in the pervasion is included in all external pervasions?

original: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Here, the example is stated with For example... and so on.

original: de thams cad mi rtag pa zhes bya bas don bsdus pa'i khyab pa bstan pa bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de thams cad mi rtag pa zhes bya bas don bsdus pa'i khyab pa bstan pa bshad pa yin no //
translated: All of that is impermanent explains the pervasion that includes the meaning.

original: don ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: don ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning?

original: log par rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: log par rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is in order to remove misconceptions.

original: 'di ltar kha cig phyogs nyid mthun pa'i phyogs la ltos pa'i nang gi khyad pa bstan pa yin no snyam du log par rtog pa de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar kha cig phyogs nyid mthun pa'i phyogs la ltos pa'i nang gi khyad pa bstan pa yin no snyam du log par rtog pa de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, some think that the internal distinction in relation to the subject itself is explained. That misconception is also unreasonable.

original: khyab pa ni dngos po'i stobs las 'ongs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab pa ni dngos po'i stobs las 'ongs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the pervasion is due to the power of the real entities.

original: sngar bsgrub par bya bas khyab par bsgrub pas phyis chos na la yod par bstan 'di 'dra ba la ci 'dir go rims nges pa yod dam med snyam pa'am /
analyzed: sngar bsgrub par bya bas khyab par bsgrub pas phyis chos na la yod par bstan 'di 'dra ba la ci 'dir go rims nges pa yod dam med snyam pa'am /
translated: One might think, In the case of the proof of the subject's property of the thesis, the pervasion is established by the probandum, and later the presence in the subject is indicated. Is there a fixed order here or not?

original: 'di la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'di la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: To respond, he says, In this case, too, . . .

original: gang sgrub pa'i yan lag tu sgrub par 'dod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: gang sgrub pa'i yan lag tu sgrub par 'dod pa kho na yin no //
translated: The word too indicates that it is just like the case of the proof of the subject's property of the thesis.

original: yang gi sgra ni nges par bzung ba ste /
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni nges par bzung ba ste /
translated: The word too is used to indicate certainty.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: It is to be connected with the word not.

original: 'di la 'di 'dra ba'i go rims kyi nges pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: 'di la 'di 'dra ba'i go rims kyi nges pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
translated: The meaning is that there is no fixed order at all in this case.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'dod pa'i don sgrub par gnyi ga la bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don sgrub par gnyi ga la bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference between the two in establishing the intended meaning.

original: khyab ba sgrub pa brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i chos can la yod pa sgrub pa brjod pa dang / chos can la yod pa sgrub pa brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i khyab pa sgrub pa brjod pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'i don sgrub pa la khyad par @55b med ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyab ba sgrub pa brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i chos can la yod pa sgrub pa brjod pa dang / chos can la yod pa sgrub pa brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i khyab pa sgrub pa brjod pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'i don sgrub pa la khyad par @55b med ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no difference in the establishment of the object to be established whether one first states the pervasion or first states the existence of the reason in the subject.

original: go rims nges pa'i don ci zhig la brten /üîΩbsgrub par bya ba sgrub pa'i don yin na ni chos mthun pa nyid can gyi sbyor ba ji ltar bsgrubs pas gtan tshigs med na mi 'byung bar bstan pa yin gyi /
analyzed: go rims nges pa'i don ci zhig la brten / bsgrub par bya ba sgrub pa'i don yin na ni chos mthun pa nyid can gyi sbyor ba ji ltar bsgrubs pas gtan tshigs med na mi 'byung bar bstan pa yin gyi /
translated: What is the meaning of the definite order?

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no //üîΩde bzhin du chos mi mthun pa'i sbyor bas bsgrub par bya ba med na gtan tshigs med par bstan gyi /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no // de bzhin du chos mi mthun pa'i sbyor bas bsgrub par bya ba med na gtan tshigs med par bstan gyi /
translated: If the meaning is that it establishes the object to be established, then the argument with a similar instance teaches that the reason is invariably concomitant with the predicate, but it does not establish the predicate.

original: gtan tshigs med pas bsgrub bya med pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs med pas bsgrub bya med pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Similarly, the argument with a dissimilar instance teaches that the reason is absent when the predicate is absent, but it does not teach that the reason is absent when the predicate is absent.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang med na mi 'byung ba bstan pas 'dod pa'i don sgrub pa la ma grub pa dang phyin ci log tu sgrub par ma gyur cig snyam du de ltar dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang med na mi 'byung ba bstan pas 'dod pa'i don sgrub pa la ma grub pa dang phyin ci log tu sgrub par ma gyur cig snyam du de ltar dgongs pa yin no //
translated: The intention is that may the desired object be established, and may it not be the case that it is not established or is established in a contradictory way by teaching the probandum and the invariable concomitance.

original: de skad du gtan tshigs ni mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa dang bsgrub par bya ba med pa la med pa nyid du bstan par nus kyang bzlog pas ni ma yin zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de skad du gtan tshigs ni mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa dang bsgrub par bya ba med pa la med pa nyid du bstan par nus kyang bzlog pas ni ma yin zhes bshad do //
translated: It is said, In that way, a reason can be shown to exist only in what is similar and to not exist in the absence of the probandum, but not by the reverse.

original: dper na byas pas mi rtag pa 'am /
analyzed: dper na byas pas mi rtag pa 'am /
translated: For example, impermanence by being produced,

original: 'jig pa ni 'dir 'bras bu yin te /
analyzed: 'jig pa ni 'dir 'bras bu yin te /
translated: or destruction is the effect here.

original: byas pa'i khyab pa ma bshad du zin na 'brel pa nges pa med pa yin no zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: byas pa'i khyab pa ma bshad du zin na 'brel pa nges pa med pa yin no zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: If the pervasion by the produced is not explained, there is no certainty of the relation, it is related that way.

original: des na 'di ni go rims mtshungs pa la brten par rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di ni go rims mtshungs pa la brten par rigs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable that this is based on the same order.

original: 'dir ma byas su zin kyang 'dis kyang 'dod pa'i don grub cing rdzogs pa yin pas go rims nges pa yod pa ma yin zhes bya ba legs par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ma byas su zin kyang 'dis kyang 'dod pa'i don grub cing rdzogs pa yin pas go rims nges pa yod pa ma yin zhes bya ba legs par bshad pa yin no //
translated: Even if it is not done here, the desired object is accomplished and complete, so it is well explained that there is no definite order.

original: 'dod pa'i don grub par gnyi ga la bye brag med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de nyid 'dir gang las she na /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don grub par gnyi ga la bye brag med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de nyid 'dir gang las she na /
translated: Because there is no difference between the two in accomplishing the desired object, what is the basis for this?

original: bshad pa gang gi phyir chos can la zhes bya ba la sogs pas bsgrub par bya bas khyab pa rab tu bsgrubs nas zhes dang por bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa gang gi phyir chos can la zhes bya ba la sogs pas bsgrub par bya bas khyab pa rab tu bsgrubs nas zhes dang por bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is explained first by establishing the pervasion of the probandum with statements such as because of the subject.

original: de'i khyab pa bsgrub pa yang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i khyab pa bsgrub pa yang gang yin zhe na /
translated: And what is the establishment of its pervasion?

original: 'dir yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Here, it is said in this case and so on.

original: 'dir yang zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
translated: In this case refers to the autonomous reason.

original: 'bras bu dang mi dmigs pa la sogs pa'i khyab pa sgrub pa dag phyis bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang mi dmigs pa la sogs pa'i khyab pa sgrub pa dag phyis bshad par bya'o //
translated: The establishment of the pervasion of the effect, non-observation, and so on will be explained later.

original: bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la gtan tshigs 'jug pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la gtan tshigs 'jug pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: The remainder is: ‚ÄúThe reason does not apply to the opposite of the probandum.‚Äù

original: gnod pa can gyi tshad ma ni gang gis bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la 'jug pa'i gtan tshigs la gnod pa yin no //
analyzed: gnod pa can gyi tshad ma ni gang gis bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la 'jug pa'i gtan tshigs la gnod pa yin no //
translated: The invalidating cognition is that which invalidates the reason that applies to the opposite of the probandum.

original: de nye bar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni khyab pa sgrub par byed pa yin @56a * //
analyzed: de nye bar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni khyab pa sgrub par byed pa yin @56a * //
translated: That which is demonstrated by that is the proof of the pervasion.

original: no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de'i gnod pa can gyi tshad ma bstan pa yang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i gnod pa can gyi tshad ma bstan pa yang gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the demonstration of the invalidating cognition of that?

original: gal te dngos po yod pa'am /
analyzed: gal te dngos po yod pa'am /
translated: If it were not momentary, it would not exist at all.

original: byas pa thams cad ces bya bas ni sngar bshad pa'i gtan tshigs gnyis po bstan to //
analyzed: byas pa thams cad ces bya bas ni sngar bshad pa'i gtan tshigs gnyis po bstan to //
translated: By ‚Äúall existent things‚Äù and ‚Äúall that is produced,‚Äù the two reasons previously explained are indicated.

original: skad cig ma re re la 'jig par ma gyur na med pa kho nar 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma re re la 'jig par ma gyur na med pa kho nar 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: If they did not disintegrate moment by moment, they would not exist at all.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: skad cig ma ma yin pa'i don ni rim dang cig car gyis don byed pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma ma yin pa'i don ni rim dang cig car gyis don byed pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not logical for a nonmomentary object to perform a function either gradually or instantaneously.

original: 'di ltar skad cig ma ma yin par mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po ni re zhig rim gyis don byed pa rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar skad cig ma ma yin par mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po ni re zhig rim gyis don byed pa rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, it is not logical that a thing that is not momentary would perform its function gradually.

original: 'bras bu sgrub par rung ba'i rang bzhin rtag tu yod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu sgrub par rung ba'i rang bzhin rtag tu yod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because its nature of being suitable to establish its effect would always exist.

original: de lta ma yin na phyis kyang byed par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na phyis kyang byed par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If it were not so, it would not perform its function later,

original: snga ma'i rang bzhin las ma 'das pa'i phyir snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: snga ma'i rang bzhin las ma 'das pa'i phyir snga ma bzhin no //
translated: because it would not transcend its prior nature, just as before.

original: lhan cig byed pas sgrub par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pas sgrub par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is established by its cooperative conditions,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: thog ma'i bdag nyid kyi khyad par snga ma'i rang bzhin yongs su ma spangs pas lhan cig byed pa la ltos pa ni mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thog ma'i bdag nyid kyi khyad par snga ma'i rang bzhin yongs su ma spangs pas lhan cig byed pa la ltos pa ni mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is illogical that it relies on cooperative conditions without relinquishing its prior nature, which is its original identity.

original: lhan cig byed pa des dang po'i bdag nyid de tha mar khyad par du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa des dang po'i bdag nyid de tha mar khyad par du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that its original identity is transformed into something different by those cooperative conditions,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: lhan cig byed pas byas pa'i khyad par ni de nyid dam gzhan nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pas byas pa'i khyad par ni de nyid dam gzhan nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is illogical that the difference made by cooperative conditions is either that very thing or something else.

original: 'di ltar re zhig bdag nyid kyi khyad par 'di ni de'i bdag nyid du mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'di ltar re zhig bdag nyid kyi khyad par 'di ni de'i bdag nyid du mi 'gyur la /
translated: Thus, the difference of the self would not be of the nature of that.

original: de nyid de las tha mi dad pa'i bdag nyid kyi khyad par bzhin du lhan cig byed pa'i stobs kyis skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid de las tha mi dad pa'i bdag nyid kyi khyad par bzhin du lhan cig byed pa'i stobs kyis skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And, like the difference of the nature of that which is not different from that, it would follow that it arises by the power of the cooperating causes.

original: de ltar khas blangs pas kyang skad cig ma yin pa nyid nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar khas blangs pas kyang skad cig ma yin pa nyid nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: And, by accepting that, momentariness would be destroyed.

original: tha dad pa nyid du de yod pa ma yin no zhe na 'on kyang de nyid las yin yang //
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid du de yod pa ma yin no zhe na 'on kyang de nyid las yin yang //
translated: If you say that it does not exist as different, then, even though it is that,

original: bdag nyid kyi khyad par las 'bras bu skye bas de'i gnas skabs 'di byed par mi nus par thal bar 'gyur ba yang dka' ba thog tu bab pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi khyad par las 'bras bu skye bas de'i gnas skabs 'di byed par mi nus par thal bar 'gyur ba yang dka' ba thog tu bab pa yin no //
translated: it would be difficult to avoid the consequence that the effect arises from the difference of the nature of that, and that it is not able to make this state of that.

original: 'di'i 'brel pa yang ji ltar yin zhes bsam pa'i yul la 'jug par bya ba nyid de /
analyzed: 'di'i 'brel pa yang ji ltar yin zhes bsam pa'i yul la 'jug par bya ba nyid de /
translated: And, how is there a relation? It is just the engagement in the object of thought.

original: 'dir yang khyad par lhan cig byed pa'i stobs kyis byed pa la ltos pa'i phyogs yin na ni skyon med do //
analyzed: 'dir yang khyad par lhan cig byed pa'i stobs kyis byed pa la ltos pa'i phyogs yin na ni skyon med do //
translated: And, here also, if the position is that the effect arises by the power of the cooperating causes, there is no fault.

original: nus pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has the nature of potentiality.

original: gtag @56b bzangs la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la ltos nas 'bras bu skyed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gtag @56b bzangs la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la ltos nas 'bras bu skyed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it produces an effect in dependence on a good blow, etc.,

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: re zhig lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen des khyad par byed nus pa ma yin la /
analyzed: re zhig lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen des khyad par byed nus pa ma yin la /
translated: For, first of all, that cooperative condition is not capable of making a difference.

original: phan mi 'dogs pa'i dngos po la ltos par rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phan mi 'dogs pa'i dngos po la ltos par rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: And it is not reasonable to depend on a thing that does not help,

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / de ltar thams cad du 'di'i 'bras bu skyed par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / de ltar thams cad du 'di'i 'bras bu skyed par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because that would lead to absurd consequences, and because it would follow, absurdly, that it would always produce its effect.

original: gtag bzangs la sogs pa de'i rang bzhin byed pa'am byed pa ni de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtan tshigs thigs par bshad zin pas bshad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gtag bzangs la sogs pa de'i rang bzhin byed pa'am byed pa ni de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtan tshigs thigs par bshad zin pas bshad par mi bya'o //
translated: And because a good blow, etc., is by nature either an agent or an action, and an agent or an action by nature is not capable of being made otherwise.

original: de ltar re zhig rim gyis byed par mi rigs so //
analyzed: de ltar re zhig rim gyis byed par mi rigs so //
translated: Thus, first of all, it is not reasonable that it acts gradually.

original: cig car phyi rol gyi don byed pa la 'jug par nus pa'i rang bzhin gyis byin gyis brlab pa'i yul ma yin te /
analyzed: cig car phyi rol gyi don byed pa la 'jug par nus pa'i rang bzhin gyis byin gyis brlab pa'i yul ma yin te /
translated: It is not the object of the blessing of a nature that is able to engage in the performance of external objects all at once.

original: des na yod pa 'di nyid phyis kyang de'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu skyes pa dang mi 'bras par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na yod pa 'di nyid phyis kyang de'i ngo bo'i 'bras bu skyes pa dang mi 'bras par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, this existent would later be born as the effect of that nature, or it would not be born as the effect.

original: de lta ma yin na skyes ma thag 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na skyes ma thag 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, it would be momentary.

original: skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid khas blangs pas cig car skye ba dmigs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: skad cig ma ma yin pa nyid khas blangs pas cig car skye ba dmigs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Since it is accepted that it is not momentary, it is not observed to be born all at once,

original: rim pa yod pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim pa yod pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because a sequence is seen.

original: des na de ltar skad cig ma ma yin pa'i don 'di ni rim pa 'am cig car 'ga' zhig don byed pa'i cha phra mo tsam yang sgrub par mi nus pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de ltar skad cig ma ma yin pa'i don 'di ni rim pa 'am cig car 'ga' zhig don byed pa'i cha phra mo tsam yang sgrub par mi nus pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, in this way, this non-momentary object is not able to establish even the slightest aspect of performing a function either sequentially or all at once.

original: gal te don byed par mi rigs na ji ltar med par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te don byed par mi rigs na ji ltar med par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is not reasonable for it to perform a function, how could it be nonexistent?

original: don byed par nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: don byed par nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response to that is ‚ÄúIf it is able to perform a function‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: don byed par nus pa gang yin pa de ni 'dir yod pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: don byed par nus pa gang yin pa de ni 'dir yod pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes sbyar ro //
translated: That which is able to perform a function is the characteristic of existence here.

original: de'i phyir don byed par nus pa'i mtshan nyid ni yod pa yin la //
analyzed: de'i phyir don byed par nus pa'i mtshan nyid ni yod pa yin la //
translated: Therefore, the characteristic of being able to perform a function is existence.

original: de las ldog pa ni rnam par gcod pa'o //
analyzed: de las ldog pa ni rnam par gcod pa'o //
translated: The opposite of that is exclusion.

original: phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi sgra ste de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi sgra ste de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúbecause‚Äù is a reason; it means ‚Äúfor that reason.‚Äù

original: don byed par nus pa'i mtshan nyid ni nges par bya zhe na /üîΩthams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: don byed par nus pa'i mtshan nyid ni nges par bya zhe na / thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: If the characteristic of being able to perform a function is to be ascertained,üîΩhe says ‚Äúeverything‚Äù and so on.

original: thams cad la nye bar brjod pa ni bstan te /
analyzed: thams cad la nye bar brjod pa ni bstan te /
translated: Everything is referred to as ‚Äúall.‚Äù

original: 'di nye bar brjod par byas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nye bar brjod par byas pa'o //
translated: This is what is referred to.

original: de dang bral ba ni med pa'o //
analyzed: de dang bral ba ni med pa'o //
translated: Being devoid of that is nonexistence.

original: mtshan nyid de nyid ni brjod du med pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan du bshad do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid de nyid ni brjod du med pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan du bshad do //
translated: That very characteristic is inexpressible, which is explained elsewhere.

original: 'dir yang phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs brjod pa thams cad smos pa ni bum pa la sogs pa skad cig ma nyid du mngon par 'dod pa'i @57a * //
analyzed: 'dir yang phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs brjod pa thams cad smos pa ni bum pa la sogs pa skad cig ma nyid du mngon par 'dod pa'i @57a * //
translated: Here also, ‚Äúbecause‚Äù expresses a reason. ‚ÄúEverything‚Äù refers to all that is expressed. ‚ÄúAll‚Äù refers to pots and so on, which are asserted to be momentary.

original: yul tha dad pa don byed mi nus pa las ldog pa yod pa'i phyir de dag med par rnam par gcod pa yin no //
analyzed: yul tha dad pa don byed mi nus pa las ldog pa yod pa'i phyir de dag med par rnam par gcod pa yin no //
translated: because there is a presence that is the opposite of the different objects that are not able to perform a function.

original: don byed nus pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa yang yod par rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: don byed nus pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa yang yod par rigs so zhe na /
translated: And it is reasonable that there is a characteristic that is not able to perform a function.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not reasonable,

original: yod pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible for it to exist.

original: de med pa yang gzhan du bstan zin pas ma bshad do //
analyzed: de med pa yang gzhan du bstan zin pas ma bshad do //
translated: And its nonexistence has already been explained elsewhere, so it will not be explained here.

original: yod pa yang yod pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa yang yod pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: And it is not existence itself that exists,

original: yod pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not endowed with existence.

original: spyi ni spyi dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes bya ba gzhung lugs yin no //
analyzed: spyi ni spyi dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes bya ba gzhung lugs yin no //
translated: It is the accepted doctrine that a universal is not endowed with a universal.

original: rang nyid de ma yin pa'i phyir don gyi bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin ni rim pa bzhin gzhan dang ldan par bsgrubs kyang de'i rang bzhin dang 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rang nyid de ma yin pa'i phyir don gyi bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin ni rim pa bzhin gzhan dang ldan par bsgrubs kyang de'i rang bzhin dang 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Because it is not itself that, the nature of the essence of an object is not transformed into that, even though it is established as being endowed with another in the same way.

original: shes pa dang sprin gyi dngos po bzhin du pa la sha'i sa me srog la sogs pa'i ngo bo yin no zhes bya ba ci yang ma yin no //
analyzed: shes pa dang sprin gyi dngos po bzhin du pa la sha'i sa me srog la sogs pa'i ngo bo yin no zhes bya ba ci yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that the nature of a thing is like a cloud, and that it is the essence of palasha, fire, life, and so on.

original: nye bar brjod pa'i nus pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid brjod zin pa de yang 'dir nye bar brjod pa smos pa ji ltar yin //
analyzed: nye bar brjod pa'i nus pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid brjod zin pa de yang 'dir nye bar brjod pa smos pa ji ltar yin //
translated: And how can it be said that the definition of a non-entity, which is devoid of all capacity for verbal expression, is here expressed by verbal expression?

original: de nyid brjod par mi bya'o zhe na ni 'dir smras pa ni bden na nus pa thams cad dang bral ba la nus pa 'ga' zhig dang 'brel pa'i sgra yang 'jug pa med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du bstan pa yin no //
