analyzed: de nyid brjod par mi bya'o zhe na ni 'dir smras pa ni bden na nus pa thams cad dang bral ba la nus pa 'ga' zhig dang 'brel pa'i sgra yang 'jug pa med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du bstan pa yin no //
translated: If you say that it cannot be expressed, then we reply that it is true that it is not expressed, but we have shown that it is the object of a negative convention, and that a word that is related to some capacity is applied to it.

original: ming don gyi rjes su 'brangs pa bsgrub par bya ba 'di bshad pa yin no zhes bya bar rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: ming don gyi rjes su 'brangs pa bsgrub par bya ba 'di bshad pa yin no zhes bya bar rtogs par bya'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the probandum that follows from the meaning of the name.

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la gtan tshigs de la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma bstan par ma byas na cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la gtan tshigs de la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma bstan par ma byas na cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What if the reason is not shown to be invalidated with respect to the opposite of the probandum?

original: bshad pa de lta na bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma nye bar bstan pa na ldog pa la the tshom za bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bshad pa de lta na bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma nye bar bstan pa na ldog pa la the tshom za bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The explanation is as follows: When a valid cognition that contradicts the opposite of the probandum is demonstrated, there is doubt about the reversal.

original: de gang la the tshom za ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang la the tshom za ba yin zhe na /
translated: What is it that is doubted?

original: de yod pa 'am byas pa 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de yod pa 'am byas pa 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The existence or production of that is what is doubted.

original: pa'i phyogs la gtan tshigs 'jug pa ma dmigs na /
analyzed: pa'i phyogs la gtan tshigs 'jug pa ma dmigs na /
translated: When the application of the reason is not observed in the similar instances,

original: de ji ltar mi ldog pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar mi ldog pa yin zhe na /
translated: how can it be irreversible?

original: gtan tshigs 'jug pa ma mthong du zin kyang zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'jug pa ma mthong du zin kyang zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Even if the application of the reason is not seen,

original: gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang yin zhe na /
translated: what is it?

original: bsgrub bya las bzlog pa las zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya las bzlog pa las zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: The opposite of the probandum is what is meant.

original: de ltar na ni bzlog pa ji ltar 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de ltar na ni bzlog pa ji ltar 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In that case, how can there be no contradiction in the reversal?

original: sgrub par byed pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang zhes lhag ma'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang zhes lhag ma'o //
translated: The opposite of the probandum is what is meant.

original: 'dir dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The intended meaning here is as follows.

original: gal te sgrub par @57b byed pa dang bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la phan tshun grub pa yin na ni ma mthong ba tsam gyis ldog pa la the tshom mi za bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te sgrub par @57b byed pa dang bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la phan tshun grub pa yin na ni ma mthong ba tsam gyis ldog pa la the tshom mi za bar 'gyur na /
translated: If the opposite of the probandum and the probans were established by mutual dependence, then one would not doubt the opposite of the non-perception.

original: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma ma bstan par de nyid mi 'grub po //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma ma bstan par de nyid mi 'grub po //
translated: But that is not established without showing a valid cognition that contradicts it.

original: gal te 'di'i the tshom las log na de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di'i the tshom las log na de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If one turns away from this doubt, what would happen?

original: bshad pa de las bzlog pa la the tshom za ba'i ma nges par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bshad pa de las bzlog pa la the tshom za ba'i ma nges par 'gyur te /
translated: It would be an inconclusive reason, because of doubt about the opposite of that.

original: gtan tshigs ltar na sang ba'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar na sang ba'o //
translated: It is like a reason.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩldog pa ni bsgrub par bya ba med pa la gtan tshigs med pa'i mtshan nyid la the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / ldog pa ni bsgrub par bya ba med pa la gtan tshigs med pa'i mtshan nyid la the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Why?üîΩBecause of doubt about the opposite of the probandum, which is the absence of the reason.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las bzlog pa la the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las bzlog pa la the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is a fallacious reason, because of doubt about the opposite of the similar instance.

original: ma mthong bas kyang the tshom cis mi ldog ji srid du ma mthong ba des dngos po med pa bsgrub par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ma mthong bas kyang the tshom cis mi ldog ji srid du ma mthong ba des dngos po med pa bsgrub par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you do not see it, why do you not stop doubting?üîΩAs long as you do not see it, you are proving that it does not exist.

original: ma mthong ba tsam gyis ldog pa ma yin te zhes bya bas smos te /
analyzed: ma mthong ba tsam gyis ldog pa ma yin te zhes bya bas smos te /
translated: We reply: It is not that you stop doubting just because you do not see something.

original: bsgrub par bya ba med pa'i grub pa'i gtan tshigs las 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba med pa'i grub pa'i gtan tshigs las 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The point is that the reason is established without the probandum.

original: kyang gi sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
analyzed: kyang gi sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
translated: The word ‚Äújust‚Äù means ‚Äúonly.‚Äù

original: tsam smos pa ni dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa las ma dmigs pa rnams par gcod pa'i don to //
analyzed: tsam smos pa ni dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa las ma dmigs pa rnams par gcod pa'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äújust‚Äù is used to exclude the non-observation of something that is perceptible.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: yul dang dus dang rang bzhin gyis bskal pas mi gsal ba'i don rnams so //
analyzed: yul dang dus dang rang bzhin gyis bskal pas mi gsal ba'i don rnams so //
translated: It is because the objects are not manifest due to being separated by place, time, and nature.

original: rgya'i yul dang shing rta bcu pa dang / sha za ba la sogs pa ma mthong ba gang yin pa de ni med pa sgrub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rgya'i yul dang shing rta bcu pa dang / sha za ba la sogs pa ma mthong ba gang yin pa de ni med pa sgrub pa ma yin no //
translated: The non-observation of something like a Chinese pot, a ten-spoked wheel, or a flesh-eater does not prove that it does not exist.

original: gang gis med pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis med pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: What does not prove that it does not exist?

original: bskal pa dag gi skabs yin pa'i phyir zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: bskal pa dag gi skabs yin pa'i phyir zhes khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that this is because the occasion is eons.

original: 'o na don mtha' dag la khyab pa'i shes pa phul du byung ba yang dag par mnyes pa'i gzigs pas bskal ba'i don med pa yang sgrub par mdzad na /
analyzed: 'o na don mtha' dag la khyab pa'i shes pa phul du byung ba yang dag par mnyes pa'i gzigs pas bskal ba'i don med pa yang sgrub par mdzad na /
translated: If the Blessed One, with the vision of perfect delight, which is knowledge that pervades all objects, establishes the nonexistence of the object of an eon,

original: de ci'i phyir de skad bshad ce na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir de skad bshad ce na /
translated: why is it said that way?

original: thams cad gzigs pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: thams cad gzigs pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúHe is not an omniscient one.‚Äù

original: 'di thams cad gzigs pa'i dang tshul can yin pa de'i phyir dgag pa'i bsdu ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di thams cad gzigs pa'i dang tshul can yin pa de'i phyir dgag pa'i bsdu ba yin no //
translated: Because he is not an omniscient one, he is included in the negation.

original: ma mthong ba de yang med pa sgrub par byed pa ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ma mthong ba de yang med pa sgrub par byed pa ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is that nonseeing not an establishment of nonexistence?

original: tshu rol mthong ba ni skyes bu'o //
analyzed: tshu rol mthong ba ni skyes bu'o //
translated: The one who sees a limited extent is a person.

original: yod du zin kyang bskal pa'i don 'ga' zhig ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod du zin kyang bskal pa'i don 'ga' zhig ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if he exists, he does not see the object of an eon.

original: 'di snyam du sems pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du sems pa yin te /
translated: He thinks this:

original: thams cad gzigs pa ma yin pa'i mthong bas dngos po ma lus pa @58a * //
analyzed: thams cad gzigs pa ma yin pa'i mthong bas dngos po ma lus pa @58a * //
translated: The seeing of one who is not omniscient does not pervade all things.

original: yod pa khyab pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa khyab pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that existence is pervaded by it.

original: gang gis de ldog par gyur pa'i don ni shing ldog pa'i sha pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gang gis de ldog par gyur pa'i don ni shing ldog pa'i sha pa bzhin no //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthat which stops it‚Äù is like the axe that stops the tree.

original: tha dad pa'i phyir gang mi ldog na du ba ldog pa bzhin du /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i phyir gang mi ldog na du ba ldog pa bzhin du /
translated: Because they are different, if one does not stop, the other does not stop, like smoke.

original: de yang de'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang de'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is not the cause of that,

original: de med kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it exists even when it does not exist.

original: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚Äú Valid cognition that contradicts‚Äù and so on.

original: 'dir kha cig phyogs snga ma dgod pa ni gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma ni ci zhig yin /
analyzed: 'dir kha cig phyogs snga ma dgod pa ni gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma ni ci zhig yin /
translated: Here, someone presents the opponent‚Äôs position: ‚ÄúWhat is the valid cognition that contradicts?

original: gang nye bar bstan pas rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa ldog pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang nye bar bstan pas rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa ldog pa yin zhe na /
translated: By what is taught, the pervasion of the root reason is reversed.‚Äù

original: gnod par byed pa yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gnod par byed pa yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚Äú Contradiction‚Äù and so on is stated.

original: de dag ji ltar 'dir khyab pa sgrub pa yin la /
analyzed: de dag ji ltar 'dir khyab pa sgrub pa yin la /
translated: How are they established here as the pervasion?

original: bzlog pa la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bzlog pa la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of the valid cognition that contradicts the opposite is:

original: gal te yod pa'am byas pa thams cad skad cig ma re re la 'jig par ma gyur na zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di nyid don bstan zin pas zlos pa'i skyon du mi 'gyur ba de nyid 'dir bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: gal te yod pa'am byas pa thams cad skad cig ma re re la 'jig par ma gyur na zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di nyid don bstan zin pas zlos pa'i skyon du mi 'gyur ba de nyid 'dir bsam par bya ste /
translated: If all that exists or is produced did not disintegrate moment by moment, then this very statement ‚ÄúIf all that exists or is produced did not disintegrate moment by moment‚Äù would be redundant.

original: gzhan gyi skyon brjod pa ni chog go //
analyzed: gzhan gyi skyon brjod pa ni chog go //
translated: Enough of stating the faults of others!

original: phyogs snga ma ni gzhan yin te /
analyzed: phyogs snga ma ni gzhan yin te /
translated: The opponent‚Äôs position is different.

original: de lta na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma yod pa yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di la'ang ji ltar skyon med pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma yod pa yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di la'ang ji ltar skyon med pa yin zhe na /
translated: In that case, how could the statement ‚ÄúThere is a valid cognition that contradicts that‚Äù be faultless?

original: bshad pa gnod pa can gyi tshad ma la yang 'jug pa la nus pa med pa yin zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: bshad pa gnod pa can gyi tshad ma la yang 'jug pa la nus pa med pa yin zhes sbyar ro //
translated: The response is that even a valid cognition that contradicts it is powerless to engage it.

original: med pa'i mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba cig ji ltar rab tu 'jug pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: med pa'i mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba cig ji ltar rab tu 'jug pa yin zhe na /
translated: What is the character of nonexistence? How does it engage?

original: gang gi don la rim pa dang cig car 'brel ba med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba kha bskang ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi don la rim pa dang cig car 'brel ba med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba kha bskang ba'o //
translated: The response is that it is not the case that it is not related to the object in a sequential or simultaneous manner.

original: de ni 'ga' zhig gi 'bras bu la nus pa med pa ste /
analyzed: de ni 'ga' zhig gi 'bras bu la nus pa med pa ste /
translated: It is that it is powerless with regard to the result of some.

original: dper na nam mkha' dang padmo bzhin no zhes bya ba'i dpe kha bskang ba'o //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha' dang padmo bzhin no zhes bya ba'i dpe kha bskang ba'o //
translated: For example, like space and a lotus.

original: skad cig ma yin pa yod pa de ni rim dang cig car dag gi don byed pa rim pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ltar rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma yin pa yod pa de ni rim dang cig car dag gi don byed pa rim pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ltar rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is engaged in the activity of the object in sequence and simultaneously, and not in sequence, when it exists as momentary.

original: de las ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de las ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the result of that?

original: bshad pa de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i don to //
analyzed: bshad pa de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i don to //
translated: The statement ‚Äúfor that reason‚Äù has the meaning of cause.

original: gang gis de la rab tu 'jug pa'i nus pa med pa ni mtshan nyid med pa na 'dren par byed do //
analyzed: gang gis de la rab tu 'jug pa'i nus pa med pa ni mtshan nyid med pa na 'dren par byed do //
translated: That which lacks the ability to engage in that is characterized as not leading.

original: gang yod pa'am byas pa de ni mi rtag pa kho na yin no zhes bya bar 'grub bo //
analyzed: gang yod pa'am byas pa de ni mi rtag pa kho na yin no zhes bya bar 'grub bo //
translated: That which exists or is produced is only impermanent. This is established.

original: de ldan yang ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ldan yang ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is established by that possession?

original: 'di tsam gyis kyang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'di tsam gyis kyang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The statement ‚Äúby this alone‚Äù means

original: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma bstan pa tsam gyis sgrub par byed pa'i chos tsam gyis rjes su 'gro ba yin te zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma bstan pa tsam gyis sgrub par byed pa'i chos tsam gyis rjes su 'gro ba yin te zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: by the mere teaching of the invalidating valid cognition, by the mere property to be established, there is pervasion. This is the connection.

original: gang yin @58b zhe na /
analyzed: gang yin @58b zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúthe property to be established,‚Äù

original: 'di ni byed pa po drug pa yin no zhes bya bar bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byed pa po drug pa yin no zhes bya bar bstan par bya'o //
translated: and this is the sixth function.

original: des na rgyu gzhan gyi byed pa la mi ltos par bsgrub par bya ba'i sgrub par byed pa rjes su 'gro bar sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba dag gi don du gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rgyu gzhan gyi byed pa la mi ltos par bsgrub par bya ba'i sgrub par byed pa rjes su 'gro bar sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba dag gi don du gnas pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the meaning of the words is that the proof is established as invariably concomitant with the property to be established, without regard to the function of another cause.

original: sgrub par phyed pa'i chos can rjes su 'gro ba yin gyi bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ni de ltar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par phyed pa'i chos can rjes su 'gro ba yin gyi bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ni de ltar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: The property of the subject is invariably concomitant, but the property to be established is not so.

original: 'di ltar gtan tshigs ni bsgrub par bya ba kho na la med na mi 'byung ba dang skye ba yin gyi gtan tshigs la la ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar gtan tshigs ni bsgrub par bya ba kho na la med na mi 'byung ba dang skye ba yin gyi gtan tshigs la la ma yin te /
translated: Thus, the reason is invariably concomitant with and produced by the property to be established, but not with any other reason,

original: gtan tshigs go bar byed par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs go bar byed par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reason would not be understood.

original: de la yon tan ci zhig 'thob pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la yon tan ci zhig 'thob pa yin zhe na /
translated: What good quality is obtained by this?

original: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The definition of the reason based on nature is established.

original: de tsam gyis zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de tsam gyis zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The word only is to be supplied.

original: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid de ni yod pa tsam gyi rjes su 'gro bas rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi bdag nyid yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid de ni yod pa tsam gyi rjes su 'gro bas rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi bdag nyid yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: The definition of an essential property reason is that it is an essential property reason because it is pervaded by mere existence.

original: gal te gnod pa can gyi tshad ma nye bar bstan pas gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa grub pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te gnod pa can gyi tshad ma nye bar bstan pas gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa grub pa yin no //
translated: If the pervasion of the reason is established by the presentation of a contradictory valid cognition,üîΩthen there would be an infinite regress.

original: de lta na de ni thug pa med par 'gyur ba yin no snyam pa'i dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir phyogs snga ma bkod pa ni /üîΩ'dir yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de lta na de ni thug pa med par 'gyur ba yin no snyam pa'i dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir phyogs snga ma bkod pa ni / 'dir yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to dispel this doubt, the opponent's position is stated:

original: 'dir yang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma ni khyed ma mthong ba tshad ma yin na /
analyzed: 'dir yang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma ni khyed ma mthong ba tshad ma yin na /
translated: Here also, if the non-perception of a contradictory object is a valid cognition,

original: ma mthong ba tsam gyis gtan tshigs kyi ldog pa nges pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyu 'dis so //
analyzed: ma mthong ba tsam gyis gtan tshigs kyi ldog pa nges pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyu 'dis so //
translated: then the reversal of the reason is not ascertained by mere non-perception. This is the reason.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs 'ba' zhig ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs 'ba' zhig ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word also means that it is not only the original reason.

original: gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: sngar gyi rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs yang khyab pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: sngar gyi rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs yang khyab pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The original reason is also not pervaded.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: rim dang cig car mi rigs pa nyid la nus pa med pas khyab pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim dang cig car mi rigs pa nyid la nus pa med pas khyab pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it is not logical for something to be sequential or simultaneous, it is not possible to establish a pervasion.

original: 'di ltar gal te mthong ba tsam gyis ldog pa nges pa med pa de lta na rim dang cig car gyis mi rigs par gyur kyang yod pa'i mtshan nyid don byed nus par gyur ba la gal ba ci zhig yod snyam pas 'di nyid la gnod par byed
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te mthong ba tsam gyis ldog pa nges pa med pa de lta na rim dang cig car gyis mi rigs par gyur kyang yod pa'i mtshan nyid don byed nus par gyur ba la gal ba ci zhig yod snyam pas 'di nyid la gnod par byed
translated: In this way, if there is no ascertainment of the reverse pervasion by mere perception, then even if it is not logical for something to be sequential or simultaneous, what is the harm in the definition of existence being the ability to perform a function?

original: pa'i tshad mas khyab pa mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: pa'i tshad mas khyab pa mi 'grub bo //
translated: One might think this, but the valid knowledge that would contradict that does not establish a pervasion.

original: brgya la 'di ma grub kyang 'di'i stobs kyis rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa grub par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: brgya la 'di ma grub kyang 'di'i stobs kyis rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa grub par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Even if that is not established, the pervasion of the original reason would be established by the power of that.

original: sngar gyi gtan tshigs la khyab pa med par 'gyur ro zhes kha bskang ba'o //
analyzed: sngar gyi gtan tshigs la khyab pa med par 'gyur ro zhes kha bskang ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe original reason is not pervaded‚Äù is added.

original: 'di ltar rang nyid @59a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar rang nyid @59a * //
translated: In this way, the pervasion of the original reason is not established.

original: tshad ma ma yin yang gnod par byed pa'i tshad mar gyur pa'i tshad ma gzhan du brtag par bya ba mi nus te /
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin yang gnod par byed pa'i tshad mar gyur pa'i tshad ma gzhan du brtag par bya ba mi nus te /
translated: But it is not possible to imagine another valid cognition that is a counter-cogitator, even though it is not a valid cognition.

original: tshad mar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad mar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow that it is a valid cognition.

original: gal te de ltar yin pa de lta na gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma 'di la gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma gzhan gyis khyab par nges pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin pa de lta na gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma 'di la gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma gzhan gyis khyab par nges pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is so, then this counter-cogitator valid cognition is ascertained to be pervaded by another counter-cogitator valid cognition.

original: 'di ltar rang nyid tshad ma ma yin yang de 'di la yang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'di ltar rang nyid tshad ma ma yin yang de 'di la yang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Even though it is not itself a valid cognition, it is said that ‚Äúit is so with respect to this.‚Äù

original: yang zhes bya ba smos pa ni rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs 'ga' zhig yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba smos pa ni rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs 'ga' zhig yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúso‚Äù indicates that there is some basic reason.

original: sgrub par byed pa gzhan yang nye bar sbyor na ni thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa gzhan yang nye bar sbyor na ni thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If another proof is applied, there would be an infinite regress.

original: de lta na yang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma gang yin pa des khyab pa sgrub pa'i don du gnod pa can gyi tshad ma brjod do //
analyzed: de lta na yang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma gang yin pa des khyab pa sgrub pa'i don du gnod pa can gyi tshad ma brjod do //
translated: Even so, the counter-cogitator valid cognition that is a counter-cogitator valid cognition is stated for the purpose of establishing the pervasion.

original: de la yang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma gzhan gyis khyab pa sgrub pa yin na gang gi phyir de yang rang nyid tshad ma ma yin na cig shos kyi tshad mar byed par nus pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: de la yang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma gzhan gyis khyab pa sgrub pa yin na gang gi phyir de yang rang nyid tshad ma ma yin na cig shos kyi tshad mar byed par nus pa ma yin pas /
translated: Moreover, if another valid cognition is to be established as the pervasion of that, then because that also is not a valid cognition itself, it is not able to make the other a valid cognition.

original: de la yang de skad brjod par mi nus so //
analyzed: de la yang de skad brjod par mi nus so //
translated: Therefore, it is not possible to say that about it.

original: de yang gzhan gyis khyab pa grub po zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gzhan gyis khyab pa grub po zhe na /
translated: If you say that the other one establishes the pervasion,

original: gal te de lta na 'di nyid la 'jug na 'dir yang thug pa med pa de bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ro //üîΩde skad du phyogs snga ma brjod nas da ni de bsal ba'i phyir ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te de lta na 'di nyid la 'jug na 'dir yang thug pa med pa de bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ro // de skad du phyogs snga ma brjod nas da ni de bsal ba'i phyir ma yin te /
translated: then if it is like that, when it engages this, it would follow that there is an infinite regress here.

original: med pa sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: med pa sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Having stated the opponent‚Äôs position, now, in order to refute it, he says, ‚ÄúIt is not the case that a non-existent . . .‚Äù and so on.

original: ldog pa sgrub par byed pa nyid kyis zhes bya bas kha ba skad do //
analyzed: ldog pa sgrub par byed pa nyid kyis zhes bya bas kha ba skad do //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it is the establishment of the absence‚Äù means ‚Äúbecause it is the establishment of the absence.‚Äù

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being shown.

original: thams cad du ma mthong pas 'gog pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad du ma mthong pas 'gog pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that everything is refuted because it is not seen.

original: ldog pa nges pa ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pas bkag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldog pa nges pa ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pas bkag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The ascertainment of the absence is because the pervasion is refuted by the non-observation of the pervader.

original: 'on kyang ma mthong ba tsam gyis yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang ma mthong ba tsam gyis yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is merely not seeing,

original: bshad pa gang dang gang ma mthong bas ldog pa la med par bsgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa gang dang gang ma mthong bas ldog pa la med par bsgrub pa yin te /
translated: we reply: What is the point of proving nonexistence by not seeing something?

original: gang gis yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis yin zhe na /
translated: By what?

original: gtan tshigs kyis so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyis so //
translated: By a reason.

original: gang la zhe na /
analyzed: gang la zhe na /
translated: Where?

original: bsgrub bya la bzlog pa la'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya la bzlog pa la'o //
translated: In the probandum, in the opposite of that.

original: des na ma mthong ba'i gtan tshigs 'di ni gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma brjod do //
analyzed: des na ma mthong ba'i gtan tshigs 'di ni gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma brjod do //
translated: Therefore, this reason of nonseeing is stated as a valid refutation.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: 'gal pa nye bar gzhag pa'i phyir 'di la zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'gal pa nye bar gzhag pa'i phyir 'di la zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Because it is the presentation of a contradiction.

original: 'di ltar rim dang cig car mi rigs pa gang yin pa de ni don byed par nus pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar rim dang cig car mi rigs pa gang yin pa de ni don byed par nus pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin te /
translated: Thus, that which is not reasonable in terms of sequence or simultaneity does not have the characteristic of being able to perform a function,

original: dper na mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: just as, for example, the son of a barren woman does not.

original: de lta na skad cig ma ma yin pa rnams kyang rim pa dang cig car @59b don byed par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na skad cig ma ma yin pa rnams kyang rim pa dang cig car @59b don byed par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In that case, even things that are not momentary are not reasonable in terms of performing a function in sequence or in a single moment.

original: rim dang rim ma yin pas don byed pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: rim dang rim ma yin pas don byed pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: The phrase because it is not tenable that a single entity performs two different actions is a nonobservation of a pervader.üîΩThe phrase because of the contradiction with the reason existence

original: yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa med pa ni gnyen por gnod pa can gyi tshad mar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa med pa ni gnyen por gnod pa can gyi tshad mar brjod pa yin no //
translated: is a statement of a countering valid cognition that undermines the opposite of the probandum.

original: de bzhin du byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la yang ci rigs par sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la yang ci rigs par sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase because of the performance of an action should be applied in the same way, as appropriate.

original: ci'i 'gal ba'i gnyen por de 'di'i gnod pa can gyi tshad mar brjod ce na /
analyzed: ci'i 'gal ba'i gnyen por de 'di'i gnod pa can gyi tshad mar brjod ce na /
translated: Why is the contradiction with the reason existence a countering valid cognition that undermines the opposite of the probandum?

original: de lta na gtan tshigs zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de lta na gtan tshigs zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In response to this, the text says because of the reason existence.

original: yod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //üîΩbsgrub par bya ba med pa de la yod pa ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do // bsgrub par bya ba med pa de la yod pa ma grub pa'o //
translated: The phrase because of the reason existence refers to the characteristic of existence and so on.üîΩThe phrase the nonexistence of the probandum refers to the nonestablishment of existence.

original: gal te de la bsgrub par bya ba nyid med par brjod pa'i gsal bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: gal te de la bsgrub par bya ba nyid med par brjod pa'i gsal bar byas pa'o //
translated: If it is said that the probandum does not exist, this is a clarification.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: rang dang 'gal bas so //
analyzed: rang dang 'gal bas so //
translated: By its opposite.

original: rang dang 'gal ba yang med pa la sogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang dang 'gal ba yang med pa la sogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not contradictory to itself.

original: gang dang ldan pas she na /
analyzed: gang dang ldan pas she na /
translated: With what is it endowed?

original: tshad ma dang ldan pa ste tshad ma dang 'brel bas so //
analyzed: tshad ma dang ldan pa ste tshad ma dang 'brel bas so //
translated: With a valid cognition, because it is connected with a valid cognition.

original: ci'i phyir / de ltar de la med pa 'di sgrub pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir / de ltar de la med pa 'di sgrub pa yin zhe na /
translated: Why is this non-existence established in that way?

original: bshad pa rnam pa gzhan du de la bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la'o //
analyzed: bshad pa rnam pa gzhan du de la bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la'o //
translated: The explanation is: in the opposite of what is to be established.

original: gtan tshigs 'dis gnod pa can med par ma grub na /üîΩyod pa yang yin /
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'dis gnod pa can med par ma grub na / yod pa yang yin /
translated: If this reason is not established as non-existent,üîΩthen there is doubt that it exists

original: rtag pa yang yin no zhes bya ba'i the tshom za ba ni bzlog par dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa yang yin no zhes bya ba'i the tshom za ba ni bzlog par dka' ba yin no //
translated: and is permanent, and it is difficult to reverse.

original: lhag ma'o // sdug bsngal gyis bzlog dgos pa'i phyir bzlog par dka' ba yin te /
analyzed: lhag ma'o // sdug bsngal gyis bzlog dgos pa'i phyir bzlog par dka' ba yin te /
translated: The rest is difficult to reverse because it must be reversed by suffering.

original: dgag par dka' ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dgag par dka' ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is difficult to negate.

original: gnod pa can smos pa ni 'dir 'gal ba nye bar gnas pa 'gran zla'i tshad ma gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnod pa can smos pa ni 'dir 'gal ba nye bar gnas pa 'gran zla'i tshad ma gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The mention of the contradictory here should be understood as the apprehended contradictory valid cognition.üîΩA contradictory valid cognition

original: gnod pa can gyi tshad ma 'am /
analyzed: gnod pa can gyi tshad ma 'am /
translated: Or, it is a valid cognition that is a harm-doer.üîΩüîΩ

original: 'gran zla'i gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: 'gran zla'i gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: Contradiction to a rival reason.

original: 'o na ni bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la mi dmigs pas bzlog pa nges pas ldog pa the tshom med par 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'o na ni bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la mi dmigs pas bzlog pa nges pas ldog pa the tshom med par 'gyur na /
translated: But if the non-observation of the object of the probandum is ascertained in the contrary of the probandum, then the contrary is ascertained, and the reversal is without doubt.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na gnod pa can ma grub na the tshom za ba ni bzlog par dka' ba'o zhes de skad du ci'i phyir brjod pa yin zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na gnod pa can ma grub na the tshom za ba ni bzlog par dka' ba'o zhes de skad du ci'i phyir brjod pa yin zhes dogs pa la /
translated: But if it is otherwise, then if the counter-correlate is not established, the doubt is hard to reverse. Why is it said in that way?

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: No, he says.

original: dmigs pa thams cad kyi gnod pa can gyis 'gegs par mi rigs so zhes bya ba kha bskang ba'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa thams cad kyi gnod pa can gyis 'gegs par mi rigs so zhes bya ba kha bskang ba'o //
translated: It is not right to block all observations with a counter-correlate. That is the completion of the sentence.

original: gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: dngos po'i ste yod pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po'i ste yod pa'o //
translated: The existence of the object.

original: bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la gtan tshigs zhes bya ba lhag ma ste /üîΩ'di nyid skabs kyis go @60a * //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa la gtan tshigs zhes bya ba lhag ma ste / 'di nyid skabs kyis go @60a * //
translated: The reason in the contrary of the probandum is the remainder.

original: bar bya ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: bar bya ba kho na yin no //
translated: This itself is to be understood by the context.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being shown.

original: bsgrub par bya ba med pa la khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs lhan cig pas gnod pa yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba med pa la khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs lhan cig pas gnod pa yin te /
translated: The reason of nonobservation of a pervader is undermined by a simultaneous reason that proves the opposite of the probandum.

original: dper nam mthong ba tsam gyis ldog pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dper nam mthong ba tsam gyis ldog pa ma yin te /
translated: For example, it is not the case that mere seeing is the opposite of nonseeing.

original: bskal ba dag las thams cad gzigs pa ma yin pa'i ma mthong bas med pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bskal ba dag las thams cad gzigs pa ma yin pa'i ma mthong bas med pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: Because of not seeing all things for eons, it is not the case that nonseeing proves nonexistence.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa gzhan du de la gnod pa tsam gyis tshad ma grub na the tshom za ba ni bzlog par dka'o zhes bya ba legs par bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa gzhan du de la gnod pa tsam gyis tshad ma grub na the tshom za ba ni bzlog par dka'o zhes bya ba legs par bshad pa yin te /
translated: As explained above, therefore, it is well said that if valid knowledge is established by mere contradiction of it in another aspect, it is difficult to reverse doubt.

original: 'dis ni sngar bshad pa dran par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don dang 'di ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni sngar bshad pa dran par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don dang 'di ldan pa yin no //
translated: This means that one should recall what was explained above.

original: dngos po med pa sgrub pa ni ma mthong ba tsam gyis dgag pa ma yin par bshad zin to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa sgrub pa ni ma mthong ba tsam gyis dgag pa ma yin par bshad zin to //
translated: It has already been explained that the proof of nonexistence is not a negation by mere nonseeing.

original: ci khyab par 'dis dngos po med pa sgrub par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: ci khyab par 'dis dngos po med pa sgrub par byed pa yin na /
translated: If this is a proof of nonexistence by a pervader,

original: ji snyed pa de snyed kyis ma mthong ba thams cad med par sgrub par byed pa la zhes de la kha cig dogs pa la /
analyzed: ji snyed pa de snyed kyis ma mthong ba thams cad med par sgrub par byed pa la zhes de la kha cig dogs pa la /
translated: In response to that, some have doubts.

original: de'i dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de'i dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: In order to eliminate their doubts, he says not because of that and so on.

original: de la yang gi sgra ni zhes bya bar bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: de la yang gi sgra ni zhes bya bar bshad pa yin te /
translated: Here the word and is explained as or.

original: de ni nges par gzung bar bshad pa'i phyir snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni nges par gzung bar bshad pa'i phyir snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Because it is explained as a particle of inclusion, it is like the previous one.

original: rim dang rim ma yin pa ni mi rigs pas nus pa med pa la khyab pa gnod pa can gyi tshad mas mi 'grub pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rim dang rim ma yin pa ni mi rigs pas nus pa med pa la khyab pa gnod pa can gyi tshad mas mi 'grub pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not the case that the valid cognition that contradicts the pervasion of not being possible is not established by the reason of not being possible in terms of order and disorder?

original: de rang nyid kyi khyab pa mi 'grub na yod pa gzhan dang yod pa gtan tshigs nyid ji ltar khyab pa sgrub par nus /
analyzed: de rang nyid kyi khyab pa mi 'grub na yod pa gzhan dang yod pa gtan tshigs nyid ji ltar khyab pa sgrub par nus /
translated: If that pervasion is not established by itself, how can the existence of something else and existence be established as the pervasion of the reason?

original: gal te tshad ma gzhan gyis de la khyab pa sgrub pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te tshad ma gzhan gyis de la khyab pa sgrub pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said, The pervasion is established by another valid cognition,

original: de ltar ni mi grub pas de nyid thug pa med pa'i skyon 'di dang 'brel bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i dgos pa thams cad la /
analyzed: de ltar ni mi grub pas de nyid thug pa med pa'i skyon 'di dang 'brel bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i dgos pa thams cad la /
translated: Since that is not established, this fault of infinite regress would be connected to that.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In response to that, he says, ‚ÄúThere, etc.‚Äù

original: de la zhes bya ba'i ngag nye bar bkod pa'i don to //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba'i ngag nye bar bkod pa'i don to //
translated: There is the meaning of the statement ‚Äúthere.‚Äù

original: nus pa ni gang dngos po'i don to mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: nus pa ni gang dngos po'i don to mtshan nyid do //
translated: Potency is the characteristic of the object of a thing.

original: de rim dang cig car gyi khyab pa grub pa yin te /
analyzed: de rim dang cig car gyi khyab pa grub pa yin te /
translated: That is established as the pervasion of sequential and nonsequential.

original: nus pa gang yin pa de la rim dang cig car gyi don byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rnam pas so //
analyzed: nus pa gang yin pa de la rim dang cig car gyi don byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rnam pas so //
translated: Whatever is potency, that is the object of sequential and nonsequential activity.

original: de nyid ci'i phyir zhe na bshad pa rnam pa gzhan ni med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ci'i phyir zhe na bshad pa rnam pa gzhan ni med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Why is that? Because there is no other mode.

original: gang gi phyir rim dang rim ma yin pa las tha dad pa'i rnam pa gzhan ni med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rim dang rim ma yin pa las tha dad pa'i rnam pa gzhan ni med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no other mode apart from sequential and nonsequential.

original: de'i phyir gang la yod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don byed nus pa de la @60b rim dang rim ma yin pas nges par don byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang la yod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don byed nus pa de la @60b rim dang rim ma yin pas nges par don byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, that which has the characteristic of the object of potency will definitely perform its function sequentially and nonsequentially.

original: 'o na rim dang rim ma yin pa dag las phung po gzhan med pas de nyid ji ltar 'grub ce na /
analyzed: 'o na rim dang rim ma yin pa dag las phung po gzhan med pas de nyid ji ltar 'grub ce na /
translated: But since there is no third category other than gradual and non-gradual, how can that be established?

original: rim dang rim ma yin pa phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir phung po gsum pa spangs pa yin te /
analyzed: rim dang rim ma yin pa phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir phung po gsum pa spangs pa yin te /
translated: We say that a third category is excluded because gradual and non-gradual are characteristics that are mutually exclusive.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa bzhin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa bzhin no zhes brjod do //
translated: It is like an existent and a non-existent.

original: de ltar khyed la yang yod pa rim dang cig car gyi dngos po kho na yin no zhes bya ba ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed la yang yod pa rim dang cig car gyi dngos po kho na yin no zhes bya ba ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: In the same way, for you, existence is only gradual and non-gradual.

original: gzhan du gyur pa gang zhig yin /
analyzed: gzhan du gyur pa gang zhig yin /
translated: What is that which is transformed?

original: gzhan zhig yod do zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan zhig yod do zhe na /
translated: If you say that it exists,

original: de lta na don med pa'i g-yang sa chen pos don ci zhig yod /
analyzed: de lta na don med pa'i g-yang sa chen pos don ci zhig yod /
translated: then what is the point of this great abyss of meaninglessness?

original: gal te 'di'i ngo bo ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar khyod kyis brjod par mi nus so //
analyzed: gal te 'di'i ngo bo ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar khyod kyis brjod par mi nus so //
translated: If you say that its nature is this, you cannot express it.

original: gal te nus pa rim dang rim ma yin par rig pa'i khyab pa grub pa de lta na ci zhig 'grub ce na /
analyzed: gal te nus pa rim dang rim ma yin par rig pa'i khyab pa grub pa de lta na ci zhig 'grub ce na /
translated: If you can express it, then what is established by the pervasion of gradual and non-gradual knowledge?

original: bshad pa de'i phyir nus pa ni rim dang rim ma yin par rigs pas khyab pas /
analyzed: bshad pa de'i phyir nus pa ni rim dang rim ma yin par rigs pas khyab pas /
translated: Because of that explanation, potency is pervaded by sequential and nonsequential reasoning.

original: khyab par byed pa'i chos rim dang rim ma yin par rigs pa ma yin pas skad cig ma ma yin par khas blangs pa'i nus pa la gnod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bsal to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa'i chos rim dang rim ma yin par rigs pa ma yin pas skad cig ma ma yin par khas blangs pa'i nus pa la gnod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bsal to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since the pervading property is not reasonable in terms of sequential and nonsequential reasoning, the assertion that potency is not momentary is refuted.

original: 'di ltar rim dang rim ma yin pa'i rigs pa de ni nus pa'i khyab par byed pa yin pas de yang bzlog na gdon mi za bar nus pa spangs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar rim dang rim ma yin pa'i rigs pa de ni nus pa'i khyab par byed pa yin pas de yang bzlog na gdon mi za bar nus pa spangs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Thus, since sequential and nonsequential reasoning pervades potency, if that is reversed, potency is certainly relinquished.

original: 'di ni 'di'i khyab par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni 'di'i khyab par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: This is not its pervader.

original: gang gi phyir de gnod par byed pa yin pa de'i phyir rim dang cig car mi rigs pa la ni khyab par byed pa nus pa med pa byed pa po med pa nyid kyis khyab par bya ba las su bya ba med pa'i khyab pa grub pa'i rgyu'i
analyzed: gang gi phyir de gnod par byed pa yin pa de'i phyir rim dang cig car mi rigs pa la ni khyab par byed pa nus pa med pa byed pa po med pa nyid kyis khyab par bya ba las su bya ba med pa'i khyab pa grub pa'i rgyu'i
translated: Since that is the fault, the pervader of sequential and nonsequential reasoning is not potency. The pervaded object of activity is established by the cause of the pervader, the absence of an agent.

original: phyir thug pa med par thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyir thug pa med par thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: There is no infinite regress.

original: de lta na rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi sgrub pa'i brjod pa'i mjug bsdu ba ni /
analyzed: de lta na rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi sgrub pa'i brjod pa'i mjug bsdu ba ni /
translated: Thus, the conclusion of the statement of proof by the reason of intrinsic nature is

original: de lta na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de lta na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: as follows.

original: de lta na yang gal te bsgrub par bya ba med pa de dang de nyid mi smra ba'i rgol ba pham pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta na yang gal te bsgrub par bya ba med pa de dang de nyid mi smra ba'i rgol ba pham pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir /
translated: In that case, if the probandum is not stated, that is a ground for defeat of the disputant who is silent,

original: snga ma'i dam bcas pa nyid dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i dam bcas pa nyid dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: so it should be applied to the former thesis.

original: de la sgrub pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la sgrub pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: There, the statement ‚Äúthere is no proof‚Äù and so on is

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: why is that?

original: brtsams pa'i don rab tu ma bsgrubs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtsams pa'i don rab tu ma bsgrubs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the purpose of the composition is not accomplished.

original: nus pa med pa'i sgrub pa rtsom pa ni don sgrub par byed par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nus pa med pa'i sgrub pa rtsom pa ni don sgrub par byed par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: A composition that lacks the ability is not able to accomplish the purpose,

original: rtsod pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsod pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that there would be no debate.
This is

original: ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i mkhyen pa sgrub pa ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i khyad par tha dad pa srid pas rab kyi mthar thug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i mkhyen pa sgrub pa ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i khyad par tha dad pa srid pas rab kyi mthar thug par 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, the establishment of the knowledge of an omniscient one is the ultimate perfection, since it is possible that there is a special, manifest activity.

original: shes rab la sogs pa'i yon tan brten pa bzhin du khyad par lan cig byas pa la yang 'gal ba'i rkyen rnam pa 'ga' zhig kyang med pa'i phyir dang / 'bad pa ltos pa'i phyir dri ma 'khrud pa bzhin du de la sogs pa rgyu rnams kyis nus pa khyad par gyur pa thob pa yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab la sogs pa'i yon tan brten pa bzhin du khyad par lan cig byas pa la yang 'gal ba'i rkyen rnam pa 'ga' zhig kyang med pa'i phyir dang / 'bad pa ltos pa'i phyir dri ma 'khrud pa bzhin du de la sogs pa rgyu rnams kyis nus pa khyad par gyur pa thob pa yod pa nyid do //
translated: Just as the support of such qualities as wisdom is not contradicted by any of the various conditions, and just as the stains are cleansed by such causes as effort, so too they obtain a special ability.

original: de nyid gal te shes par bya ba sgrub par mi nus pa kho na shes par byed na khyed dang rgyal dpog pa la sogs pa rtsod pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid gal te shes par bya ba sgrub par mi nus pa kho na shes par byed na khyed dang rgyal dpog pa la sogs pa rtsod pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If you are unable to establish that which is to be known, then you and the Mƒ´mƒÅ·πÉsakas would be in agreement.

original: 'o na ni de nyid srid pa ma yin na gang don dam par gtan tshigs kyi sgrub pa brjod pa 'di yang pham pa'i gnas su rigs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i dgos pa bsdu bar rang nyid dgongs nas /
analyzed: 'o na ni de nyid srid pa ma yin na gang don dam par gtan tshigs kyi sgrub pa brjod pa 'di yang pham pa'i gnas su rigs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i dgos pa bsdu bar rang nyid dgongs nas /
translated: Well, if that is not possible, then this statement of the proof, which is ultimate, is a basis for defeat, as it is reasonable.

original: dngos po la nus pa'i gtan tshigs khas len du zin kyang sgrub pa rab tu ma bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po la nus pa'i gtan tshigs khas len du zin kyang sgrub pa rab tu ma bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya'o //
translated: Having thought of this, he says, ‚ÄúBecause the proof is not stated, even though the argument is accepted as having the capacity with respect to the thing.‚Äù

original: de ni 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de ni 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: He thinks as follows:

original: gal te don dam par nus pa'i gtan tshigs 'di bstan pa de lta na yang sgrub par nus pa'i yan lag tu sgrub pa la bstan pa de lta na yang sgrub par nus pa'i yan lag tu sgrub pa ma bstan pa 'dis ma bsgrubs par brtag par byaüîΩba kho na'o //
analyzed: gal te don dam par nus pa'i gtan tshigs 'di bstan pa de lta na yang sgrub par nus pa'i yan lag tu sgrub pa la bstan pa de lta na yang sgrub par nus pa'i yan lag tu sgrub pa ma bstan pa 'dis ma bsgrubs par brtag par bya ba kho na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEven if the argument is stated as having the capacity ultimately, it is not established by this statement of the proof, which is a part of the proof, but is to be imagined as not established.

original: gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i skyon dang yon tan brjod pa med pa'i don la ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i skyon dang yon tan brjod pa med pa'i don la ma yin te /
translated: But it is not the case that the faults and good qualities of an inference for the sake of others are not stated with respect to the meaning.‚Äù

original: de lta na tshig smra ba don ji lta ba bzhin du me brjod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na tshig smra ba don ji lta ba bzhin du me brjod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In that case, the meaning of the words is not expressed just as it is, because it is not observed.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gang la skyon dang yon tan rjod par byed pa de yang tshig gi sgo nas yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gang la skyon dang yon tan rjod par byed pa de yang tshig gi sgo nas yin no //
translated: For that very reason, even when one expresses a fault or a good quality, it is by means of words.

original: de ni 'di ltar khas blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar khas blang bar bya ste /
translated: This is how it should be accepted.

original: de lta ma yin na sgra mi rtag go zhes bya ba dam bca' ba brjod pa de tsam zhig 'dir brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na sgra mi rtag go zhes bya ba dam bca' ba brjod pa de tsam zhig 'dir brjod par bya'o //
translated: Otherwise, one would have to say just that much here, namely, the statement of the thesis sound is impermanent.

original: de lta na don brjod pa kho na 'dod pa'i don grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na don brjod pa kho na 'dod pa'i don grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the purpose would be accomplished by simply expressing the meaning.

original: de ltar rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag gi sgrub pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag gi sgrub pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the establishment of the part of the proof by the reason of nature,

original: da ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs bshad pa ni /
analyzed: da ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs bshad pa ni /
translated: now, the explanation of the effect reason is as follows.

original: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The effect reason is also like this and so on.

original: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is that like?

original: bshad pa 'bras bu'i rtags ni du ba la sogs pa'i ming can gang yin pas rgyu sreg pa la sogs @61b pa'i sgrub par byed pa gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: bshad pa 'bras bu'i rtags ni du ba la sogs pa'i ming can gang yin pas rgyu sreg pa la sogs @61b pa'i sgrub par byed pa gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The inferential mark of effect is that which has the name smoke, etc. and is to be apprehended as the proof of the cause, burning, etc.

original: du ba la sogs pa des bsregs pa la sogs pa lhan cig byed pa'i 'bras bu rgyu sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: du ba la sogs pa des bsregs pa la sogs pa lhan cig byed pa'i 'bras bu rgyu sgrub pa yin no //
translated: The effect of the co-operation of that smoke, etc. is the proof of the cause, burning, etc.

original: rtags dang rtags can dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid gang yin pa de nyid 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag sgrub pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: rtags dang rtags can dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid gang yin pa de nyid 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag sgrub pa'i don yin no //
translated: The very fact that the inferential mark and the one who has the inferential mark are the entities of cause and effect is the meaning of the proof of the branch of proof of the inferential mark of effect.

original: gang gis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po de sgrub par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po de sgrub par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: By what is that entity of cause and effect proved?

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag sgrub par byed pa'i chad ma dag ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag sgrub par byed pa'i chad ma dag ces bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúThe two non-affirming negatives that prove the entities and non-entities.‚Äù

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang rgyu dang 'bras bu dag go //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang rgyu dang 'bras bu dag go //
translated: The entities and non-entities are cause and effect.

original: yod pa dang med pa 'di dag tshad mas rab tu bsgrubs pa yin no zhes bya ba bstan pa'i go rims so //
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa 'di dag tshad mas rab tu bsgrubs pa yin no zhes bya ba bstan pa'i go rims so //
translated: The order of the demonstration is: ‚Äúexistence and non-existence are well established by the authorities.‚Äù

original: sgrub par byed pa'i sgra ni rgyu dang sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i sgra ni rgyu dang sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúestablish‚Äù is the cause and the proof.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma ni mngon sum dang mi dmigs pas go rims bzhin du'o //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma ni mngon sum dang mi dmigs pas go rims bzhin du'o //
translated: The authorities that establish existence and non-existence are direct perception and non-apprehension, respectively.

original: mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa dag gis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ji ltar sgrub pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa dag gis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ji ltar sgrub pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is the relation of cause and effect established by direct perception and non-apprehension?

original: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, for example, etc.

original: du ba la sogs pa'i ming can gyi 'bras bu 'di ni me yod pa 'di las byung ngo //
analyzed: du ba la sogs pa'i ming can gyi 'bras bu 'di ni me yod pa 'di las byung ngo //
translated: This effect, which is called ‚Äúsmoke,‚Äù has arisen from this existent fire.

original: sngar dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa'i yod pa ma dmigs pa las yin no zhes bya ba tshig lhag ma'o //
analyzed: sngar dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa'i yod pa ma dmigs pa las yin no zhes bya ba tshig lhag ma'o //
translated: It is from the non-apprehension of the existent, which was previously perceived as an object of apprehension. The rest of the sentence is understood.

original: de lta ma yin na mes du ba byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na mes du ba byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, fire would not produce smoke.

original: me dang nye ba'i snga rol na 'di yod do zhes bya ba'i dgos pa srid pa la /
analyzed: me dang nye ba'i snga rol na 'di yod do zhes bya ba'i dgos pa srid pa la /
translated: Prior to the proximity of fire, it is possible to say that this exists.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pas bzung zin pa la dogs pa 'di mi 'jug go //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pas bzung zin pa la dogs pa 'di mi 'jug go //
translated: But when it is apprehended by the non-apprehension explained above, this doubt does not arise.

original: de nyid kyi phyir tshad ma rnam par nges pa la sogs pa nyid de skad du bshad zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir tshad ma rnam par nges pa la sogs pa nyid de skad du bshad zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For this very reason, it is explained in the PramaÃÑn.avini≈õcaya and so on.

original: 'dis ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i byed pa bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i byed pa bshad pa yin te /
translated: This explains the function of direct perception.

original: 'di ltar 'di yod na yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di yod na yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is understood that if this exists, that exists.

original: da ni mi dmigs pa'i byed pa bstan par 'dod nas de las gzhan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: da ni mi dmigs pa'i byed pa bstan par 'dod nas de las gzhan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Now, wishing to explain the function of non-apprehension, he says, ‚Äúother than that,‚Äù and so on.

original: de'i phyir me las gzhan pa la yod du zin kyang de bzhin du du ba de'i rgyu bud shing dang me rnams nus pa yod du zin kyang zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir me las gzhan pa la yod du zin kyang de bzhin du du ba de'i rgyu bud shing dang me rnams nus pa yod du zin kyang zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa na'o //
translated: Therefore, even though it exists in something other than fire, in that way, even though the causes of that smoke, the fuel and fire, exist, when they are engaged,

original: dang zhes bya ba'i yi ges ni dbye ba bstan to //
analyzed: dang zhes bya ba'i yi ges ni dbye ba bstan to //
translated: the syllable ‚Äúand‚Äù indicates a distinction.

original: nus pa zhes bya ba ni me de med na med par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: nus pa zhes bya ba ni me de med na med par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: The so-called potency is that which is absent when the fire is absent.

original: 'di zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa'o zhes bya ba 'di lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩrnam par gcad @62a * //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa'o zhes bya ba 'di lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i don to // rnam par gcad @62a * //
translated: The meaning is that this is the case in regard to the object, time, and proximity.üîΩThat exclusion is in regard to horses, cows, etc.,

original: pa de ni rta dang ba lang la sogs pa yul dang dus dang nye ba de dag kyang du ba skyed pa'i rgyu 'dir 'gegs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa de ni rta dang ba lang la sogs pa yul dang dus dang nye ba de dag kyang du ba skyed pa'i rgyu 'dir 'gegs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because those objects, times, and proximities are excluded as causes of smoke here.

original: gang gi tshe gal te rta dang ba lang la sogs pa de'i rgyu yin na de'i tshe 'das pa'i me la sogs pa de dag kyang nye ba'i phyir du ba bskyed nas thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe gal te rta dang ba lang la sogs pa de'i rgyu yin na de'i tshe 'das pa'i me la sogs pa de dag kyang nye ba'i phyir du ba bskyed nas thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is the cause of those, such as horses and cows, then at that time, since those past fires, etc., are also proximate, it follows that smoke would be produced from them.

original: rgyu gzhan bud shing la sogs pa la ltos nas de skyed par 'gyur ba de dag la yang thal ba 'dir mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu gzhan bud shing la sogs pa la ltos nas de skyed par 'gyur ba de dag la yang thal ba 'dir mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not the case that those are the cause of smoke, but that smoke is produced in dependence on other causes, such as fuel, then the absurd consequence does not apply to them.

original: gal te de lta na yang de la nye ba kho na yin pas thal ba ldog pa med do /
analyzed: gal te de lta na yang de la nye ba kho na yin pas thal ba ldog pa med do /
translated: If that were so, then since they are proximate to smoke, the absurd consequence cannot be averted.

original: me yang lhan cig byed pa la ltos nas de skyed par byed pa de las 'di ni mi rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: me yang lhan cig byed pa la ltos nas de skyed par byed pa de las 'di ni mi rigs so zhe na /
translated: And fire, in dependence on its cooperating conditions, produces it.

original: de lta na me du ba bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa de dang snga phyi 'gal na de skad du ji ste brjod /
analyzed: de lta na me du ba bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa de dang snga phyi 'gal na de skad du ji ste brjod /
translated: If it is contradictory for fire to be the cause of smoke, how can you say that?

original: rta dang ba lang la sogs pa nyid rgyur gyur gyi me ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rta dang ba lang la sogs pa nyid rgyur gyur gyi me ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It would follow that horses and oxen, etc., are the cause, but fire is not.

original: de lta na de ni rgyu yin yang bla'i rta dang ba lang la sogs pa yang yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na de ni rgyu yin yang bla'i rta dang ba lang la sogs pa yang yin no zhe na /
translated: If that is so, it is better to say that fire is the cause, but horses and oxen, etc., are not.

original: 'di ni mi 'thad de de la ldog pa rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni mi 'thad de de la ldog pa rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is not tenable, because it is difficult to understand the distinction.

original: 'di ltar rta dang ba lang la sogs pa nyid log par 'gyur ba'i me de la bud shing la sogs pa tshogs pa kho na las du ba skyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar rta dang ba lang la sogs pa nyid log par 'gyur ba'i me de la bud shing la sogs pa tshogs pa kho na las du ba skyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, when horses, oxen, etc., are not, the fire that is not is produced from smoke only from the collection of fuel, etc.

original: gang gi phyir rgyu'i rgyun la brten nas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por 'gyur ba'i phyir 'bras bu'i rgyun las rgyu'i rgyun snga ma yin gyi skad cig mas ni ma yin no zhes pas bsdoms pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyu'i rgyun la brten nas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por 'gyur ba'i phyir 'bras bu'i rgyun las rgyu'i rgyun snga ma yin gyi skad cig mas ni ma yin no zhes pas bsdoms pa yin te /
translated: Because the state of cause and effect is based on the continuum of the cause, the continuum of the cause is prior to the continuum of the effect, not the moment.

original: 'di skad cig ma snga ma 'di phyi ma zhes bya ba bye brag gi nus pa las rnam par shes pa mi skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di skad cig ma snga ma 'di phyi ma zhes bya ba bye brag gi nus pa las rnam par shes pa mi skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because consciousness does not arise from the prior moment to the subsequent moment, due to the specific potency.

original: tshu rol mthong ba'i dbang du byas nas tshad ma'i mtshan nyid ni thugs rje dang ldan pas ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bkod do //
analyzed: tshu rol mthong ba'i dbang du byas nas tshad ma'i mtshan nyid ni thugs rje dang ldan pas ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bkod do //
translated: The definition of valid cognition, from the perspective of one who sees only the near side, is set forth by the compassionate one, just as it is explained.

original: 'dir gzhan dag rmongs pas 'jig rten pa slu bar gyur pas tha snyad pa'i tshad ma 'di gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gzhan dag rmongs pas 'jig rten pa slu bar gyur pas tha snyad pa'i tshad ma 'di gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Here, this conventional valid cognition is taught because others, due to delusion, become deceived by the world.

original: gnas mal rnying pa la sogs pa ni me med kyang du ba yod pas 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnas mal rnying pa la sogs pa ni me med kyang du ba yod pas 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the case of old bedding and so on, there is smoke even without fire, so it would be mistaken.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: de yang du ba'i rgyun sngon du song ba yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: de yang du ba'i rgyun sngon du song ba yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: That also exists only when there is a prior continuum of smoke.

original: dngos po dang brgyud pas byas pa'i khyad par yin no //
analyzed: dngos po dang brgyud pas byas pa'i khyad par yin no //
translated: The difference is that one is direct and the other is indirect.

original: me'i rgyun dang du ba'i rgyun dag gnas mal rnying pa la sogs pa rgyun chad pa dang ma chad par shes par 'gyur te /
analyzed: me'i rgyun dang du ba'i rgyun dag gnas mal rnying pa la sogs pa rgyun chad pa dang ma chad par shes par 'gyur te /
translated: The continuity of fire and the continuity of smoke are known to be interrupted and not interrupted, respectively, in an old dwelling place, etc.

original: tshang bang la sogs pa'i yul dus tha dad pa gsal ba yin pas dngos po sna tshogs pa'i @62b rang bzhin tha dad par shes pa goms pa'i stobs la mkhas pa la skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshang bang la sogs pa'i yul dus tha dad pa gsal ba yin pas dngos po sna tshogs pa'i @62b rang bzhin tha dad par shes pa goms pa'i stobs la mkhas pa la skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Since the object and time, etc., of a kitchen, etc., are different, the cognition of the different natures of various things arises through the power of habituation to the skill in the non-contradiction of different inferences.

original: rjes su dpag pa tha dad pa yang mi 'gal ba de nyid kyi phyir yul dang dus la sogs pa la stos pa'i 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi rjes su dpog pa ni 'gal ba'i 'bras bu dmigs pa'i skabs su /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa tha dad pa yang mi 'gal ba de nyid kyi phyir yul dang dus la sogs pa la stos pa'i 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi rjes su dpog pa ni 'gal ba'i 'bras bu dmigs pa'i skabs su /
translated: Also, in the context of the observation of a contradictory effect, the inference of an effect-reason that depends on place, time, etc., is explained as follows:

original: 'gal 'bras la yang yul dang ni //
analyzed: 'gal 'bras la yang yul dang ni //
translated: Even with a contradictory effect,üîΩone asserts dependence on place,

original: dus la sogs pa ltos par 'dod //
analyzed: dus la sogs pa ltos par 'dod //
translated: time, etc.

original: gzhan du 'khrul 'gyur mi drang pa //
analyzed: gzhan du 'khrul 'gyur mi drang pa //
translated: Otherwise, there would be error,

original: sgrub pa la ni thal ba bzhin //üîΩzhes bshad do //
analyzed: sgrub pa la ni thal ba bzhin //üîΩzhes bshad do //
translated: like the reductio in a proof.

original: de lta na dngos po rnam par dbye ba tha dad pa 'phral du byung ba la mkhas pa 'ga' zhig rnam par 'byed pa'i thur mas shes rab kyi mig phye ba nyid kyis 'di ni me las skyes pa 'di du ba las skyes pa'i du ba zhes bya
analyzed: de lta na dngos po rnam par dbye ba tha dad pa 'phral du byung ba la mkhas pa 'ga' zhig rnam par 'byed pa'i thur mas shes rab kyi mig phye ba nyid kyis 'di ni me las skyes pa 'di du ba las skyes pa'i du ba zhes bya
translated: In that case, some who are skilled in the momentary arising of different differentiated things, by merely opening the eye of wisdom with the scalpel of analysis, say, ‚ÄúThis is smoke arisen from fire. This is smoke arisen from smoke.‚ÄùüîΩ

original: ba rnam par 'byed do //
analyzed: ba rnam par 'byed do //
translated: Thus, some who are skilled in the momentary arising of different things, by merely opening the eye of wisdom with the scalpel of analysis, distinguish this smoke as smoke arisen from fire and that smoke as smoke arisen from dung.

original: de ltar 'khrul ba shin tu yang med pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar 'khrul ba shin tu yang med pa yin no //
translated: Thus, there is no error at all.

original: 'di ltar me las skyes pa'i du ba ni gzhan las du ba skyes ba ma yin te rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar me las skyes pa'i du ba ni gzhan las du ba skyes ba ma yin te rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, smoke arisen from fire is not smoke arisen from another, because it would follow that it would be causeless.

original: 'di ltar / gang dag me med du ba las //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gang dag me med du ba las //
translated: Thus:

original: gal te du ba 'byung na ni //
analyzed: gal te du ba 'byung na ni //
translated: If smoke arose from non-fire,

original: brgya byin spyi bo'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: brgya byin spyi bo'ang de bzhin no //
translated: then smoke would arise from Indra‚Äôs head.

original: de ni gang gis bsal bar bya //
analyzed: de ni gang gis bsal bar bya //
translated: By what is that removed?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smra ba ni snying po med pas dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smra ba ni snying po med pas dor bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, since it is pointless, it should be rejected.

original: de'i phyir rta dang ba lang la sogs pa de'i rgyu ma yin no zhes bya bar nges so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rta dang ba lang la sogs pa de'i rgyu ma yin no zhes bya bar nges so //
translated: Therefore, it is ascertained that horses, cows, and so on are not its cause.

original: des na me kho na de'i rgyu yin gyi rta la sogs pa 'di ni ma yin zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: des na me kho na de'i rgyu yin gyi rta la sogs pa 'di ni ma yin zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: Therefore, it is established that fire is its cause, but a horse and so on is not.

original: dper na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis ji skad bshad pa'i gnas skabs kyis me rgyu yin par sbyor ba bzhin du bud shing la sogs pa 'am tshogs pa'i rgyu thams cad la'ang sbyor ba bya ba'am /
analyzed: dper na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis ji skad bshad pa'i gnas skabs kyis me rgyu yin par sbyor ba bzhin du bud shing la sogs pa 'am tshogs pa'i rgyu thams cad la'ang sbyor ba bya ba'am /
translated: For example, just as the application of the presence and absence of fire is explained by the situation, so too should the application of all causes such as fuel and so on or the collection be explained.

original: yang na ngag gcig gis bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na ngag gcig gis bshad par bya'o //
translated: Or else, it should be explained by a single statement.

original: de'i phyir me las gzhan pa nus pa'i rgyu dag yod du zin kyang de med par 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir me las gzhan pa nus pa'i rgyu dag yod du zin kyang de med par 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
translated: Therefore, even though other causes of fire exist, they would not occur without it.

original: rta dang ba lang la sogs pa dngos po ji skad du bshad pas rgyu las tha dad pa sgrub par rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rta dang ba lang la sogs pa dngos po ji skad du bshad pas rgyu las tha dad pa sgrub par rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that things such as horses and cows are established as different from their causes, just as explained.

original: 'o na med na med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di nyid legs par bshad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'o na med na med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di nyid legs par bshad pa yin gyi /
translated: Well, it is this very statement, ‚ÄúIf it does not exist, it would not occur,‚Äù that is the good explanation.

original: gzhan pa'i nus pa rgyu dag yod du zin kyang zhes bya ba la don cig yod ce na /
analyzed: gzhan pa'i nus pa rgyu dag yod du zin kyang zhes bya ba la don cig yod ce na /
translated: What is the point of the statement, ‚ÄúEven though other causes exist‚Äù?

original: de lta na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de lta na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúIf that were so, etc.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir de ltar yod du zin kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa @63a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar yod du zin kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa @63a * //
translated: ‚ÄúEven though it exists in that way, etc.‚Äù

original: brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: brjod pa yin no //
translated: is what is said.

original: 'di ni du ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni du ba'o //
translated: This is smoke.

original: de'i 'bras bu nyid ni me'i 'bras bu nyid do //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu nyid ni me'i 'bras bu nyid do //
translated: Its being the effect of that is the effect of fire.

original: bsgrubs pa ni nges pa ste the chom med par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrubs pa ni nges pa ste the chom med par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Established is ascertained, i.e., without doubt.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na ni de ltar ma bstan na'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na ni de ltar ma bstan na'o //
translated: Otherwise, if it were not taught in that way,

original: 'ga' zhig ni de med na med par 'gyur ba zhes bstan par byas pa yin pa de lta na rta dang ba lang la sogs pa dang bud shing la sogs pa las yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ni de med na med par 'gyur ba zhes bstan par byas pa yin pa de lta na rta dang ba lang la sogs pa dang bud shing la sogs pa las yin no //
translated: it would be taught that some things are not absent when that is absent. In that case, it would be from a horse, a cow, etc., and from fuel, etc.

original: sa phyogs stong pa de nyid la me med pa las med pa yin pa the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: sa phyogs stong pa de nyid la me med pa las med pa yin pa the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: One would doubt whether that empty place is without fire or not.

original: me 'di'i nus pa nges pa las yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa gang las yin zhes bya ba bsdu ba'i don yin no //
analyzed: me 'di'i nus pa nges pa las yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa gang las yin zhes bya ba bsdu ba'i don yin no //
translated: From what is the ascertainment that ‚Äúit is from the power of this fire‚Äù? This is the meaning of the summary.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:
