original: nus pa'i rgyu dag yod du zin kyang 'bras bu mi skye ste /
analyzed: nus pa'i rgyu dag yod du zin kyang 'bras bu mi skye ste /
translated: Even if the causes of potency exist, the effect does not arise.

original: rgyu gzhan la yin nam 'ba' zhig la yin zhes 'di the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan la yin nam 'ba' zhig la yin zhes 'di the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: One doubts whether the other cause exists or not.

original: de lta ma yin na nus pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni de la gzhan gyi nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na nus pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni de la gzhan gyi nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Otherwise, this so-called potency would be the cause of the other, and so on.

original: de la du ba 'bras bur grags pa ni me stong ba'i phyogs su gzhan rta dang bud shing la sogs pa de med par 'gyur ba yin no snyam na 'di med pa las de med pa yin no zhes bya ba gang las nges pa yin zhes bya ba'i
analyzed: de la du ba 'bras bur grags pa ni me stong ba'i phyogs su gzhan rta dang bud shing la sogs pa de med par 'gyur ba yin no snyam na 'di med pa las de med pa yin no zhes bya ba gang las nges pa yin zhes bya ba'i
translated: If it is well known that smoke is the effect of fire, then when the fire is absent, the other, such as the horse and fuel, would also be absent. From what is it ascertained that ‚Äúthis is absent because that is absent‚Äù?

original: don to // gal te de ni gzhan gyi nus pa las kyang de med par 'gyur na /
analyzed: don to // gal te de ni gzhan gyi nus pa las kyang de med par 'gyur na /
translated: The meaning is that if that is absent, then this would also be absent due to the potency of the other.

original: 'di log pas 'di ldog go zhes bya ba de ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di log pas 'di ldog go zhes bya ba de ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then how could it be said that ‚Äúthis ceases because that ceases‚Äù?

original: de log na yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de log na yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In response, he says, ‚ÄúEven when that ceases,‚Äù and so on.

original: me 'di ldog pa nas kyang du ba 'di ldog pa yin pa zhes bya ba 'dod rgyal ba'i 'brel ba yin te /
analyzed: me 'di ldog pa nas kyang du ba 'di ldog pa yin pa zhes bya ba 'dod rgyal ba'i 'brel ba yin te /
translated: This is a capricious connection, like the crow and the palm tree.

original: bya rog dang ta la'i tshul bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bya rog dang ta la'i tshul bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is like the crow and the palm tree.

original: gang gi tshe yod du zin kyang brjod pa de'i tshe thams cad de la nye bar 'gyur kyang 'di bzlog pa las 'di ldog par nges pa ni 'dod rgyal ba la 'brel pa med do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: gang gi tshe yod du zin kyang brjod pa de'i tshe thams cad de la nye bar 'gyur kyang 'di bzlog pa las 'di ldog par nges pa ni 'dod rgyal ba la 'brel pa med do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: When it exists, then it is said to be expressed. At that time, although everything is present, it is capriciously asserted that this is definitely stopped by stopping that.

original: de ltar ldog pa lta bu'i 'dod rgyal ba'i 'brel pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar ldog pa lta bu'i 'dod rgyal ba'i 'brel pa yin zhe na /
translated: If the connection is capricious, like the stopping of fire and smoke,üîΩthen why is the connection of the cause and effect of arising and ceasing not capricious?

original: ma bag mar len pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ma bag mar len pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response to that is ‚Äúlike taking a wife,‚Äù and so on.

original: yul gang na ma bag mar len pa'i chos lugs bsngags pa de lta bu de na'o //
analyzed: yul gang na ma bag mar len pa'i chos lugs bsngags pa de lta bu de na'o //
translated: In a place where the custom of taking a wife is praised, that is the place.

original: des na yul smos pa dang bcas pa ni khyad par gyi bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: des na yul smos pa dang bcas pa ni khyad par gyi bsdu ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the inclusion of the specific is the inclusion of the place.

original: de la de yang skye ba la brten nas nye bar btags pa skye ba gang yin pa de ni par sig gi yul yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩji ltar ma la sogs pa'i @63b yul gzhan ma bag mar len pa med na med pa 'dod rgyal ba'i 'brel pa de bzhin du 'dir ma yin no //
analyzed: de la de yang skye ba la brten nas nye bar btags pa skye ba gang yin pa de ni par sig gi yul yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // ji ltar ma la sogs pa'i @63b yul gzhan ma bag mar len pa med na med pa 'dod rgyal ba'i 'brel pa de bzhin du 'dir ma yin no //
translated: The meaning is that birth is a mere designation in dependence on arising.üîΩThe relation between mother and son is not like the relation between a man and a foreign country, for the son would not exist if the mother did not exist.

original: 'di ltar yul gzhan na sa'i khyad par med na med pa yin gyi ma bag mar len pa med pas yin no zhes bya ba ni bya rog dang ta la bzhin du yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar yul gzhan na sa'i khyad par med na med pa yin gyi ma bag mar len pa med pas yin no zhes bya ba ni bya rog dang ta la bzhin du yin no //
translated: The relation between mother and son is like the relation between a crow and a palm tree, for the son would not exist if the mother did not exist, and the mother would not exist if the son did not exist.üîΩOr else, the relation between mother and son is like the relation between fire and fuel, for the mother would not exist if the son did not exist, and the son would not exist if the mother did not exist.

original: yang na rnam pa gzhan du bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: yang na rnam pa gzhan du bshad par bya ste /
translated: Or else, the relation between mother and son is like the relation between smoke and fire, for the son would not exist if the mother did not exist, and the mother would not exist if the son did not exist.üîΩJust as smoke arises from fire and fuel,

original: ji ltar du ba la sogs pa 'di me dang bud shing la sogs pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar du ba la sogs pa 'di me dang bud shing la sogs pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin te /
translated: so too the son arises from the mother and father.

original: snga ma bzhin du 'bras bur brjod pa kha bskad bar bya ste /üîΩde'i dgos pa ni de nyid du khong du chud par bya ba ste /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du 'bras bur brjod pa kha bskad bar bya ste / de'i dgos pa ni de nyid du khong du chud par bya ba ste /
translated: The purpose of this is to be understood in the same way as before.

original: 'di ni mngon sum gyi byed par grags pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni mngon sum gyi byed par grags pa yin no //
translated: This is the well-known function of direct perception.

original: yod du zin kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ma dmigs pas so //
analyzed: yod du zin kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ma dmigs pas so //
translated: If it did exist, etc.

original: de las gzhan pa dag ni me la sogs pa'i rgyu'i tshogs pa de las gzhan pa rta dang ba lang la sogs pa'i nus pa'i rgyu rnams yod du zin kyang me la sogs pa'i rgyu'i tshogs pa 'di med na med par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa dag ni me la sogs pa'i rgyu'i tshogs pa de las gzhan pa rta dang ba lang la sogs pa'i nus pa'i rgyu rnams yod du zin kyang me la sogs pa'i rgyu'i tshogs pa 'di med na med par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The other causes, such as the horse and cow, etc., are the causes of the potency of the collection of causes of fire, etc.

original: 'di dag ni gzhan gyi bsam pa la ltos nas bshad pa yin gyi de kho na nyid kyi don du yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag ni gzhan gyi bsam pa la ltos nas bshad pa yin gyi de kho na nyid kyi don du yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: This is explained in terms of the other‚Äôs intention, but not in terms of reality.

original: gal te de ni de'i rgyu yin na de'i tshe yod pa'i dus las sngar ram phyis kyang du ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de ni de'i rgyu yin na de'i tshe yod pa'i dus las sngar ram phyis kyang du ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is the cause of that, then it would generate smoke either before or after the time of its existence.

original: de dag de la ltos nas skyed par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de dag de la ltos nas skyed par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that they generate it in dependence on that,

original: de lta na de'i tshogs pa ni rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na de'i tshogs pa ni rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then the collection of those would be the cause.

original: de lta na gnyi ga rgyur gyur du zin kyang ngo bo 'chad par ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: de lta na gnyi ga rgyur gyur du zin kyang ngo bo 'chad par ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: If that is so, then even though both are causes, what is the point of positing a nature?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: de ldog pa rtogs pa shin tu dka' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ldog pa rtogs pa shin tu dka' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is very difficult to understand the cessation of that.

original: ji lta ba thams cad kyang 'di tshogs pa las gyur pa nyid na de yod par gyur pa'i phyir de med na med par 'gyur ro zhes brjod par rigs kyi /
analyzed: ji lta ba thams cad kyang 'di tshogs pa las gyur pa nyid na de yod par gyur pa'i phyir de med na med par 'gyur ro zhes brjod par rigs kyi /
translated: If all that is real is a collection of these, then it is reasonable to say that when that exists, it exists, and when that does not exist, it does not exist.

original: de'i nus pa'i rgyu dag yod du zin kyang zhes bya ba ci'i phyir bshad ce na /
analyzed: de'i nus pa'i rgyu dag yod du zin kyang zhes bya ba ci'i phyir bshad ce na /
translated: But why does he say, ‚ÄúEven when the causes of its power exist‚Äù?

original: de lta na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de lta na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIn that case,‚Äù etc.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na de'i tshogs pa med na med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nye bar bstan pa de la tshogs pa las gzhan pa rta dad ba lang la sogs pa med par 'gyur ba dang // tshogs pa 'di nus ba las the tshom za bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na de'i tshogs pa med na med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nye bar bstan pa de la tshogs pa las gzhan pa rta dad ba lang la sogs pa med par 'gyur ba dang // tshogs pa 'di nus ba las the tshom za bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, if it were shown that it does not exist when the collection does not exist, then it would be doubtful whether the collection has the power to produce it, since there would be no other things such as horses and oxen in the collection.

original: gang gi phyir ba lang la sogs pa gzhan de la nus pa yin na de med na mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba log na yang ldog pa 'dod rgyal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ba lang la sogs pa gzhan de la nus pa yin na de med na mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba log na yang ldog pa 'dod rgyal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If the other things such as oxen have the power to produce it, then it would not occur when they are absent. But if it is maintained that it ceases when they cease, then it would be causeless.

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nges par bsgrub pa'i @64a * //
analyzed: de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nges par bsgrub pa'i @64a * //
translated: Thus, the existence of cause and effect is definitely established.üîΩ

original: thabs bstan nas /
analyzed: thabs bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the means of establishing the entity of cause and effect,üîΩhe concludes the chapter with the following verse.

original: rnam pa'i mjug bsdu ba ni de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: rnam pa'i mjug bsdu ba ni de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: The summary of the chapter is stated in the words ‚ÄúThus, etc.‚Äù

original: de ltar ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam pa bsdu ba la sogs pa de'i 'bras bur bsgrubs pas nges par 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam pa bsdu ba la sogs pa de'i 'bras bur bsgrubs pas nges par 'grub pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the summary of the chapter is established as the result of the explanation given above.

original: yang na mngon sum dang / mi dmigs pas bsgrub par gyur ba de dang de ni 'bras bur gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: yang na mngon sum dang / mi dmigs pas bsgrub par gyur ba de dang de ni 'bras bur gyur pa yin no //
translated: Or, that which is established by direct perception and non-apprehension is the result.

original: gal te de grub par gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba de ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de grub par gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba de ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: If it is established, how is that?

original: bshad pa / grub pa de yang rang yod na bdag nyid du nye ba ste /
analyzed: bshad pa / grub pa de yang rang yod na bdag nyid du nye ba ste /
translated: It is said: That establishment is the existence of the thing itself.

original: de'i rgyu dang nye ba de yod par sgrub par byed pa de yin te /
analyzed: de'i rgyu dang nye ba de yod par sgrub par byed pa de yin te /
translated: That is the establishment of the existence of the cause and the thing itself.

original: yul dang dus la ltos pa yin no zhes kha bskang ngo //
analyzed: yul dang dus la ltos pa yin no zhes kha bskang ngo //
translated: It is dependent on place and time.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po med pas de las skye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa grub pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po med pas de las skye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa grub pa yin no //
translated: Since there is no entity of cause and effect, the relation characterized by arising from that is established.

original: gal te de lta bu dmigs pa de nyid la rang yod pa tsam gyis yul la sogs pa la ltos nas rang gi rgyu rtogs so //
analyzed: gal te de lta bu dmigs pa de nyid la rang yod pa tsam gyis yul la sogs pa la ltos nas rang gi rgyu rtogs so //
translated: If that which is observed exists in that very thing, then one understands its cause in dependence on the object, etc., merely by its presence.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bshad pa / rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said: Because cause and effect are nondeceptive.

original: de lta ma yin na de'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na de'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur te /
translated: If that were not so, it would not be its effect,

original: de 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be deceptive.

original: gang dang gang bzlog pa yin pa de dang de ni 'bras bur mi rigs te /
analyzed: gang dang gang bzlog pa yin pa de dang de ni 'bras bur mi rigs te /
translated: Whatever is reversed is not suitable as its effect,

original: rna rgyan dang / dpung rgyan gyi 'brel pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rna rgyan dang / dpung rgyan gyi 'brel pa bzhin no //
translated: like the relation between an earring and an armlet.

original: gal te du ba me'i 'bras bu yin par 'khrul pa med kyang myu gu la sogs pa gzhan rang gi rgyu dang sa la sogs pa rnams la mi 'khrul pa yin no zhes bya bar gang las shes she na /
analyzed: gal te du ba me'i 'bras bu yin par 'khrul pa med kyang myu gu la sogs pa gzhan rang gi rgyu dang sa la sogs pa rnams la mi 'khrul pa yin no zhes bya bar gang las shes she na /
translated: If it is said that smoke is the effect of fire because it is nondeceptive, but a sprout, for example, is not nondeceptive with regard to its own cause, such as the seed, etc., how is that known?

original: ma 'khrul pa yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ma 'khrul pa yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúNon-errone‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di ltar ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar ston pa yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: du ba rang gi rgyu la mi 'khrul par skye bar 'khrul pa gang yin pa des sa bon la sogs pa rang gi bdag nyid kyi rgyu dang lhan cig pa las myu gu la sogs pa 'bras bu thams cad 'dra ba mi 'khrul par rigs pa yin no
analyzed: du ba rang gi rgyu la mi 'khrul par skye bar 'khrul pa gang yin pa des sa bon la sogs pa rang gi bdag nyid kyi rgyu dang lhan cig pa las myu gu la sogs pa 'bras bu thams cad 'dra ba mi 'khrul par rigs pa yin no
translated: Since smoke arises from its cause without error, it is reasonable that all effects such as sprouts arise from their causes such as seeds without error.

original: // de ltar de yang ji skad bshad pa'i mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa dag gis de 'bras bur grub pa de dang de mi 'khrul par grub pa yin no //
analyzed: // de ltar de yang ji skad bshad pa'i mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa dag gis de 'bras bur grub pa de dang de mi 'khrul par grub pa yin no //
translated: And just as that is established as the effect of fire by the previously explained means of valid cognition of perception and non-apprehension, it is established as non-errone.

original: 'dis ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu bsgrubs pa de las bzlog pa ni rgol bas ma grub pas de ni pham pa'i gnas kyi dbang du byas par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag tu bsgrubs pa de las bzlog pa ni rgol bas ma grub pas de ni pham pa'i gnas kyi dbang du byas par bstan pa ni /
translated: This establishes the proof of the effect reason as a branch of the proof. The opponent‚Äôs non-establishment of the reverse of that is taught as a basis for defeat.

original: de ltar zhes @64b bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ltar zhes @64b bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúIn that case‚Äù and so on.

original: de ltar zhes ni mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa dag ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pas so //
analyzed: de ltar zhes ni mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa dag ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pas so //
translated: Thus, means by direct perception and non-apprehension, as explained.

original: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyang zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa'i rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs 'ba' zhig gi rnam pa sgrub par mi nus pa yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyang zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa'i rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs 'ba' zhig gi rnam pa sgrub par mi nus pa yin te /
translated: Also, means that the reason of effect, as previously explained, is not able to establish the aspect of the reason of nature alone.

original: 'dir yang rgol ba pham pa'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba yang gi sgra yin no /
analyzed: 'dir yang rgol ba pham pa'i gnas yin no zhes bya ba yang gi sgra yin no /
translated: Here, the term also means that it is a ground for defeat for the opponent.

original: de ltar ci'i phyir yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar ci'i phyir yin zhe na /
translated: Why is that so?

original: ma bsgrubs na 'dir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngo po rtags dang rtags can nam //
analyzed: ma bsgrubs na 'dir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngo po rtags dang rtags can nam //
translated: If it is not established, then the nature of cause and effect, the reason and what possesses the reason,

original: de'i 'bras bu'i rtags nyid du rtsom pa'i don mi 'grub po zhes bya ba tshig gi don yin no //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu'i rtags nyid du rtsom pa'i don mi 'grub po zhes bya ba tshig gi don yin no //
translated: or the reason of its effect is not accomplished, this is the meaning of the sentence.

original: brtsams pa'i don ni rgyu yod par sgrub par byed pa de ma grub pas de pham pa'i gnas yin zhes rnal ma dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: brtsams pa'i don ni rgyu yod par sgrub par byed pa de ma grub pas de pham pa'i gnas yin zhes rnal ma dang sbyar ro //
translated: The meaning of the composition is that the establishment of the existence of the cause is not accomplished, and therefore it is a ground for defeat. This is the natural meaning.

original: 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba de la zhe na bshad pa don gzhan pa du ba la sogs pa'i dngos po yod pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba de la zhe na bshad pa don gzhan pa du ba la sogs pa'i dngos po yod pa ni /
translated: If you say, This is it, then the existence of the thing that is different from it, such as smoke,

original: me la sogs pa'i dngos po yod pa nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me la sogs pa'i dngos po yod pa nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is not ascertained as the existence of the thing that is different from it, such as fire.

original: nges pa smos pa ni 'dod rgyal ba'i 'brel pa bsal ba'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa smos pa ni 'dod rgyal ba'i 'brel pa bsal ba'i don to //
translated: The word ascertained is for the purpose of excluding a connection that is random.

original: don gzhan yang de'i dngos po dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin yod pa nyid du de'i dngos po nges pa yin no snyam du de'i dngos po dang 'brel pa med pa'i rang bzhin la ni zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: don gzhan yang de'i dngos po dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin yod pa nyid du de'i dngos po nges pa yin no snyam du de'i dngos po dang 'brel pa med pa'i rang bzhin la ni zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If you think, The existence of the thing that is different from it is the existence of the nature that is connected to it, then the word without is stated.

original: de'i dngos po'i me la sogs pa'i dngos po'o //
analyzed: de'i dngos po'i me la sogs pa'i dngos po'o //
translated: The thing that is different from it is the thing such as fire.

original: 'brel pa med pa ni rag las pa'i rang bzhin 'di yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa ni rag las pa'i rang bzhin 'di yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The word without is connected to the nature that is not connected to it.

original: don gzhan pa 'di dag yod na de yod pa'i nges pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de'i rgyu khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: don gzhan pa 'di dag yod na de yod pa'i nges pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de'i rgyu khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: The reason for this is that the existence of the thing that is different from it is not ascertained as the existence of the thing that is different from it.

original: sbyor ba ni gang dang gang la don gzhan du gyur pa dang 'brel pa med pa de dang de ni yod na de yod par nges pa med de /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang dang gang la don gzhan du gyur pa dang 'brel pa med pa de dang de ni yod na de yod par nges pa med de /
translated: The application is that if something is related to something else as a different object, then it is not certain that if the one exists, the other exists.

original: dper na rkang gdub yod pa'i cod pan bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rkang gdub yod pa'i cod pan bzhin no //
translated: For example, if there is an anklet, it is not certain that there is a bracelet.üîΩAnd this smoke, etc., is related to fire, etc., as a different object, because it is by nature unrelated to fire, etc.

original: du ba la sogs pa 'di yang don gzhan du me la sogs pa dang 'brel pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'am khyab par byed pa 'gal ba mi dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs kyi sgrub pa bshad
analyzed: du ba la sogs pa 'di yang don gzhan du me la sogs pa dang 'brel pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'am khyab par byed pa 'gal ba mi dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs kyi sgrub pa bshad
translated: This is the explanation of the proof by the reason of the non-apprehension of the pervasion or the non-apprehension of the pervaded contrary.

original: do // de nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa gang las she na /
analyzed: do // de nyid kyi 'brel pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa gang las she na /
translated: From what is that nature of unrelatedness established?

original: 'bral bu nyid du ma grub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'bral bu nyid du ma grub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúbecause of the non-establishment of the effect.‚Äù

original: 'dir ma bsgrub pas der ma grub bo zhes bya bar rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir ma bsgrub pas der ma grub bo zhes bya bar rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Here, it should be understood that because it is not established, it is not established there.

original: 'o na ni don dam par rtogs pa 'bras bu'i @65a * //
analyzed: 'o na ni don dam par rtogs pa 'bras bu'i @65a * //
translated: Well, then, the ultimate cognition is the result of the reason.

original: gtan tshigs su khas blangs pa de yang gal te de'i 'bras bur des ma bsgrubs na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs su khas blangs pa de yang gal te de'i 'bras bur des ma bsgrubs na /
translated: If the reason is accepted, but if it is not established as the effect of that,

original: ji ltar de bzhin du 'di pham pa'i gnas su rigs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin du 'di pham pa'i gnas su rigs pa yin zhe na /
translated: how is it that it is reasonable that this is a case of defeat?

original: bshad pa dngos po'i 'bras bu'i rtags khas blangs pa yang ma bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bshad pa dngos po'i 'bras bu'i rtags khas blangs pa yang ma bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: The response is: because the reason of the effect of a thing is not taught.

original: 'di de'i 'bras bur zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
analyzed: 'di de'i 'bras bur zhes bya ba lhag ma'o //
translated: The remainder is: ‚Äúthis is its effect.‚Äù

original: de ltar 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag kyang brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs kyi sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag kyang brjod nas /
translated: Thus, having stated the component of proof of the reason of the effect,

original: mi dmigs pa ni bshad pa /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa ni bshad pa /
translated: non-observation is explained.

original: mi dmigs pa yang bsgrubs pa yin no zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa yang bsgrubs pa yin no zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: Non-observation is also a component of proof.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag yin no zhes bya ba kha bskang ngo //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag yin no zhes bya ba kha bskang ngo //
translated: The component of proof should be supplied.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: mi dmigs pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: The proof of non-observation.

original: gang yang rung bas ci ste ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang yang rung bas ci ste ma yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, why is it not just any one of those,

original: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: the phrase ‚Äúthat is an object of observation‚Äù is stated.

original: snang ba'i rang bzhin gzhan yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snang ba'i rang bzhin gzhan yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is a different nature from appearance.

original: dmigs pa ni shes pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa ni shes pa ste /
translated: The object is the cognition.

original: dmigs pa'i sgras yod pa'i rgyur sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i sgras yod pa'i rgyur sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúobject‚Äù is a synonym for ‚Äúcause of existence.‚Äù

original: de'i rig byar gyur pa ni rgyu'o //üîΩrig byar gyur pa'i sgras rgyu sgrub par byed pa nyid kyis skyed par byed par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rig byar gyur pa ni rgyu'o // rig byar gyur pa'i sgras rgyu sgrub par byed pa nyid kyis skyed par byed par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The cause is the object-possessor.üîΩThe word ‚Äúobject-possessor‚Äù is a synonym for ‚Äúproducer‚Äù because it is the cause of the effect.üîΩThe cause is the object-possessor because it is the cause of the effect.

original: de yang rkyen gzhan ma lus pa dang / rang bzhin khyad par can du gyur pa de ma dmigs pa de'i sgrub par byed pa bstan pa bshad pa'i go rims so //
analyzed: de yang rkyen gzhan ma lus pa dang / rang bzhin khyad par can du gyur pa de ma dmigs pa de'i sgrub par byed pa bstan pa bshad pa'i go rims so //
translated: The order of explanation is that the cause is the object-possessor, and the effect is the object.

original: rnam pa de lta bu ji ltar mi dmigs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu ji ltar mi dmigs pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is there non-apprehension of that kind?

original: de de nyid la yin ni zhes ni mi brjod kyi 'on kyang de'i rigs gzhan la ma yin te /
analyzed: de de nyid la yin ni zhes ni mi brjod kyi 'on kyang de'i rigs gzhan la ma yin te /
translated: It is not said that it exists in that itself, but rather that it does not exist in another kind.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i mi dmigs pa gang gi sgrub pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i mi dmigs pa gang gi sgrub pa yin zhe na /
translated: What is the non-apprehension of that kind that is the proof?

original: bshad pa / rtogs pa po ste phyir rgol bas so //
analyzed: bshad pa / rtogs pa po ste phyir rgol bas so //
translated: The opponent, the one who understands.

original: gal te dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa ni sha za ba la sogs pa la yang gzhan mthu dang ldan par 'gyur na de dag kyang ji ltar mi dmigs pa sgrub par byed pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag tu nus par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa ni sha za ba la sogs pa la yang gzhan mthu dang ldan par 'gyur na de dag kyang ji ltar mi dmigs pa sgrub par byed pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag tu nus par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If the object of observation of non-observation is also the object of observation of the flesh-eater, etc., then how could they be a means of establishing non-observation?

original: rtogs pa bos zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rtogs pa bos zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúThe statement of understanding.‚Äù

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is shown:

original: 'dir rtogs par brjod pa gang yin pa de'i dmigs pa'i rig byar bum pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de nyid bum pa sgrub par byed pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir rtogs par brjod pa gang yin pa de'i dmigs pa'i rig byar bum pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de nyid bum pa sgrub par byed pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Here, whatever is the object of observation of the statement of understanding, that very pot, etc., is the means of establishing the pot, and not another.

original: rnam pa 'di lta bu nyid kyi mi dmigs pa sgrub par @65b byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di lta bu nyid kyi mi dmigs pa sgrub par @65b byed pa yin gyi /
translated: It is the non-observation of just this kind that is the means of establishing non-existence.

original: ci'i phyir gzhan gyis ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gzhan gyis ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not another?

original: de 'dra ba kho na'i mi dmigs pa la ni med pa'i tha snyad sgrub pa yin gyi zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de 'dra ba kho na'i mi dmigs pa la ni med pa'i tha snyad sgrub pa yin gyi zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIn the non-observation of just that kind, there is the establishment of the term non-existence.‚Äù

original: dmigs pa'i rig byar ma gyur pa'i mi dmigs pa ni the tshom gyi rgyu yin te /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rig byar ma gyur pa'i mi dmigs pa ni the tshom gyi rgyu yin te /
translated: Non-observation of what is not the object of observation is the cause of doubt.

original: rtogs par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not cause one to understand.

original: med pa'i tha snyad grub pa zhes brjod pa ni med pa'i tha snyad kho nas bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad grub pa zhes brjod pa ni med pa'i tha snyad kho nas bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: The expression ‚Äúthe establishment of the convention of non-existence‚Äù means that the object to be established is the convention of non-existence itself,

original: dngos po med pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni ma yin no //
translated: not the non-existence of an existent.

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa rang nyid med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba bstan pa'i don du 'am /
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa rang nyid med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba bstan pa'i don du 'am /
translated: The expression ‚Äúbecause the non-apprehension of intrinsic nature is itself the nature of non-existence‚Äù is stated to indicate that

original: med pa'i tha snyad smos pa nye bar mtshon pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad smos pa nye bar mtshon pa'i don yin no //
translated: the expression ‚Äúnon-existence‚Äù is a mere illustration.

original: des na sgra dang shes pa de yang gzung ngo //
analyzed: des na sgra dang shes pa de yang gzung ngo //
translated: Therefore, the sound and the cognition are also apprehended.

original: 'di yin no zhes gang la nges par bya zhe na bshad pa /
analyzed: 'di yin no zhes gang la nges par bya zhe na bshad pa /
translated: But if one asks, ‚ÄúWhat is it?‚Äù

original: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa'i don grub pa po'i mngon sum nyid du nye bar dmigs pa de /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa'i don grub pa po'i mngon sum nyid du nye bar dmigs pa de /
translated: The answer is: ‚ÄúThe direct perception of the person who has established the object that is the basis of the apprehension.‚Äù

original: ldog par 'gyur du zin kyang dngos po med pa mi 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldog par 'gyur du zin kyang dngos po med pa mi 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if the apprehension is reversed, the non-existence is not mistaken.

original: med pa smos pa ni med pa'i sgra dang shes pa tha snyad nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
analyzed: med pa smos pa ni med pa'i sgra dang shes pa tha snyad nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
translated: The expression ‚Äúnon-existence‚Äù illustrates the sound and the cognition of non-existence.

original: dmigs pa smos pas ni shes pa yongs su gzung ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa smos pas ni shes pa yongs su gzung ste /
translated: By mentioning the object, consciousness is also included.

original: rtogs pa po'i dngos po spangs pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa po'i dngos po spangs pa'o //
translated: The existence of the cognizer is excluded.

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gyur pa gang yang rung ba'i 'di mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gyur pa gang yin par ci ste brjod ce na /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gyur pa gang yang rung ba'i 'di mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gyur pa gang yin par ci ste brjod ce na /
translated: Why is the transformation of the object characterized by non-apprehension said to be the transformation of the consciousness characterized by non-apprehension?

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIn that case, etc.‚Äù

original: de la zhes brjod pa'i ngag nye bar bkod pa'i don de rang bzhin khyad par can no //
analyzed: de la zhes brjod pa'i ngag nye bar bkod pa'i don de rang bzhin khyad par can no //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that case‚Äù refers to the statement that the object is the special nature.

original: ci 'di tsam nyid kyis yin na ma zhe na /
analyzed: ci 'di tsam nyid kyis yin na ma zhe na /
translated: If that is all there is, is it not so?

original: bshad pa rgyu mtshan gzhan tshogs pas de'i rang bzhin khyad par can la sogs pa dang gzhan dbang po dang yid la byed pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu gzhan te de dag ma lus pa'i tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa rgyu mtshan gzhan tshogs pas de'i rang bzhin khyad par can la sogs pa dang gzhan dbang po dang yid la byed pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu gzhan te de dag ma lus pa'i tshogs pa'o //
translated: The explanation is: ‚ÄúThe collection of other causes, etc.‚Äù The special nature, etc. are other causes. The collection of all of them is the collection of other causes.

original: rang bzhin khyad par can la ltos nas yang zhes bya ba'i sgra bsdu ba yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin khyad par can la ltos nas yang zhes bya ba'i sgra bsdu ba yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is inclusive, in reference to the special nature.

original: rang bzhin khyad par can 'di yang ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: rang bzhin khyad par can 'di yang ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: What is this special nature?

original: rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúnature‚Äù and so on.

original: gang bskal pa rnam pa gsum gyi ngo bo bsgribs pa ni yul dang dus dang rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid ri rab dang ra man dang lha ma la sogs pa'i ngo bo lta bu des ma bskal pa ni rang bzhin khyad par can du @66a * //
analyzed: gang bskal pa rnam pa gsum gyi ngo bo bsgribs pa ni yul dang dus dang rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid ri rab dang ra man dang lha ma la sogs pa'i ngo bo lta bu des ma bskal pa ni rang bzhin khyad par can du @66a * //
translated: That which is not obscured by the three kinds of obscurations, which have the nature of spatial, temporal, and essential distinctions, like the nature of Mount Meru, the RƒÅmaphera, the asura, and so on, is said to be a special nature.

original: brjod do // gang gi bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'o ni go bla'o //üîΩbdag gi ngo bo ma yin pa ni /
analyzed: brjod do // gang gi bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'o ni go bla'o // bdag gi ngo bo ma yin pa ni /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúwhose nature‚Äù and so on is easy to understand.üîΩ‚ÄúNot one‚Äôs own nature‚Äù means

original: bdag ni ngo bo ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: bdag ni ngo bo ma yin pa ste /
translated: ‚Äúnot one‚Äôs own nature.‚Äù

original: gzhan gyi ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is ‚Äúanother‚Äôs nature.‚Äù

original: de yang 'dir snang ba ste de dang bral ba ni med pa'o //
analyzed: de yang 'dir snang ba ste de dang bral ba ni med pa'o //
translated: And that is manifest here. Being free from that is nonexistence.

original: rnam pa des na rtogs pa po'i mngon sum des snang ba'i ngang tshul can gyi ngo bo gang yin pa de la de skad du bshad do //
analyzed: rnam pa des na rtogs pa po'i mngon sum des snang ba'i ngang tshul can gyi ngo bo gang yin pa de la de skad du bshad do //
translated: By that mode, that which is the nature of the mode of appearance of the direct perception of the cognizer is explained in that way.

original: yang na ngo bo'i sgras ni lhan cig 'dus pa'i khyad par can gyi 'bras bu dmigs pa'i rkyen ma lus pa yod kyang nye bar spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: yang na ngo bo'i sgras ni lhan cig 'dus pa'i khyad par can gyi 'bras bu dmigs pa'i rkyen ma lus pa yod kyang nye bar spangs pa yin no //
translated: Or else, the word ‚Äúnature‚Äù refers to the effect that is qualified by the presence of the assembled causes and conditions, and the object-condition is entirely abandoned.

original: gang rang gi rigs spangs pa'i bdag nyid snang ba dang bral ba'i rang gi shes pa gzhan gyi rgyu dang nye bar gyur ba gang yin pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gang rang gi rigs spangs pa'i bdag nyid snang ba dang bral ba'i rang gi shes pa gzhan gyi rgyu dang nye bar gyur ba gang yin pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the object is the appearance of the object that is the cause of the cognition, which is the nature of the cognition that is free from the appearance of the object, and which is the cause of the cognition that is free from the appearance of the object.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i zhes bya ba ni bskal ba rnam pa gsum gyis bskal ba'i don gyi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i zhes bya ba ni bskal ba rnam pa gsum gyis bskal ba'i don gyi ngo bo ste /
translated: ‚ÄúLike that‚Äù refers to the meaning of the word ‚Äúnature‚Äù in terms of the three types of kalpana.

original: de lta bu'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i ngo bo snang ba dang bral ba ni snang ba'i ngo bo mi dmigs par 'gyur ba med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i ngo bo snang ba dang bral ba ni snang ba'i ngo bo mi dmigs par 'gyur ba med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin te /
translated: The nature that is not of that kind, which is free from the appearance of the object, is the object of the verbal convention ‚Äúnon-apprehension of the appearance of the object.‚Äù

original: med pa'i tha snyad du bya ba rtogs par rung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad du bya ba rtogs par rung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is suitable to be understood as the verbal convention ‚Äúnon-existence,‚Äù which is the meaning.

original: dbang po dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa yod du zin kyang med pa ni nye bar mi dmigs na de dang bral ba de ji ltar med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du gyur ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: dbang po dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa yod du zin kyang med pa ni nye bar mi dmigs na de dang bral ba de ji ltar med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du gyur ba yin zhe na /
translated: Even though the sense faculty, object, and attention exist, if the nonexistence of the object is not observed, how can that which is devoid of the object be the object of the term nonexistence?

original: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa gzhan dag yod pa smos so //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa gzhan dag yod pa smos so //
translated: The response is that other objects of observation exist.

original: 'o na bum pa la sogs pa bskal ba ma yin pa nye bar dmigs pa'i rgyu gzhan yin par yod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'o na bum pa la sogs pa bskal ba ma yin pa nye bar dmigs pa'i rgyu gzhan yin par yod pa yin te /
translated: But the cause of the nonobservation of a pot, for example, is the existence of another object.

original: rgyun yongs su gyur pa la ltos pa'i phyir mi dmigs so zhe na /
analyzed: rgyun yongs su gyur pa la ltos pa'i phyir mi dmigs so zhe na /
translated: It is not observed because it depends on the transformation of the continuum.

original: gzhan dang nye ba tsam ni rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa'i nus pa yongs su gyur pa las byung ba ni rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dang nye ba tsam ni rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa'i nus pa yongs su gyur pa las byung ba ni rgyu ma yin te /
translated: The mere proximity of another is not the cause of the transformation of the potency to generate its own effect.

original: 'di ltar sa dang chu la sogs pa'i tshogs pa yod du zin kyang ta la'i sa bon gyis rang gi 'bras bu bskyed pa na dus yun ring por na 'byung ba yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar sa dang chu la sogs pa'i tshogs pa yod du zin kyang ta la'i sa bon gyis rang gi 'bras bu bskyed pa na dus yun ring por na 'byung ba yin la /
translated: Thus, even though a collection of earth, water, and so on exists, the effect of a palm fruit arises after a long time when the palm seed generates its own effect.

original: sha pa la sogs pa'i sa bon las ni de ma thag tu 'byung ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: sha pa la sogs pa'i sa bon las ni de ma thag tu 'byung ba kho na yin no //
translated: But from seeds such as rice, they arise only immediately.

original: de ltar na 'dir yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar na 'dir yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: So too, here, they arise.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor pa mthu dang ldan pa dang sha za dang sgyu ma byed pa la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs par gyur ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de yod du zin kyang dmigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor pa mthu dang ldan pa dang sha za dang sgyu ma byed pa la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs par gyur ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de yod du zin kyang dmigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, even though the object that is the basis of the power of the yogi, or the object that is the basis of the power of the ghost or magician, exists, it is not perceived.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa gzhan yod kyang mi @66b dmigs pa ni med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du gyur pa bshad pa de ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa gzhan yod kyang mi @66b dmigs pa ni med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du gyur pa bshad pa de ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: But even though another object that is similar to it exists, it is not perceived. How can that be explained to be the object of the convention of nonexistence?

original: khyod rigs pa'i thigs pa la yang 'bad pa byas pa nyungs pa yin te /
analyzed: khyod rigs pa'i thigs pa la yang 'bad pa byas pa nyungs pa yin te /
translated: You have not studied the Drop of Logic very much,

original: 'di ltar rang bzhin yod la dmigs pa'i rkyen tshang na mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes de skad du bshad do //
analyzed: 'di ltar rang bzhin yod la dmigs pa'i rkyen tshang na mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes de skad du bshad do //
translated: because it explains that if the conditions for perceiving the existent essence are complete, it is directly perceived.

original: gang yang rgyun yongs su gyur pa ltos pa 'di nyid dang mthu dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin khyad par can du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang yang rgyun yongs su gyur pa ltos pa 'di nyid dang mthu dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin khyad par can du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Also, the continuum that has completely transformed is dependent on this very thing, and it is empowered by the power of that. Therefore, it does not become a different nature.

original: dmigs pa'i rkyen gzhan yang ma lus pa nye ba yin pa yang rang gi yul du ngo bo la nye bar dmigs pa mi bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rkyen gzhan yang ma lus pa nye ba yin pa yang rang gi yul du ngo bo la nye bar dmigs pa mi bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Also, the other conditions, the objective condition, are present in their entirety, but they do not generate the perception of their object.

original: rnam pa de lta bu 'am sha za ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin khyad par gyi ngo bo ma yin pas med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu 'am sha za ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin khyad par gyi ngo bo ma yin pas med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du mi 'grub bo //
translated: Since it is not a different nature, such as the nature of a flesh-eater, it is not established as the object of the convention of nonexistence.

original: de ltar 'o na dbang po la sogs pa dmigs pa'i rkyen gzhan tshang ba'i yod pa ni mngon sum du ma gyur na /üîΩde ltar thams cad du med pa /
analyzed: de ltar 'o na dbang po la sogs pa dmigs pa'i rkyen gzhan tshang ba'i yod pa ni mngon sum du ma gyur na / de ltar thams cad du med pa /
translated: If the other conditions, such as the sense faculty, are complete, but the existence of the object is not directly perceived,

original: sgrub par byed par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then in that case, it is not established as nonexistent.üîΩIf it is not established as existent, then it is not established as nonexistent.

original: rjes su mthun pa legs par brjod na dbang po nyams pa la sogs pa gang yin pa 'di nyid kyis ma lus pa mthong ba'i lam du 'gro ba yin pas des na ma lus pa de ni dmigs pas med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du sgrub par byedüîΩpa yin gyi /
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa legs par brjod na dbang po nyams pa la sogs pa gang yin pa 'di nyid kyis ma lus pa mthong ba'i lam du 'gro ba yin pas des na ma lus pa de ni dmigs pas med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du sgrub par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, that which is not omniscient is established as an object of expression that does not exist by means of its object.üîΩBut it is not the case that such things as flesh-eating spirits are not transformed into special natures.

original: sha za la sogs pa rang bzhin khyad par can ma gyur pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ma thag tu bshad zin to //
analyzed: sha za la sogs pa rang bzhin khyad par can ma gyur pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ma thag tu bshad zin to //
translated: That was just explained.

original: rnam pa de lta bu yod cing gzhan dmigs pa'i rkyen mtha' dag nye bar gyur pas dmigs pa med par mi rigs te /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu yod cing gzhan dmigs pa'i rkyen mtha' dag nye bar gyur pas dmigs pa med par mi rigs te /
translated: Since such things exist and all the conditions for the observation of other things are present, it is not tenable that they are not observed.

original: mi dmigs par mi rung ba'i phyir dang / dmigs par skyes pa 'ga' zhig la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs par mi rung ba'i phyir dang / dmigs par skyes pa 'ga' zhig la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible that they are not observed and because it is not possible that they are observed without depending on something.

original: 'bras bu'i dus su dngos po med pa mi rtogs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshad ma rnam par des par gsal bar byas so //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i dus su dngos po med pa mi rtogs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshad ma rnam par des par gsal bar byas so //
translated: The Thorough Exposition of Valid Knowledge clearly explains that a nonexistent thing is not realized at the time of the effect.

original: gang dag la ta la dang sha na'i sa bon la sogs pa bzhin du nges par tshogs pa ma lus pa'i yongs su gyur ba dgongs pa phul du byung ba gzhung gi bzhed pa las rtogs pa chung du rtsod pa'i mchu can rtsod pa dag thams cad gzhung
analyzed: gang dag la ta la dang sha na'i sa bon la sogs pa bzhin du nges par tshogs pa ma lus pa'i yongs su gyur ba dgongs pa phul du byung ba gzhung gi bzhed pa las rtogs pa chung du rtsod pa'i mchu can rtsod pa dag thams cad gzhung
translated: Those who, like palm fruit and ≈õƒÅ·πáa seeds, definitely assert that the complete transformation of the collection of all parts is the meaning of the scriptures, and who have little understanding of the scriptures, are like those who have beaks for mouths.

original: nyid kyis gsal bar rig par bya ba ste /
analyzed: nyid kyis gsal bar rig par bya ba ste /
translated: All of them should be understood to be clearly refuted by the scriptures themselves.

original: gnas ma yin par nan gyis brjod pas chog ste gzhag go //üîΩde'i phyir dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa'i mi dmigs pas med pa'i tha @67a * //
analyzed: gnas ma yin par nan gyis brjod pas chog ste gzhag go // de'i phyir dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa'i mi dmigs pas med pa'i tha @67a * //
translated: It is enough to state this forcefully, but it should be set aside.

original: snyad sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas so //
analyzed: snyad sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas so //
translated: Therefore, this is the position: The non-observation of what can be observed establishes the term non-existent.

original: gang gi phyir de nyid yin pa de'i phyir de las ni rgyu'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de nyid yin pa de'i phyir de las ni rgyu'o //
translated: Since that is so, the cause is from that.

original: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa las mi dmigs par bshad pa las rnam pa gzhan du brtags na the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa las mi dmigs par bshad pa las rnam pa gzhan du brtags na the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: From the explanation of non-observation of what can be observed, if one imagines it in another way, there is doubt.

original: gal te med pa'i tha snyad sgrub par byed pa ni mi dmigs pa tsam gyi rtags gzhan gyis khas blangs pa de de las the tshom za bar 'gyur bas med pa'i tha snyad sgrub pa'i nges pa med do //
analyzed: gal te med pa'i tha snyad sgrub par byed pa ni mi dmigs pa tsam gyi rtags gzhan gyis khas blangs pa de de las the tshom za bar 'gyur bas med pa'i tha snyad sgrub pa'i nges pa med do //
translated: If the non-existence of something is established by the mere non-apprehension of it, then the evidence of the other's acceptance of it would be doubted, and there would be no certainty of establishing the non-existence of it.

original: dmigs pa log kyang don med par mi 'grub bo zhes bya ba bsdu ba'i don yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa log kyang don med par mi 'grub bo zhes bya ba bsdu ba'i don yin no //
translated: The meaning of the summary is that even if the apprehension is negated, the non-existence of the object is not established.

original: yang na snang ba mi dmigs pas don dam gzhan du rtags ni the tshom za ba nye ba yin zhes bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na snang ba mi dmigs pas don dam gzhan du rtags ni the tshom za ba nye ba yin zhes bshad par bya'o //
translated: Or else, it should be explained that the evidence is doubted because of the non-apprehension of the appearance of the other ultimate.

original: de la zhes smos pas ni snga ma la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: de la zhes smos pas ni snga ma la ltos pa'o //
translated: The word there refers to the previous [statement].

original: yang na dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa de las gzhan pa de ni the tshom za ba'i rtags zhes bshad do //
analyzed: yang na dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa de las gzhan pa de ni the tshom za ba'i rtags zhes bshad do //
translated: Or else, it is explained that the evidence of that which is other than the object of apprehension is doubted.

original: 'dir yang mi dmigs pa'i khyab pa ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir yang mi dmigs pa'i khyab pa ji ltar zhe na /
translated: Here, how is the pervasion of non-apprehension?

original: 'dir yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says here also, etc.

original: rnam pa de lta bu zhes bya ba ni snang du rung ba'i yod pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu zhes bya ba ni snang du rung ba'i yod pa mi dmigs so //
translated: That kind means the non-apprehension of the existence that is suitable to appear.

original: thams cad smos pa ni thams cad nye bar bsdus nas khyab pa bstan pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: thams cad smos pa ni thams cad nye bar bsdus nas khyab pa bstan pa'i don yin no //
translated: The mention of all is for the purpose of teaching the pervasion by including all.üîΩIf the horns of a rabbit, etc., are the object of the expression non-apprehension because they are the object of apprehension of something, then why is it not so for other universals, particulars, wholes, substances, etc.,

original: gal te ri bong gi mgo la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la rva dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa las mi dmigs pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du gyur kyang gzhan spyi dang bye brag dang yan lag can dang rdzas dang ldan pa rnam par dbye ba la sogs pa
analyzed: gal te ri bong gi mgo la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la rva dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa las mi dmigs pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du gyur kyang gzhan spyi dang bye brag dang yan lag can dang rdzas dang ldan pa rnam par dbye ba la sogs pa
translated: which are also the object of the expression non-apprehension because they are the object of apprehension of something?

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i de bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i nges pa ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i de bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i nges pa ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: What is the certainty that they are like that?

original: 'ga' zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /üîΩ'ga' zhig dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa las mi dmigs pa'i ri bong gi rva la sogs pa'i med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du khas blangs pa ni med pa'i tha snyad la sogs pa'i yul dag ni med pa yin no zhes bshad pa dang mtshan nyid khyad
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te / 'ga' zhig dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa las mi dmigs pa'i ri bong gi rva la sogs pa'i med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du khas blangs pa ni med pa'i tha snyad la sogs pa'i yul dag ni med pa yin no zhes bshad pa dang mtshan nyid khyad
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIf something, etc.‚Äù

original: par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The horns of a rabbit, etc., are accepted as the object of the expression non-apprehension because they are the object of apprehension of something, but the objects of the expression non-existence, etc., are non-existent, because there is no difference in the definition of the object of the expression non-apprehension and the object of the expression non-existence, etc.

original: de'i med pa'i mtshan nyid de ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i med pa'i mtshan nyid de ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: The definition of that non-existence is the non-apprehension explained above.

original: mtshan nyid smos pa ni rgyu dang sgrub par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid smos pa ni rgyu dang sgrub par byed pa yin te /
translated: The mention of the definition is the cause and the proof,

original: de dang khyad par med pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang khyad par med pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not different from that.

original: spyi dang bye brag can dang yan lag can rdzas la sogs pa zhes bya ba tshig lhag ma'o //
analyzed: spyi dang bye brag can dang yan lag can rdzas la sogs pa zhes bya ba tshig lhag ma'o //
translated: The remainder of the sentence is ‚Äúthe universal, the particular, the whole, substance, etc.‚Äù

original: 'di @67b skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di @67b skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught:

original: ri bong gi rva la sogs pa med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du ci'i phyir 'dod /
analyzed: ri bong gi rva la sogs pa med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du ci'i phyir 'dod /
translated: Why do you accept that the object of the convention of non-existence is the horn of a rabbit, etc.?

original: ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa de'i rgyu mtshan du yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa de'i rgyu mtshan du yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the reason for that non-apprehension explained above exists.

original: gal te de ltar spyi dang bye brag la sogs pa yang yod pa yin na ci'i phyir de dag med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul nyid du khas blang par mi bya /
analyzed: gal te de ltar spyi dang bye brag la sogs pa yang yod pa yin na ci'i phyir de dag med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul nyid du khas blang par mi bya /
translated: If the universal, the particular, etc. exist in that way, why do you not accept that they are the object of the convention of non-existence?

original: de lta ma yin na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na /
translated: If it is not so,

original: de la yang der mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la yang der mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would not be so for that either.

original: skyes bu'i 'dod pa'i dbang gis yul gyi rnam par dbye ba ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: skyes bu'i 'dod pa'i dbang gis yul gyi rnam par dbye ba ni mi rigs so //
translated: It is not tenable that the classification of objects is due to the power of the wish of a person.

original: rnam pa de lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa de nyid rnam par 'byed pa rnam pa de lta bu snang du yod pa'i mi dmigs pa'i med par khas mi len na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yul khas mi len to zhes bya ba'i don to
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa de nyid rnam par 'byed pa rnam pa de lta bu snang du yod pa'i mi dmigs pa'i med par khas mi len na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yul khas mi len to zhes bya ba'i don to
translated: ‚ÄúSuch a form‚Äù and so on. If one does not accept the non-apprehension of something that could appear in such a form as the object of the expression ‚Äúnon-existence,‚Äù then one does not accept the object of the expression ‚Äúnon-existence.‚Äù

original: // med pa smos pa ni med pa'i tha snyad pa la sogs pa'i yul nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
analyzed: // med pa smos pa ni med pa'i tha snyad pa la sogs pa'i yul nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
translated: The mention of ‚Äúnon-existence‚Äù illustrates the object of the expression ‚Äúnon-existence.‚Äù

original: dmigs su rung ba'i mi dmigs pa de yang dgag pa'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dmigs su rung ba'i mi dmigs pa de yang dgag pa'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: And that non-apprehension of what is suitable to be apprehended is the reason for the negation.

original: ri bong gi rva la sogs pa gzhan la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i med par rung ba srid pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ri bong gi rva la sogs pa gzhan la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i med par rung ba srid pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In the case of other things, such as the horn of an ass, it is possible that there is a suitable ‚Äúnon-existence‚Äù in such a form.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i snang du rung ba ni dmigs pa'i rkyen gzhan dag yod na mi dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i snang du rung ba ni dmigs pa'i rkyen gzhan dag yod na mi dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If something is suitable to appear in such a form, then it is not the case that it is not apprehended when the other conditions of apprehension are present.

original: de ci dang 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: de ci dang 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: bshad pa gzhan dmigs pa'i rkyen 'ga' zhig la ltos pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: bshad pa gzhan dmigs pa'i rkyen 'ga' zhig la ltos pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that it is not dependent on any other condition, such as the objective condition.

original: des na 'di ni rnal ma nyid gsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di ni rnal ma nyid gsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is a clear statement of the truth.

original: mi dmigs pa ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is the non-apprehension like?

original: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa med pa yin pa'i phyir 'dir dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa de las ma dmigs pa de tsam las rgyu mtshan yin te /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa med pa yin pa'i phyir 'dir dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa de las ma dmigs pa de tsam las rgyu mtshan yin te /
translated: Because it is not an object of apprehension, here the non-apprehension of that is the reason for the mere non-apprehension of that object of apprehension.

original: med pa'i tha snyad du rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad du rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is suitable as the basis for the expression of non-existence.

original: des na 'dir tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan gzhan ma yin par bstan to //
analyzed: des na 'dir tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan gzhan ma yin par bstan to //
translated: Therefore, here it is taught that there is no other basis for the expression.

original: de nyid gang las she na /
analyzed: de nyid gang las she na /
translated: From what is that so?

original: gzhan te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gzhan te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: It is said other than that... and so on.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa spangs na med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan gzhan med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba bsdu ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa spangs na med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan gzhan med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba bsdu ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the summary is that, apart from the non-apprehension as explained, there is no other basis for the expression of non-existence.

original: gang dang gang las cung zad cig nus pa med pa de dang de ni med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin te /
analyzed: gang dang gang las cung zad cig nus pa med pa de dang de ni med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin te /
translated: Whatever is not capable of anything is the object of the convention of non-existence.

original: dper na nam mkha'i pad mo bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha'i pad mo bzhin no //
translated: For example, like a sky-lotus.

original: de bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa'i yul la sogs pa la cung zad cig nus pa med pa'i phyir med par 'dod @68a * //üîΩpa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa'i yul la sogs pa la cung zad cig nus pa med pa'i phyir med par 'dod @68a * // pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, because of not being capable of anything with regard to the object of desire, etc., it is accepted as non-existent.

original: nus pa thams cad kyis dben pa nyid med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan du gyur na /
analyzed: nus pa thams cad kyis dben pa nyid med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan du gyur na /
translated: If the mere absence of all capacity were the reason for the convention of non-existence,

original: de ltar 'brel ba med par gzengs bstod nas brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar 'brel ba med par gzengs bstod nas brjod pa yin no //
translated: then it would be a praise without a reason.

original: de ni rgyu mtshan med pa'i las yin no zhes gzhan 'ga' zhig de skad du smra ba'i dgos pa ni /
analyzed: de ni rgyu mtshan med pa'i las yin no zhes gzhan 'ga' zhig de skad du smra ba'i dgos pa ni /
translated: Some other person says this: ‚ÄúIt is a non-reasoned action.‚Äù

original: gal te nus pa thams cad kyis dben pa'i rgyu mtshan yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te nus pa thams cad kyis dben pa'i rgyu mtshan yin zhe na /
translated: If the reason is the absence of all capacity,

original: 'di ltar lan ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar lan ni /
translated: the answer is as follows.

original: de ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúIf that were so,‚Äù etc.

original: 'di snyam du sems pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du sems pa yin te /
translated: This is what is thought:

original: nus pa thams cad kyis dben pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no zhes bshad pa legs na 'on kyang de nyid thams cad kyis dben pa'i don yin par ji skad bshad pa'i ma dmigs pa spangs nas ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: nus pa thams cad kyis dben pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no zhes bshad pa legs na 'on kyang de nyid thams cad kyis dben pa'i don yin par ji skad bshad pa'i ma dmigs pa spangs nas ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: If it is said that the reason is the absence of all capacity, that is good. But how can one understand that absence of all capacity, having rejected the non-apprehension explained above, which is the meaning of absence of all capacity?

original: nus pa thams cad kyis dben pa gang gis med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan du gyur pa yin pa 'dir mi shes pa nyid kyis de'i rgyu mtshan 'os pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nus pa thams cad kyis dben pa gang gis med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan du gyur pa yin pa 'dir mi shes pa nyid kyis de'i rgyu mtshan 'os pa ma yin te /
translated: Since one does not know by what absence of all capacity it becomes the reason for the designation of non-existence, it is not suitable as the reason for that.

original: shes byed kyi gtan tshigs kyi dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes byed kyi gtan tshigs kyi dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is from the point of view of the logical reason that proves it.

original: nus pa thams cad kyis dben par ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa ci'i phyir rtogs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: nus pa thams cad kyis dben par ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa ci'i phyir rtogs pa yin zhe na /
translated: Why is the absence of all capacity understood by the non-apprehension explained above?

original: de rtogs pa'i thabs gzhan med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de rtogs pa'i thabs gzhan med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: It is said: because there is no other means of understanding it.

original: gang gi tshe ji skad du bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa des nus pa thams cad kyis dben par rtogs par gyur pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe ji skad du bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa des nus pa thams cad kyis dben par rtogs par gyur pa de'i tshe /
translated: When it is understood that the absence of all capacity is understood by the non-apprehension explained above,

original: rtogs pa yod na med pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa yod na med pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur ro //
translated: If there were an existent, there would be the convention of non-existence.

original: phyir zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
analyzed: phyir zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
translated: ‚Äú Because‚Äù means ‚Äúfor that reason.‚Äù

original: ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa 'di ni med pa'i tha snyad de'i rgyu mtshan du brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i mi dmigs pa 'di ni med pa'i tha snyad de'i rgyu mtshan du brjod pa yin no //
translated: This non-apprehension, as explained, is stated as the reason for the convention of non-existence.

original: slar yang gzhan dag med pa la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan 'ga' zhig tu de skad du brjod pa yin no zhes dogs par ni /
analyzed: slar yang gzhan dag med pa la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan 'ga' zhig tu de skad du brjod pa yin no zhes dogs par ni /
translated: Again, others suspect that the reason for non-existence, etc., is stated in some other way.

original: gal te sgra dang blo dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te sgra dang blo dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú If sound, cognition, and the performance of function‚Äù and so on.

original: 'dir bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The thought here is this:

original: blo dang sgra dang don byed pa dag las yod par tha snyad du gyur te /
analyzed: blo dang sgra dang don byed pa dag las yod par tha snyad du gyur te /
translated: The convention of existence occurs from cognition, sound, and the performance of function.

original: de ltar na de la 'jug pas dngos po yod par sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar na de la 'jug pas dngos po yod par sgrub par byed do //
translated: Thus, by engaging in that, one establishes the existence of things.

original: de tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pas dngos po tha mi dad par 'gyur ro snyam du sems dang de bzlog pa'i rang gi rgyu mtshan gyis yod pa'i tha snyad bzlog pa yin te /
analyzed: de tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pas dngos po tha mi dad par 'gyur ro snyam du sems dang de bzlog pa'i rang gi rgyu mtshan gyis yod pa'i tha snyad bzlog pa yin te /
translated: One thinks that because of being different or not different, things would not be different. The convention of existence is refuted by that reason which refutes that.

original: me dang du ba bzhin de bzlog pas med pa tha snyad yin no//
analyzed: me dang du ba bzhin de bzlog pas med pa tha snyad yin no//
translated: Like fire and smoke, the opposite of that is the convention of non-existence.

original: @68b yod pa'i tha snyad dang / med pa'i tha snyad dag phan tshun rnam par bcad nas gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gcig spangs na gzhan yongs su gcod pa ni med na mi 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @68b yod pa'i tha snyad dang / med pa'i tha snyad dag phan tshun rnam par bcad nas gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gcig spangs na gzhan yongs su gcod pa ni med na mi 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the convention of existence and the convention of non-existence are mutually exclusive and remain as their own nature, if one is eliminated, the other is excluded. Because if one does not exist, the other does not occur.

original: blo la sogs pa des kyang med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir dang gzhan med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i de skad bshad pa'i rigs pa ma yin pas 'di yang bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: blo la sogs pa des kyang med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir dang gzhan med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i de skad bshad pa'i rigs pa ma yin pas 'di yang bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: And because that cognition, etc. is not the cause of the convention of non-existence, it is not the cause of the convention of existence, and because there is nothing else. Because of such reasoning, this is also refuted.

original: ji skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ji skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, etc.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i blo la snang ba ni sgrub pa po'i mngon sum la snang ba med pa'i ngo bo snang ba ste /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i blo la snang ba ni sgrub pa po'i mngon sum la snang ba med pa'i ngo bo snang ba ste /
translated: The appearance in the cognition explained above is the appearance of the nature of non-existence in the perception of the proponent.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i snang ba gang yin pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i snang ba gang yin pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: It is connected with whatever appearance is explained above.

original: gang gi ngo bo ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa des yod pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi ngo bo ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa des yod pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur te /
translated: The explanation of ‚Äúthat which is not the entity of that‚Äù and so on is the convention of existence,

original: dngos po mngon sum du 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po mngon sum du 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the apprehension of an entity.

original: de las bzlog pa'i dngos po med pa de ni med pa'i tha snyad yin te /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa'i dngos po med pa de ni med pa'i tha snyad yin te /
translated: The opposite of that entity is the nonexistence of that, which is the convention of nonexistence.

original: dmigs pa'i rkyen gzhan yod kyang zhes bya ba ni ngag yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rkyen gzhan yod kyang zhes bya ba ni ngag yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: Even though the other conditions are present,

original: gzhan du ni the tshom skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du ni the tshom skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: otherwise doubt would arise.

original: dngos po yod pa'i rkyen gzhan tshang na ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni kho bo cag gis sngar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po yod pa'i rkyen gzhan tshang na ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni kho bo cag gis sngar bstan pa yin no //
translated: We have already explained that if the conditions for the existence of an entity are complete, it will not cease.

original: des na rnam pa 'di lta bu blo mngon par 'di ni khyed dang 'u cag de 'dod pa gcig par de ltar na yang kho bo la mi 'dod pa bshad pa cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: des na rnam pa 'di lta bu blo mngon par 'di ni khyed dang 'u cag de 'dod pa gcig par de ltar na yang kho bo la mi 'dod pa bshad pa cung zad kyang med do //
translated: Therefore, we and you agree that this kind of cognition is manifest.

original: de lta ma yin na de ni 'khrul bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na de ni 'khrul bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to /
translated: Otherwise, it would be mistaken.

original: 'khrul pa de nyid bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'khrul pa de nyid bstan pa ni /
translated: The error in that is shown:

original: mngon sum gyi yul ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi yul ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe object of direct perception is not the object of inference.‚Äù

original: rtags las skyes pa ni rtags las skyes pa ste /
analyzed: rtags las skyes pa ni rtags las skyes pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúArisen from a logical reason‚Äù means arisen from a logical reason.

original: rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúinference‚Äù is that.

original: des yod pa'i tha snyad du byed pa ni /
analyzed: des yod pa'i tha snyad du byed pa ni /
translated: The designation of existence by that is

original: lkog tu gyur pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa'i don yin no //
translated: the object that is hidden.

original: 'ba' zhig ma yin te bshad ma thag pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni rang gi gzung bar bya ba yin pas kyang zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig ma yin te bshad ma thag pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni rang gi gzung bar bya ba yin pas kyang zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Not only that, the immediately preceding intrinsic nature is also the object to be grasped.

original: rtags thams cad kyis yod par 'gyur ram zhe na /
analyzed: rtags thams cad kyis yod par 'gyur ram zhe na /
translated: Does every logical reason have that?

original: ma yin te 'ga' zhig ces bya ba smos so //
analyzed: ma yin te 'ga' zhig ces bya ba smos so //
translated: No, it is said ‚Äúsome.‚Äù

original: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu'i rtags gnyis kyi stobs las skyes ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu'i rtags gnyis kyi stobs las skyes ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it arises from the power of the two logical reasons of nature and effect.

original: @69a * // mi dmigs pa ni med pa'i tha snyad sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: @69a * // mi dmigs pa ni med pa'i tha snyad sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The idea is that non-observation establishes the designation of non-existence.

original: gal te de lta na de ltas ji ltar 'khrul bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na de ltas ji ltar 'khrul bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If that is so, how can there be error in that?

original: med pa tha snyad ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: med pa tha snyad ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe conventional of nonexistence‚Äù and so on.

original: de las bzlog pa ni ji skad bshad pa'i rtags las skyes pa ma yin pa'i blo de bzlog pa na ma nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa ni ji skad bshad pa'i rtags las skyes pa ma yin pa'i blo de bzlog pa na ma nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The opposite of that is the opposite of the awareness that is not produced from the reason explained above. The meaning is that it is uncertain.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bskal ba'i don phung po la sogs pa bskal ba rtogs pa'i mngon sum gyi tshad ma ldog pa yang the tshom rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bskal ba'i don phung po la sogs pa bskal ba rtogs pa'i mngon sum gyi tshad ma ldog pa yang the tshom rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the repudiation of the object of the kalpa, such as the aggregates, is the cause of doubt regarding the valid knowledge of direct perception that comprehends the kalpa.

original: med pa'i don la zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: med pa'i don la zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthe object of nonexistence‚Äù is the remainder.

original: rtogs pa pa'i mngon sum zhes bya ba ni drug pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa pa'i mngon sum zhes bya ba ni drug pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe direct perception of the tƒ´rthikas‚Äù is the sixth.

original: shes bya ma lus pa'i sgrub pa spangs pa'i mngon sum 'di log na ni tshe tshom mi za bar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: shes bya ma lus pa'i sgrub pa spangs pa'i mngon sum 'di log na ni tshe tshom mi za bar brjod pa yin no //
translated: If this direct perception that abandons the establishment of all objects of knowledge is repudiated, it is said to be undoubtable.

original: gzhan i rjes su dpag pa dang lung ngo //
analyzed: gzhan i rjes su dpag pa dang lung ngo //
translated: The other two are inference and scripture.

original: lung gi tshad ma 'dis rtogs par bya ba rjod pa la tshad ma yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: lung gi tshad ma 'dis rtogs par bya ba rjod pa la tshad ma yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The object of comprehension of this valid knowledge of scripture is not expressed by valid knowledge,

original: med na mi 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
