analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no invariable relation.

original: sgra dang dngos po rnams lhan cig tu don mi 'grub ste de dang de ni smra ba po bsam pa ston pa yin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: sgra dang dngos po rnams lhan cig tu don mi 'grub ste de dang de ni smra ba po bsam pa ston pa yin no zhes brjod do //
translated: Sound and things do not establish their meaning together, for that is what shows the speaker‚Äôs intention.

original: 'dir bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The idea here is this:

original: gal te tshad ma log pa mngon sum med pa de lta na yang med do zhes gang las nges par 'gyur //
analyzed: gal te tshad ma log pa mngon sum med pa de lta na yang med do zhes gang las nges par 'gyur //
translated: If the cessation of a valid cognition is not directly perceived, then how can one ascertain that it does not exist?

original: ji ltar ma la ya'i ri yul na rgyud nga d'ur ba'i lo ma la sogs pa tshad ma'i spyod yul las pa'i dngos po can bstan du yod par gnas pa ma yin no zhes zhes brjod par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar ma la ya'i ri yul na rgyud nga d'ur ba'i lo ma la sogs pa tshad ma'i spyod yul las pa'i dngos po can bstan du yod par gnas pa ma yin no zhes zhes brjod par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: Just as one cannot say that the leaves of the mango tree and so on in the Malaya region do not exist, even though they are not within the range of a valid cognition.

original: tshad ma med pa ni yul mtha' dag gis khyab par byed pa dang rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma med pa ni yul mtha' dag gis khyab par byed pa dang rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the absence of a valid cognition does not pervade the entire object, nor is it the cause of the object.

original: de'i ngo bo tshang bas don la ni nges pa ni nges par gzhan ldog pa ma yin te ha can thal bar 'gyur ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba 'di snga ma bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo tshang bas don la ni nges pa ni nges par gzhan ldog pa ma yin te ha can thal bar 'gyur ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba 'di snga ma bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: As for the ascertainment of an object by the completeness of its nature, it is not necessarily the exclusion of another. This fault of absurd consequence should be understood as before.

original: gang gi phyir bshad na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bshad na /
translated: For what reason is this explained?

original: bstan bcos la brten zhes 'brel pa med pa'i don mang po dbang po las 'das pa dang rtags med pa de dag ji ltar mi dmigs pas med par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: bstan bcos la brten zhes 'brel pa med pa'i don mang po dbang po las 'das pa dang rtags med pa de dag ji ltar mi dmigs pas med par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: But how can the many meanings that are not related to the treatise, that are beyond the senses, and that are not indicated, be nonexistent due to non-observation?

original: 'o na 'di rtags las skyes par 'dod pa med pa tha snyad kyi gtan tshigs nyid dgag pa rtsom pa na de las bzlog pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pas mngon sum dang lung la ltos pa de skabs ma yin de ci'i phyir brjod
analyzed: 'o na 'di rtags las skyes par 'dod pa med pa tha snyad kyi gtan tshigs nyid dgag pa rtsom pa na de las bzlog pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pas mngon sum dang lung la ltos pa de skabs ma yin de ci'i phyir brjod
translated: Well then, when one composes a refutation of the conventional reason that is not accepted as arising from a reason, one states ‚Äúit is the opposite of that‚Äù and so on. Why is it stated that it is not dependent on either direct perception or scripture?

original: ce na / de @69b ni rigs pa na tshad ma thams cad log pa thams cad tshad ma yin par bstan pas 'di yang nges pa med par bstan cing bshad pa ni blo gros bzang pos rtogs pa'i dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: ce na / de @69b ni rigs pa na tshad ma thams cad log pa thams cad tshad ma yin par bstan pas 'di yang nges pa med par bstan cing bshad pa ni blo gros bzang pos rtogs pa'i dgongs pa yin no //
translated: That is explained by the statement that all valid cognitions are invalidated by reasoning, and it is taught that this is also uncertain. This is the intention that should be understood by the wise.

original: yod pa'i tha snyad dang med pa'i tha snyad dag phan tshun rnam par gcod pa'i mtshan nyid du gnas pa gcig med na mi 'byung bar yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa'i tha snyad dang med pa'i tha snyad dag phan tshun rnam par gcod pa'i mtshan nyid du gnas pa gcig med na mi 'byung bar yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The conventions of existence and nonexistence are mutually exclusive, because one does not occur without the other.

original: bskal ba'i rgyu mtshan des yod pa'i tha snyad pa na med pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: bskal ba'i rgyu mtshan des yod pa'i tha snyad pa na med pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that the conventional existence of something is reversed by the reason of its nonexistence in the three times, then the conventional nonexistence of something would be reversed by the reason of its existence in the three times.

original: smras pa ni bden na de yang rigs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: smras pa ni bden na de yang rigs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: We say that this is true, but that is illogical.

original: 'di ltar skor du yod pa'i don la yod pa'i tha snyad log pa na /
analyzed: 'di ltar skor du yod pa'i don la yod pa'i tha snyad log pa na /
translated: Because the meaning of ‚Äúexists‚Äù is reversed by the conventional term ‚Äúexists,‚Äù

original: de'i rgyu mtshan med pas kyang gnyi ga yang 'di ltar 'dir mi dmigs par 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan med pas kyang gnyi ga yang 'di ltar 'dir mi dmigs par 'gyur /
translated: then, since there is no reason for it, both would be unobservable here.

original: rang dang bzlog pa'i gtan tshigs yod pa dang med pa dag gis yod pa'i tha snyad dgag pa'i 'bras bu can nyid du mtshungs kyang gcig ni the tshom can yin la /
analyzed: rang dang bzlog pa'i gtan tshigs yod pa dang med pa dag gis yod pa'i tha snyad dgag pa'i 'bras bu can nyid du mtshungs kyang gcig ni the tshom can yin la /
translated: The reason that reverses and the reason that does not reverse are similar in that they both have the effect of reversing the conventional term ‚Äúexists.‚Äù However, one is uncertain,

original: gzhan las ni ldog pa yin no zhes bya bar brjod la /üîΩthe tshom za ba yin no; ;
analyzed: gzhan las ni ldog pa yin no zhes bya bar brjod la / the tshom za ba yin no; ;
translated: while the other is reversed.

original: gal te de lta na med pa'i tha snyad nges pa de la rigs par mi 'thad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de lta na med pa'i tha snyad nges pa de la rigs par mi 'thad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that is so, it is illogical that the conventional term ‚Äúdoes not exist‚Äù is ascertained in that.

original: gang la yod pa'i tha dad du nges par ldog pa dang de la med pa'i tha snyad kyang rigs pa kho na yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang la yod pa'i tha dad du nges par ldog pa dang de la med pa'i tha snyad kyang rigs pa kho na yin no zhe na /
translated: And it is also correct to say that the exclusion of what does not exist in something is the convention of existence.

original: gzhan 'jug pa'i 'bras bu can yang yin no zhes bya bar bshad zin to //
analyzed: gzhan 'jug pa'i 'bras bu can yang yin no zhes bya bar bshad zin to //
translated: It has already been explained that the result of the exclusion of what is other is the existence of something.

original: med pa'i dngos po rnam par gcod pas yod pa'i zhar la nges pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: med pa'i dngos po rnam par gcod pas yod pa'i zhar la nges pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The existence of something is not ascertained by implication from the exclusion of a nonexistent thing.

original: mo gsham gyi bu dang nam mkha'i padmo la sogs pa med pa'i bkag pas yod pa'i gnas skabs su gyur pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mo gsham gyi bu dang nam mkha'i padmo la sogs pa med pa'i bkag pas yod pa'i gnas skabs su gyur pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The negation of a nonexistent thing, such as the son of a barren woman or a sky-flower, does not become an occasion of existence.

original: dgag pa tsam du 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: dgag pa tsam du 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: It is merely a negation.

original: de dag phan tshun rnam par bcad nas gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag phan tshun rnam par bcad nas gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are mutually exclusive.

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang mngon sum ma yin pas yod pa'i tha snyad rnam par gcad pa na sgrub par gyur pa med pa tha snyad shugs las byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang mngon sum ma yin pas yod pa'i tha snyad rnam par gcad pa na sgrub par gyur pa med pa tha snyad shugs las byung ba ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, here, when the convention of existence is excluded by nonperception, the nonexistence that is established is not a conventional implication.

original: yod pa'i tha snyad rnam par gcad pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa'i tha snyad rnam par gcad pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is merely the exclusion of the convention of existence.

original: de yod pa dang med pa phan tshun yongs su spangs te gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod pa dang med pa phan tshun yongs su spangs te gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because existence and nonexistence are mutually exclusive.

original: dri ma med pa'i rigs pas de kho na nyid gsal bar rab tu rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis ma lus pa'i mu stegs can gyi gzhung gi rmongs pa spangs pa'i chos kyi grags pas bdag med pa la sogs pa rnam par gcod pa yang de bzhin du 'gyur
analyzed: dri ma med pa'i rigs pas de kho na nyid gsal bar rab tu rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis ma lus pa'i mu stegs can gyi gzhung gi rmongs pa spangs pa'i chos kyi grags pas bdag med pa la sogs pa rnam par gcod pa yang de bzhin du 'gyur
translated: Dharmakirti, who has completely abandoned the confusion of the scriptures of all the tirthikas through the wisdom that clearly and thoroughly realizes reality with stainless reasoning, has said that the exclusion of selflessness, etc., is just like that.

original: ro zhes bya ba la sogs @70a * //
analyzed: ro zhes bya ba la sogs @70a * //
translated: He has said this and more.

original: pa 'di skad bshad pa yin pas chog go //
analyzed: pa 'di skad bshad pa yin pas chog go //
translated: Therefore, this is sufficient explanation.

original: da ni blo dang sgra thun mong du gyur pa'i yod pa la 'jug pa'i gtan tshigs kyang ji ltar med pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: da ni blo dang sgra thun mong du gyur pa'i yod pa la 'jug pa'i gtan tshigs kyang ji ltar med pa yin zhe na /
translated: Now, how is the reason for engaging in existence, which is common to both the mind and words, nonexistent?

original: blo dang sgra zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: blo dang sgra zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúThe mind and words, etc.‚Äù

original: de la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: They should be applied in order.

original: ci'i blo dang sgra la sogs pa dngos po yod pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa yin nam /
analyzed: ci'i blo dang sgra la sogs pa dngos po yod pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa yin nam /
translated: Why are the mind, words, etc., the proof of all existent things?

original: de dag tha snyad pa dang tha snyad med pa 'am dngos po tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pas sam yod dam med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang yin /
analyzed: de dag tha snyad pa dang tha snyad med pa 'am dngos po tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pas sam yod dam med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang yin /
translated: They are conventional and non-conventional, or different and non-different entities, or existent and non-existent, etc.

original: thams cad smos pa ni 'ga' zhig sgrub par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad smos pa ni 'ga' zhig sgrub par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúall‚Äù is used because some are established.

original: gsal bar bya ba nyid gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: gsal bar bya ba nyid gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the illumination?

original: bshad pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa la sogs pa med pa dag la yang 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bshad pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa la sogs pa med pa dag la yang 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The explanation is: because they engage with non-existent past and future, etc.

original: sogs pa smos pa ni nam mkha'i autpala la sogs pa yongs su gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pa ni nam mkha'i autpala la sogs pa yongs su gzung ngo //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the sky-lotus, etc.

original: yul med pa yin na de rnams la de dag ji ltar 'jug par rigs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: yul med pa yin na de rnams la de dag ji ltar 'jug par rigs pa yin zhe na /
translated: If they are without objects, how is it possible for them to engage with those?

original: bshad pa ci zhig ltar de'i ngo bo myong bas byas ba'i bag chags smin pa las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bshad pa ci zhig ltar de'i ngo bo myong bas byas ba'i bag chags smin pa las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The explanation is: in whatever way, the arising from the maturation of the latent impressions produced by the experience of that nature. This is the meaning.

original: de dag dngos po 'brel ba med pa dag yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de dag dngos po 'brel ba med pa dag yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: They are unrelated to entities. This is the intended meaning.

original: 'khor los bsgyur ba dung gis zhes bya ba sogs pa'i rnam pa des 'di'i dngos po yod pa sgrub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'khor los bsgyur ba dung gis zhes bya ba sogs pa'i rnam pa des 'di'i dngos po yod pa sgrub pa ma yin no //
translated: The form of the cakravartin, the conch, etc., does not prove the existence of that entity.

original: de'i rnam pa bshad pa /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa bshad pa /
translated: The explanation of its form:

original: sna tshogs pa dang gcig pa'i bya ba byed pa'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa de dag de skad du brjod pa de dag la 'jug pa'i rgyus so //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa dang gcig pa'i bya ba byed pa'i ngang tshul can gang yin pa de dag de skad du brjod pa de dag la 'jug pa'i rgyus so //
translated: Those that have the nature of performing various and single actions are so-called because of the cause of their engagement.

original: ci'i phyir de dag la rnams 'jug ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de dag la rnams 'jug ce na /
translated: Why are they engaged in that?

original: de yod par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to show its existence.

original: de dag sna tshogs pa dang gcig pa'i bya ba byed pa dang yod par bstan te /
analyzed: de dag sna tshogs pa dang gcig pa'i bya ba byed pa dang yod par bstan te /
translated: They show the performance of various and single actions and existence.

original: sna tshogs pa don gyi bya ba byed pa dang gcig gi don gyi bya ba byed par brjod pa'i don yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa don gyi bya ba byed pa dang gcig gi don gyi bya ba byed par brjod pa'i don yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the performance of various actions and the performance of a single action are expressed as the meaning.

original: rgyu 'di nyid kyis de dngos po'i de nyid yin zhes bshad /
analyzed: rgyu 'di nyid kyis de dngos po'i de nyid yin zhes bshad /
translated: For this very reason, it is explained that that is the reality of entities.

original: sna tshogs pa dang gcig pa'i bdag nyid med pa'i bdag nyid kyang de'i dngos po yin no zhes sgro btags so //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa dang gcig pa'i bdag nyid med pa'i bdag nyid kyang de'i dngos po yin no zhes sgro btags so //
translated: The absence of a nature of various and single identity is also the reality of that. It is a superimposition.

original: blo dang sgra dag gis gcig dang du ma ngo bo ma yin la /üîΩdes ni 'di ni dngos po tha dad pa 'am /
analyzed: blo dang sgra dag gis gcig dang du ma ngo bo ma yin la / des ni 'di ni dngos po tha dad pa 'am /
translated: By the words ‚Äúmind‚Äù and ‚Äúsound,‚Äù [the Buddha] means that [the self] is neither a single entity nor a plurality.üîΩThis [self] is neither established as a different entity

original: tha mi dad pa sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: nor as an identical entity.

original: 'di'i dpe ston par byed pa la rgyal po mang pos @70b bkur bas ni 'das pa'i dpe'o //
analyzed: 'di'i dpe ston par byed pa la rgyal po mang pos @70b bkur bas ni 'das pa'i dpe'o //
translated: To illustrate this, [the Buddha] says, ‚ÄúJust as the king who is honored by many . . .‚Äù This is an example of the past.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba nye bar bkod pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba nye bar bkod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúJust as‚Äù is a reference to the present.

original: 'khor los sgyur ba dung zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ma 'ongs pa la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba dung zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ma 'ongs pa la 'jug pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe cakravartin named ≈öa·πÖkha . . .‚Äù and so on are examples of the future.

original: ri bong gi rva zhes bya ba la sogs pa shad pa yin no //
analyzed: ri bong gi rva zhes bya ba la sogs pa shad pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThe horn of a rabbit‚Äù and so on are examples of the impossible.

original: bstan du med pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa skyes pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: bstan du med pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa skyes pa'i phyir ro /
translated: [The self] is not visible because it does not produce eye consciousness.

original: thogs pa dang bcas pa ni rang gi yul du gzhan skyes ba'i dgag byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thogs pa dang bcas pa ni rang gi yul du gzhan skyes ba'i dgag byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is obstructive because it obstructs the arising of another [object] in its own place.

original: 'di dag sna tshogs pa'i don byed pa dag la 'jug pa de'i dpe yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag sna tshogs pa'i don byed pa dag la 'jug pa de'i dpe yin no //
translated: This is an example of how [the self] engages in the performance of various actions.

original: gang gi phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'i phyir gcig gi ngo bo yin yang du ma'i ngo bo bstan du yod pa la sogs pa'i yul du byed pa de'i phyir dngos po tha dad pa sgrub par mi byed
analyzed: gang gi phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'i phyir gcig gi ngo bo yin yang du ma'i ngo bo bstan du yod pa la sogs pa'i yul du byed pa de'i phyir dngos po tha dad pa sgrub par mi byed
translated: Because the eye consciousness and so on are the effect of the eye faculty and so on, they are taught to be the nature of many, even though they are the nature of one.

original: do // bum pa zhes bya ba ni don gyi bya ba byed pa dag gi dpe yin no /
analyzed: do // bum pa zhes bya ba ni don gyi bya ba byed pa dag gi dpe yin no /
translated: The example of the vase is the activity of the object.

original: 'di ltar gzugs dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dag mang pos chu 'dzin pa'i khyad par la sogs pa 'bras bu sgrub par nus pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo de yul nyid kyis bdag nyid yod par byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dag mang pos chu 'dzin pa'i khyad par la sogs pa 'bras bu sgrub par nus pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo de yul nyid kyis bdag nyid yod par byed do //
translated: Thus, the particularity of the water-holder and so on is able to establish the effect of many forms, smells, tastes, and objects of touch. Therefore, it is not different in nature, and it is the object itself that makes itself exist.

original: des na de ni tha dad pa'i sgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: des na de ni tha dad pa'i sgrub par mi nus so //
translated: Therefore, it is not able to establish difference.

original: 'on na ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang ri bong gi rva la sogs pa dag la de 'jug pa na /
analyzed: 'on na ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang ri bong gi rva la sogs pa dag la de 'jug pa na /
translated: But if it is not so, then it engages with the past, the future, the horns of a rabbit, and so on.

original: dngos po sgrub par shin tu rtogs par med kyi blo dang sgra bstan du yod pa la sogs pa dngos po tha dad pa mi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i 'di ltar rtogs par zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po sgrub par shin tu rtogs par med kyi blo dang sgra bstan du yod pa la sogs pa dngos po tha dad pa mi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i 'di ltar rtogs par zhe na /
translated: It is not the case that the cognition and the word are not established as different things, since the cognition is not perceptible and the word is perceptible, etc.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: If you think that, then no, etc.

original: dngos po gcig yin na ci'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa de nyid nye bar bsdu ba yin snyam na /üîΩbstan du yod pa dang thogs pa dang bcas pa'i ngo bor 'gyur pa ni /
analyzed: dngos po gcig yin na ci'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa de nyid nye bar bsdu ba yin snyam na / bstan du yod pa dang thogs pa dang bcas pa'i ngo bor 'gyur pa ni /
translated: If they are the same thing, why is it that form, etc. is included in the perceptible and the resistant?

original: de ltar gzhi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar gzhi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are the same basis, since they are the nature of the perceptible and the resistant.

original: de lta ma yin na rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir me tog ba ku la dang / autpala dang / padma dang / sna ma dang / ma li ka la sogs pa sgra tha dad pa bzhin du gzhi mthun par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir me tog ba ku la dang / autpala dang / padma dang / sna ma dang / ma li ka la sogs pa sgra tha dad pa bzhin du gzhi mthun par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Otherwise, because of the difference in causes, they would not be the same basis, just as the word is different for the flower bakula, the flower utpala, the flower padma, the flower sumanƒÅ, the flower mallikƒÅ, etc.

original: gzegs zan dang rkang mig gi rjes su 'brangs ba phyi ci log tu bstan pa rjes su chags pa skyes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dri mas g-yogs pa'i mig can gyis brjod pa sna tshogs yin du zin kyang khas blangs nas gcig la nye bar bsdu ba la
analyzed: gzegs zan dang rkang mig gi rjes su 'brangs ba phyi ci log tu bstan pa rjes su chags pa skyes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dri mas g-yogs pa'i mig can gyis brjod pa sna tshogs yin du zin kyang khas blangs nas gcig la nye bar bsdu ba la
translated: Although there are various statements by those who follow Ka·πáƒÅda and Ak·π£apƒÅda, who are covered by the stain of the conception of attachment to the opposite of what is taught,

original: 'gal ba nyid kyi @71a * //
analyzed: 'gal ba nyid kyi @71a * //
translated: they are all included in one,

original: rgyu mtshan ni bstan du med pa la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan ni bstan du med pa la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir zhe na /
translated: because they are related to the reason of being imperceptible, etc.

original: 'di dag thams cad ma btags na nyams dga' ba yin na des na dpyad pa dang gzhig mi bzod pa'i mkhas pa'i skye pos bzhad gad du bstan par dgongs nas /
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ma btags na nyams dga' ba yin na des na dpyad pa dang gzhig mi bzod pa'i mkhas pa'i skye pos bzhad gad du bstan par dgongs nas /
translated: If all of these are not imputed, they are delightful, but then the wise will laugh at them, thinking that they cannot withstand analysis and destruction.

original: kye ma 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: kye ma 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Thinking that, he says ‚ÄúKye ma‚Äù and so on.

original: kye ma'i sgra ni snying brtse bar bya'o //
analyzed: kye ma'i sgra ni snying brtse bar bya'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúkye ma‚Äù is one of compassion.

original: gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: du ma dang 'brel pa rnams bstan du yod pa la sogs pa phan 'dogs pa'o //
analyzed: du ma dang 'brel pa rnams bstan du yod pa la sogs pa phan 'dogs pa'o //
translated: It is the teaching of the many that are related to the benefit of the perceptible, etc.

original: phan mi 'dogs pa de ni bdag dang de 'brel par mi rigs so zhes bya bar gsungs so //
analyzed: phan mi 'dogs pa de ni bdag dang de 'brel par mi rigs so zhes bya bar gsungs so //
translated: It is not reasonable that the self is related to that which does not benefit it.

original: bstan du yod pa la sogs pa'i sgra sna tshogs pa dang 'brel pa de dag las bdag nyid 'dod pa'i dka' thub pa sdug bsngal gyi rgyu'o //
analyzed: bstan du yod pa la sogs pa'i sgra sna tshogs pa dang 'brel pa de dag las bdag nyid 'dod pa'i dka' thub pa sdug bsngal gyi rgyu'o //
translated: The ascetic who desires the self is related to various terms such as ‚Äúvisible‚Äù and so on, and that is the cause of suffering.

original: 'o na gzugs la sogs pa yod pa de nus pa tha dad pa du ma dang 'brel pa gang gis phan 'dogs par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: 'o na gzugs la sogs pa yod pa de nus pa tha dad pa du ma dang 'brel pa gang gis phan 'dogs par byed pa yin na /
translated: If the existence of form and so on is related to many different capacities, by what means does it benefit?

original: de nyid kyi nus pa tha dad pa bum pa la sogs pa'i sgra gcig po nyid kyis ci'i phyir bskyed par mi bya /
analyzed: de nyid kyi nus pa tha dad pa bum pa la sogs pa'i sgra gcig po nyid kyis ci'i phyir bskyed par mi bya /
translated: Why does that very different capacity not generate the single term ‚Äúpot‚Äù and so on?

original: gal te de ltar gyur kyang de las yon tan ci zhig 'thob ce na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar gyur kyang de las yon tan ci zhig 'thob ce na /
translated: Even if that were so, what benefit is gained from that?

original: bshad pa / de lta na 'dis brgyud pas 'jug pa'i dub pa yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / de lta na 'dis brgyud pas 'jug pa'i dub pa yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro //
translated: We say: In that case, the fatigue of engaging in a roundabout way is completely abandoned.

original: nus pa tha dad pas 'brel par byed /
analyzed: nus pa tha dad pas 'brel par byed /
translated: It is related by different capacities.

original: de dag las zhes bya ba'i sgra dang sbyar nas 'di brgyud pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i rjes su 'brang bas dka' thub kyis gdungs pa gzugs la sogs pa dor bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag las zhes bya ba'i sgra dang sbyar nas 'di brgyud pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i rjes su 'brang bas dka' thub kyis gdungs pa gzugs la sogs pa dor bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúfrom‚Äù is connected to the word ‚Äúthose,‚Äù and the meaning is that those who follow the ascetic practices of the Jainas will abandon their bodies and so on.

original: 'o na so sor nges pas phan 'dogs pa'i nus pa dang ldan par dngos po thams cad la khyod kyis gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'o na so sor nges pas phan 'dogs pa'i nus pa dang ldan par dngos po thams cad la khyod kyis gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya ste /
translated: But you must admit that all things have the ability to assist in a specific way.

original: de lta ma yin na s'a lu'i sa bon las s'a lu'i myu gu skye bar 'gyur la nas kyi myu gu ci'i phyir mi skye zhes brjod na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na s'a lu'i sa bon las s'a lu'i myu gu skye bar 'gyur la nas kyi myu gu ci'i phyir mi skye zhes brjod na /
translated: Otherwise, why is it that a rice sprout arises from a rice seed and not a barley sprout?

original: khyod ci zhig rjod par byed /
analyzed: khyod ci zhig rjod par byed /
translated: What do you say to that?

original: de'i phyir khyed rnal ma'i don la brten par rigs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyed rnal ma'i don la brten par rigs te /
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable for you to rely on the meaning of the word ‚Äúnatural,‚Äù

original: gzhan du skyon spang bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du skyon spang bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because otherwise you will be unable to avoid the error.

original: kho bo'i lan ni rgyal pos phrogs sam /
analyzed: kho bo'i lan ni rgyal pos phrogs sam /
translated: Have I been robbed by a king?

original: 'brel du mas phan 'dogs pa nyid de'i nus pa sgra sna tshogs pa skyed par byed do zhes 'di brjod par nus pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'brel du mas phan 'dogs pa nyid de'i nus pa sgra sna tshogs pa skyed par byed do zhes 'di brjod par nus pa yin no zhe na /
translated: It is possible to say that the power of the various sounds produces the various sounds that benefit many people.

original: de ni bden na /
analyzed: de ni bden na /
translated: This is true,

original: re zhig bstan du yod pa la sogs pa ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig bstan du yod pa la sogs pa ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: but first, the visible, etc. do not exist,

original: rim dang cig car gyis don byed nus pa mi rigs pa'i phyir dang / dmigs pa'i rig @71b byar gyur pa las ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim dang cig car gyis don byed nus pa mi rigs pa'i phyir dang / dmigs pa'i rig @71b byar gyur pa las ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is illogical that they function sequentially or simultaneously, and because they are not observed as the observed form of something existent.

original: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa'i yod pa mi dmigs pa yod par 'gyur ro zhes brjod par mi nus te /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa'i yod pa mi dmigs pa yod par 'gyur ro zhes brjod par mi nus te /
translated: It is not possible to say that the non-observation of the existent, which is the observed form of something existent, exists.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ram /
translated: Because it is a great absurdity.

original: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa 'di ji ltar de'i rgyu mtshan gyis blo dang sgra dag pa lang dag dang ba men la sogs pa dag la 'jug par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rig byar gyur pa 'di ji ltar de'i rgyu mtshan gyis blo dang sgra dag pa lang dag dang ba men la sogs pa dag la 'jug par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: Or, how is it that the mind and words that are the observed form of something existent engage with cows, oxen, etc. by the reason of that?

original: des na dmigs pa yang skad cig ma la sogs pa du ma gsal ba las tha dad pa mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: des na dmigs pa yang skad cig ma la sogs pa du ma gsal ba las tha dad pa mi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gsal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the object is also the manifestation of many moments, etc., and the characteristic of non-apprehension that is different from that is also the manifestation.

original: gal te spyi'i mthong du zin kyang ma tshang ba med pa longs shig rtogs pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te spyi'i mthong du zin kyang ma tshang ba med pa longs shig rtogs pa yin na /
translated: If, even though the universal is seen, the complete is not understood,

original: de'i dngos po stobs las byung ba de la blo dang sgra 'byung bar ni ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i dngos po stobs las byung ba de la blo dang sgra 'byung bar ni ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: how could the cognition and the word arise from that thing that is the result of the power of that?

original: dbyig pa can la sogs pa rgyu mtshan ma rtogs pa la sgra dang blo ni yod pa min /
analyzed: dbyig pa can la sogs pa rgyu mtshan ma rtogs pa la sgra dang blo ni yod pa min /
translated: The word and the cognition do not exist for one who has not understood the reason, such as the stick-bearer.üîΩTherefore, that is also not the three kinds of inference.

original: de'i phyir de ni rnam pa gsum gyis kyang de dag rigs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba med pa gzhan yang khyed kyis thams cad mthong ba de dag dngos po phyogs gcig par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni rnam pa gsum gyis kyang de dag rigs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba med pa gzhan yang khyed kyis thams cad mthong ba de dag dngos po phyogs gcig par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: Moreover, for you, all those who see would have a partial thing as their object,

original: yang na yul dang dngos po tha dad pas 'di cig car yul tha dad par 'jug par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: yang na yul dang dngos po tha dad pas 'di cig car yul tha dad par 'jug par mi 'gyur /
translated: or the object and the thing would be different, and this would not engage in different objects simultaneously.

original: 'jug na yang 'di gcig ma yin te /
analyzed: 'jug na yang 'di gcig ma yin te /
translated: Even if it did engage, it would not be one.

original: cig car thams cad la 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i rnam pa du ma rnams la brten pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa gcig gyur pa yod pa min /
analyzed: cig car thams cad la 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i rnam pa du ma rnams la brten pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa gcig gyur pa yod pa min /
translated: There is no single effect that is the same in all the many aspects that are simultaneously engaged.

original: yod pa 'di dag blo dang sgra skye ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag yod pa'i nges pa med do //
analyzed: yod pa 'di dag blo dang sgra skye ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag yod pa'i nges pa med do //
translated: There is no certainty that these existences follow and reverse from the arising of cognition and sound.

original: ma dmigs pa de dag nyid kyi phyir 'tshed par byed pa la sogs pa de rnams la yang tha dad pa dag med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrnam 'grel las kyang 'tshed sogs rnams las dbyer med par //
analyzed: ma dmigs pa de dag nyid kyi phyir 'tshed par byed pa la sogs pa de rnams la yang tha dad pa dag med pa'i phyir ro // rnam 'grel las kyang 'tshed sogs rnams las dbyer med par //
translated: Because of the non-apprehension of those, even in cooking and so on, there is no difference among them.üîΩIn the PramaÃÑnÔ¨Å avaÃÑrtika it says:üîΩEven though they are not different from cooking and so on,

original: med kyang don la tha dad brjod //
analyzed: med kyang don la tha dad brjod //
translated: They are said to be different in meaning.

original: 'di yi las dag rgyu ma yin /
analyzed: 'di yi las dag rgyu ma yin /
translated: The actions of these are not causes.

original: rigs 'di las la mi brten phyir //
analyzed: rigs 'di las la mi brten phyir //
translated: Because this type does not depend on action.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad zin yang 'dir mi brjod do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad zin yang 'dir mi brjod do //
translated: And so on. Although this has already been explained, it will not be repeated here.

original: de dag phan gdags par bya ba yod pa ma lags te /
analyzed: de dag phan gdags par bya ba yod pa ma lags te /
translated: They are not to be benefited

original: rtag par gyur pas bogs dbyung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag par gyur pas bogs dbyung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are permanent and cannot be improved.

original: skyes bu'i 'dod pa la mi ltos par thogs pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i spyi gsal bar byas nas brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skyes bu'i 'dod pa la mi ltos par thogs pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i spyi gsal bar byas nas brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible to express a universal such as ‚Äúhaving resistance‚Äù without regard to the desire of a person.

original: brjod par 'dod pa la sogs mi ltos par 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa la sogs mi ltos par 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow that it would be engaged without regard to the desire to express it.

original: de ni @72a * //
analyzed: de ni @72a * //
translated: That is

original: skyes bu'i bsam pa la rag las pas nges par 'gyur na bar gyi spyi lhag mas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: skyes bu'i bsam pa la rag las pas nges par 'gyur na bar gyi spyi lhag mas ci zhig bya /
translated: determined by the intention of a person. What is the use of the remaining universals?

original: 'di ltar de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i byed pa nyid du rtogs kyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i byed pa nyid du rtogs kyi /
translated: In this way, it is understood that the function of a universal is to be the cause of the cognition of the object and its exclusion.

original: spyi rtag pa dang ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi rtag pa dang ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a permanent universal is not excluded.

original: de'i phyir 'di thams cad lta ba ngan pa la brten pa'i brtags pa tsam yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di thams cad lta ba ngan pa la brten pa'i brtags pa tsam yin no //
translated: Therefore, all of this is mere imagination based on bad views.

original: 'di rtogs par byas pa la yang brgal zhing brtags pa mi rigs pa'i phyir rtogs pa yin na ni de bden pas da ltar brtags pa ni mdzes te /
analyzed: 'di rtogs par byas pa la yang brgal zhing brtags pa mi rigs pa'i phyir rtogs pa yin na ni de bden pas da ltar brtags pa ni mdzes te /
translated: And it is not proper to investigate and analyze what is understood. If it is understood, then it is proper to investigate it now, because it is true.

original: skyon med pa yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod do //
analyzed: skyon med pa yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod do //
translated: Because it is faultless and endowed with good qualities.

original: gcig la rnam pa sna tshogs pa sgras bskyed pa'i nus pa yod pa ma yin pas brtags pa'i 'dod pa 'di ni mi rigs she na /
analyzed: gcig la rnam pa sna tshogs pa sgras bskyed pa'i nus pa yod pa ma yin pas brtags pa'i 'dod pa 'di ni mi rigs she na /
translated: But since a single thing cannot have the power to produce various sounds, this imagined assertion is unreasonable.

original: gal te de lta na 'di brjod pa sgra sna tshogs skyes pa'i nus pa med pa ni 'brel pa can de dag la phan par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gal te de lta na 'di brjod pa sgra sna tshogs skyes pa'i nus pa med pa ni 'brel pa can de dag la phan par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: If that is so, then this statement: ‚ÄúThe power to produce various sounds does not exist in the related things‚Äù is meaningless.

original: gcig gis sna tshogs pa phan par byed pa nyid ni 'gal ba khas len pa nyid yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so /
analyzed: gcig gis sna tshogs pa phan par byed pa nyid ni 'gal ba khas len pa nyid yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so /
translated: The intended meaning is that it is contradictory to accept that a single thing is helpful.

original: rtag pa'i phyir phan 'dogs pa med par khas len pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rtag pa'i phyir phan 'dogs pa med par khas len pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is accepted that it is not helpful because it is permanent,

original: bstan du yod pa nyid la sogs pa de dag phan 'dogs pa med pa de yan lag tu byed na de dang 'brel pa med par grub po //
analyzed: bstan du yod pa nyid la sogs pa de dag phan 'dogs pa med pa de yan lag tu byed na de dang 'brel pa med par grub po //
translated: then if you make that which is not helpful, such as being visible, a part of it, it is established that it is not related to that.

original: gang dang gang gis phan 'dogs pa med pa'i rgyu de dang de ni 'brel pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: gang dang gang gis phan 'dogs pa med pa'i rgyu de dang de ni 'brel pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: Whatever is not helpful is not related to that,

original: gangs can dang ma la ya'i ri bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: gangs can dang ma la ya'i ri bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: like the Himalayas and Mount Malaya.

original: de ltar na re zhig gzhan gyi phyogs gsal bas bstan du yod pa la sogs pa'i sgra tha mi dad pa'i yul can du bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig gzhan gyi phyogs gsal bas bstan du yod pa la sogs pa'i sgra tha mi dad pa'i yul can du bstan to //
translated: Thus, the words ‚Äúmanifest,‚Äù etc., are shown to have as their referent something that is not different from the other side.

original: de nyid rmongs pa dang ldan pa'i tshig smras pa na yang brgal zhig brtag par byed do //
analyzed: de nyid rmongs pa dang ldan pa'i tshig smras pa na yang brgal zhig brtag par byed do //
translated: But when he speaks of the words of the deluded, he is open to the same criticism.

original: 'o na ni bstan du yod pa la sogs pa'i sgra yul tha dad med pa nyid du gyur na /
analyzed: 'o na ni bstan du yod pa la sogs pa'i sgra yul tha dad med pa nyid du gyur na /
translated: If the words ‚Äúmanifest,‚Äù etc., have as their referent something that is not different,

original: bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa'i sgra sna tshogs pa'i yul can nyid yin no zhes bya ba de ji ltar yin /
analyzed: bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa'i sgra sna tshogs pa'i yul can nyid yin no zhes bya ba de ji ltar yin /
translated: how can they have as their referent the various things such as ‚Äúpot‚Äù and ‚Äúcloth‚Äù?

original: gzugs la sogs pa ji snyed pa las gzhan yan lag can gyi rdzas yod pa yin te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa ji snyed pa las gzhan yan lag can gyi rdzas yod pa yin te /
translated: There is a substance that is the possessor of parts, which is different from the parts such as form,

original: de la bum pa la sogs pa'i yul can du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la bum pa la sogs pa'i yul can du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the referent of the words ‚Äúpot,‚Äù etc.

original: 'di ltar yul dpyad pa yin na snam bu dang snal ma tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar yul dpyad pa yin na snam bu dang snal ma tha dad pa yin te /
translated: If the referent is analyzed, cloth and thread are different,

original: byed pa po tha dad pa'i phyir snam bu dang bum pa @72b bzhin no //
analyzed: byed pa po tha dad pa'i phyir snam bu dang bum pa @72b bzhin no //
translated: because the agents are different, like a pot and cloth.

original: de ltar snam bu yang spyi dang bye brag gi shes pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir ba lang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ltar snam bu yang spyi dang bye brag gi shes pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir ba lang bzhin no //
translated: Thus, a cloth is like a cow, because it is the object of a cognition that is both general and specific.

original: snal ma dang snal ma'i tshogs pa la snam bu'i shes pa mi skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snal ma dang snal ma'i tshogs pa la snam bu'i shes pa mi skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: A cognition of a cloth does not arise from a thread or a collection of threads.

original: bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du thabs gzhan gyis ma bsgrubs pa'i phyir dang / yul tha dad pa na gnas pas byas pa'i phyir bum pa la sogs pa nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du thabs gzhan gyis ma bsgrubs pa'i phyir dang / yul tha dad pa na gnas pas byas pa'i phyir bum pa la sogs pa nyid bzhin no //
translated: Like a pot, etc., it is not established by any other means, and like a pot, etc., it is produced by the action of an agent located in a different place.

original: ku ba la dang ma la ka dang bil ba la sogs pa bzhin du tshad tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ku ba la dang ma la ka dang bil ba la sogs pa bzhin du tshad tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Like a cucumber, a bilva fruit, etc., it has a different size.

original: des na snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus la ltos pa'i phyir sa bon dang myu gu bzhin no //
analyzed: des na snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus la ltos pa'i phyir sa bon dang myu gu bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, like a seed and a sprout, it depends on a prior and subsequent time.

original: yang na snam bu ni de'i rgyu gzhan las byung ba'i phyir gtag bzangs bzhin no //
analyzed: yang na snam bu ni de'i rgyu gzhan las byung ba'i phyir gtag bzangs bzhin no //
translated: Or, like a fine piece of brocade, a cloth arises from another cause.

original: snal ma dang snam bu dag gzhan nyid yin te /
analyzed: snal ma dang snam bu dag gzhan nyid yin te /
translated: A thread and a cloth are different,

original: nus pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa'i med dang chu bzhin no //
analyzed: nus pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa'i med dang chu bzhin no //
translated: like a seed and a sprout, because they have different potencies.

original: 'di ltar gzhan yang 'di dpyad pa'i yul du byas nas autpala dri la sogs pa las shin tu tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan yang 'di dpyad pa'i yul du byas nas autpala dri la sogs pa las shin tu tha dad pa yin te /
translated: In the same way, having taken this as the object of analysis, it is quite different from the fragrance of the utpala flower, etc.

original: de dag par gcod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag par gcod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is an obstruction to them.

original: nag pa las srid sgrub la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: nag pa las srid sgrub la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Like Arjuna, etc.

original: gang dang gang rnam par gcod par byed pad dang de ni gzhan yin te /
analyzed: gang dang gang rnam par gcod par byed pad dang de ni gzhan yin te /
translated: Whatever is an obstruction to something, that is different from it.

original: dper na ba lang nag pa bzhin no /
analyzed: dper na ba lang nag pa bzhin no /
translated: For example, a black cow.

original: 'di la yang tha dad par sgrub pa'i tshad ma 'di dag yod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di la yang tha dad par sgrub pa'i tshad ma 'di dag yod pa yin no //
translated: Here, these valid cognitions that establish difference exist.

original: de dang de dag tha dad pa'i yul du mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de dang de dag tha dad pa'i yul du mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If you say that they are not different objects,üîΩwe think that they are arranged by the great darkness of the inner cause, covered by the cataract of attachment to the non-ultimate.

original: de dang de dag ni dam pa ma yin pa la mngon bar zhen pa'i ling tog gis g-yogs pa'i nang gi rgyu'i mun pa chen po can gyis bkod pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas bum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di yang gzugs la sogs pa
analyzed: de dang de dag ni dam pa ma yin pa la mngon bar zhen pa'i ling tog gis g-yogs pa'i nang gi rgyu'i mun pa chen po can gyis bkod pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas bum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di yang gzugs la sogs pa
translated: Thinking this, he says, This pot, etc. are just form, etc.

original: nyid kyi bya ba byed pa bum pa'i sgra gcig brjod par 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: nyid kyi bya ba byed pa bum pa'i sgra gcig brjod par 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: The word pot expresses the activity of a single pot that performs a function of form, etc.

original: don gzhan rtogs pa ci zhig dgos zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: don gzhan rtogs pa ci zhig dgos zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: What other object is to be realized?

original: 'bras bu zhes bya ba kha bskang ngo //
analyzed: 'bras bu zhes bya ba kha bskang ngo //
translated: The word ‚Äúeffect‚Äù is supplied.

original: sngon po la sogs pa las tha dad pa de'i de 'dra ba cung zad cig kyang ma rtogs snyam du dgongs pa gang yin pa de nyid kyis de'i tshad ma ston pa ni rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa las tha dad pa de'i de 'dra ba cung zad cig kyang ma rtogs snyam du dgongs pa gang yin pa de nyid kyis de'i tshad ma ston pa ni rigs pa yin no //
translated: The thought is that the very fact that one does not realize the slightest difference between the blue, etc., and its cognition proves that the cognition is a valid means of knowledge.

original: de ma grub pa la sogs pa'i skyon gyis gnod phyir tha dad par sgrub par mi nus te /
analyzed: de ma grub pa la sogs pa'i skyon gyis gnod phyir tha dad par sgrub par mi nus te /
translated: But it cannot prove difference, because it is undermined by the fault of being unestablished, etc.

original: rmongs pa'i 'dod pa nyid sngon du song bas byas pa yin no snyam du dgongs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rmongs pa'i 'dod pa nyid sngon du song bas byas pa yin no snyam du dgongs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The thought is that it is produced by the mere prior wish of the deluded.

original: 'di ltar re zhig 'di dang por tshad mas brtag par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: 'di ltar re zhig 'di dang por tshad mas brtag par bya ba yin na /
translated: Thus, first of all, this must be investigated by a valid means of knowledge.

original: brtag pa phra mo bzod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: brtag pa phra mo bzod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: But it is not even able to bear subtle investigation.

original: gang gi phyir 'di la @73a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di la @73a * //
translated: For,

original: brtag pa gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: brtag pa gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: two investigations arise with regard to this.

original: dang por snal ma'i gnas skabs las snyam bu gzhan pa nyid du sgrub pa 'am dbyibs khyad par can du gnas ma 'gyur na /
analyzed: dang por snal ma'i gnas skabs las snyam bu gzhan pa nyid du sgrub pa 'am dbyibs khyad par can du gnas ma 'gyur na /
translated: If the cloth were not established as different from the threads in the first stage, or if the cloth were not established as having a special shape,

original: de la dang po'i gnas skabs 'di rnam par gnas pa dpyad pa'i khur lci ba'i mi bzod pas grub pa bsgrubs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i phyir ro //üîΩgang gi phyir dngos po ma lus pa yang dag par rtogs par bde bar gshegs pa'i gzhung lugs kyi tshul la brten nas sgrub pa dri ma med pa rtogs kyi 'jug pa'i lugs ni dngos po thams cad skyes ma thag 'jig pa la brten nas rab tu ston
analyzed: de la dang po'i gnas skabs 'di rnam par gnas pa dpyad pa'i khur lci ba'i mi bzod pas grub pa bsgrubs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i phyir ro // gang gi phyir dngos po ma lus pa yang dag par rtogs par bde bar gshegs pa'i gzhung lugs kyi tshul la brten nas sgrub pa dri ma med pa rtogs kyi 'jug pa'i lugs ni dngos po thams cad skyes ma thag 'jig pa la brten nas rab tu ston
translated: then the first stage would not be able to bear the burden of analysis, and so it would be free from the fault of establishing an existent thing.

original: pa yin no //
analyzed: pa yin no //
translated: Because all things are established by means of the stainless reasoning of the Sugata‚Äôs scriptures, one should understand that the system of engagement is taught on the basis of the disintegration of all things immediately after they arise.

original: des kyang de rnams gzhan pa nyid 'dod pa yin na /
analyzed: des kyang de rnams gzhan pa nyid 'dod pa yin na /
translated: If it is asserted that they are different,

original: grub pa la sgrub pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba'i skyon gyi gdon gyis khyod ji ltar zin par mi 'gyur rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa ni me shin tu tsha bas gdungs pa'i rdo leb la rkang pa gzhag pa'i gnas med pa bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: grub pa la sgrub pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba'i skyon gyi gdon gyis khyod ji ltar zin par mi 'gyur rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa ni me shin tu tsha bas gdungs pa'i rdo leb la rkang pa gzhag pa'i gnas med pa bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: The second alternative is like placing one‚Äôs foot on a hot iron plate, for there is no place to put it.

original: gtan tshigs gzhan la ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gzhan la ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the reason is not established for the other.

original: dbyibs khyad par can du gnas pa las snam bu byed pa po gzhan la grags par 'gyur bar byed pa 'jug pa med pa de rnam pa de 'dra ba gang yin pa gzhan pa nyid med pas khas blang par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dbyibs khyad par can du gnas pa las snam bu byed pa po gzhan la grags par 'gyur bar byed pa 'jug pa med pa de rnam pa de 'dra ba gang yin pa gzhan pa nyid med pas khas blang par mi bya'o //
translated: The shape of the cloth is not known to be produced by another agent, because there is no activity of another.

original: de ma thag bshad pa'i tshad ma rnams kyang yod la mngon bar 'dod pa'i don yongs su rdzogs par mi byed de /
analyzed: de ma thag bshad pa'i tshad ma rnams kyang yod la mngon bar 'dod pa'i don yongs su rdzogs par mi byed de /
translated: The valid cognitions just explained do exist, but they do not completely accomplish the desired purpose,

original: gtan tshigs ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reason is not established.

original: gang gi phyir snal ma rnams kyi dbyibs khyad par du gnas pa la shes pa 'jug pa med pa tha dad pa'i ngo bo gzhan snam bu zhes bya ba mig phye zin kyang ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes pa la sogs pa la mthong zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir snal ma rnams kyi dbyibs khyad par du gnas pa la shes pa 'jug pa med pa tha dad pa'i ngo bo gzhan snam bu zhes bya ba mig phye zin kyang ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes pa la sogs pa la mthong zhe na /
translated: If you say that you see a cloth that is different from the arrangement of the threads, because you do not see it even when your eyes are open, then

original: 'di ni phyis dgag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni phyis dgag par bya'o //
translated: this will be refuted later.

original: thabs gzhan gyis bsgrub bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang yul tha dad pa na gnas pas byas pa'i phyir dang tshad ma tha dad pa'i phyir dang snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus la ltos pa'i phyir dang nus pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa'i phyir zhes
analyzed: thabs gzhan gyis bsgrub bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang yul tha dad pa na gnas pas byas pa'i phyir dang tshad ma tha dad pa'i phyir dang snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus la ltos pa'i phyir dang nus pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa'i phyir zhes
translated: Because it is not established by another method, because it is produced by the difference of the place, because of the difference of the valid cognition, because of the dependence on the earlier and later times, and because of the possession of different potency.

original: bya ba gang yin pa 'di la dang po'i sgrub par byed pa las byas pa'i rkyen rnon po mthong bas dgra bo mig dmar bzhin du des grub pa mi bzod pa yin no //
analyzed: bya ba gang yin pa 'di la dang po'i sgrub par byed pa las byas pa'i rkyen rnon po mthong bas dgra bo mig dmar bzhin du des grub pa mi bzod pa yin no //
translated: This is like an enemy with red eyes who cannot bear the sight of the sharp conditions produced by the first proof.

original: dang po grub pa sgrub nyid dang // @73b gnyis pa gtan tshigs ma grub pa //
analyzed: dang po grub pa sgrub nyid dang // @73b gnyis pa gtan tshigs ma grub pa //
translated: The fifth is the reason that is unestablished as the property of the subject.üîΩThe sixth is the reason that is unestablished because of being the same as the probandum.

original: skad cig yin phyir khyad par can //
analyzed: skad cig yin phyir khyad par can //
translated: The seventh is the reason that is unestablished because of being the same as the subject.üîΩThe eighth is the reason that is unestablished because of being contradictory.

original: skye ba gang gis mngon 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba gang gis mngon 'dod pa'o //
translated: The ninth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unperceived.üîΩThe tenth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unproven.

original: zhes bya ba bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //üîΩ'di dpyad pa'i yul du byas nas autpala'i dri zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de yang 'brel pa ma yin te ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o // 'di dpyad pa'i yul du byas nas autpala'i dri zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de yang 'brel pa ma yin te ;
translated: The eleventh is the reason that is unestablished because of being unaccepted.üîΩThe twelfth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unestablished.

original: gang gi phyir autpala'i dri zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang ro mngar ba'i khyad par la sogs pa autpala'i rang bzhin grub par sgrub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir autpala'i dri zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang ro mngar ba'i khyad par la sogs pa autpala'i rang bzhin grub par sgrub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The thirteenth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unaccomplished.

original: 'bras bu khyad par med par sgrub par byed pa'i spyi'i bdag nyid du gyur pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu khyad par med par sgrub par byed pa'i spyi'i bdag nyid du gyur pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The fourteenth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unaccepted.üîΩThe fifteenth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unproven.üîΩThe sixteenth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unaccepted.üîΩThe seventeenth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unestablished.üîΩThe eighteenth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unaccomplished.üîΩThe nineteenth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unaccepted.üîΩThe twentieth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unproven.üîΩThe twenty-first is the reason that is unestablished because of being unaccepted.

original: sgrar grags pa ni khyad par can gyi 'bras bu sgrub par bshad pas khyad par dang khyad par can nyid du brjod kyi /
analyzed: sgrar grags pa ni khyad par can gyi 'bras bu sgrub par bshad pas khyad par dang khyad par can nyid du brjod kyi /
translated: The twenty-second is the reason that is unestablished because of being unestablished.üîΩThe twenty-third is the reason that is unestablished because of being unaccomplished.üîΩThe twenty-fourth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unaccepted.üîΩThe twenty-fifth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unproven.üîΩThe twenty-sixth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unaccepted.üîΩThe twenty-seventh is the reason that is unestablished because of being unestablished.üîΩThe twenty-eighth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unaccomplished.üîΩThe twenty-ninth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unaccepted.üîΩThe thirtieth is the reason that is unestablished because of being unproven.üîΩThe thirty-first is the reason that is unestablished because of being unaccepted.üîΩThe thirty-second is the reason that is unestablished because

original: 'dir ji skad bshad pa'i rdzas kyi mtshan nyid gzhan cung zad cig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ji skad bshad pa'i rdzas kyi mtshan nyid gzhan cung zad cig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, there is no other substance whatsoever that has the characteristics as explained.

original: de dang 'dra ba de ni mi dmigs pa yin zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba de ni mi dmigs pa yin zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: That which is similar to that is non-observation, as explained above.

original: de lta na rnam pa 'dis de dag de rnam par gcod par byed par 'gyur te //
analyzed: de lta na rnam pa 'dis de dag de rnam par gcod par byed par 'gyur te //
translated: In this way, by this mode, they are excluded from that.

original: de dag de rnam par gcod pa yang yin la /
analyzed: de dag de rnam par gcod pa yang yin la /
translated: And that exclusion of those from that

original: shin tu tha dad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod /
analyzed: shin tu tha dad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod /
translated: is not absolutely different. What contradiction is there in this?

original: gtan tshigs mi mthun pa'i phyogs las bzlog pa la the tshom za ba yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs mi mthun pa'i phyogs las bzlog pa la the tshom za ba yin te /
translated: The reason is doubtful in the opposite of the discordant side,

original: 'brel pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the relation is not established.

original: dpe grub pa tsam gyis grub pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dpe grub pa tsam gyis grub pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no establishment by mere establishment of the example,

original: thams cad grub par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad grub par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that everything is established.

translated: Therefore, the person, without regard to the meaning, would utter the word itself.

original: dngos po la nus pa yod pa 'am nus pa med pa bsal bar bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po la nus pa yod pa 'am nus pa med pa bsal bar bya ba yin zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa med pa'o //
translated: The word would either have the power to refer to the thing or it would not have the power. This is the alternative.

original: yod pa nyid yin pa de ltar na rang nyid nye bar 'jog go zhe na /
analyzed: yod pa nyid yin pa de ltar na rang nyid nye bar 'jog go zhe na /
translated: If it has the power, then it would refer to itself.

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: This also is not reasonable.

original: de ma thag bshad pa'i rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis zhes bya bas dgongs so //üîΩde'i phyir skyes bus rnam pa gcig pa nyid la sogs pa med kyang sgra de dag nges par sbyor ba yin te /
analyzed: de ma thag bshad pa'i rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis zhes bya bas dgongs so // de'i phyir skyes bus rnam pa gcig pa nyid la sogs pa med kyang sgra de dag nges par sbyor ba yin te /
translated: The three types of causes that were just explained are intended.üîΩTherefore, even though the person does not have a single form, etc., he does employ the words in a definite manner.

original: skyes bu ji ltar 'dod pa gcig pa de las yang mang po'i tshig gi mtha' can dang du ma la yang gcig gi tshig gi mtha' can gyi sgra nges par sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes bu ji ltar 'dod pa gcig pa de las yang mang po'i tshig gi mtha' can dang du ma la yang gcig gi tshig gi mtha' can gyi sgra nges par sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The person employs the words in a definite manner because he employs the words in the singular, plural, and dual forms according to his wish.

original: gzugs la sogs pa sna tshogs pa sgra gcig kun nas slong bar nus pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni shin tu rmongs pa chen po dang ldan pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas de la de rnams kyi sgra la klan ka ci zhig yod de
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa sna tshogs pa sgra gcig kun nas slong bar nus pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni shin tu rmongs pa chen po dang ldan pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas de la de rnams kyi sgra la klan ka ci zhig yod de
translated: What fault is there in their word?

original: ci yang med do zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ci yang med do zhes bya'o //
translated: There is none.

original: ji ltar sgra gcig don du ma la nges par sbyor bar 'dod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar sgra gcig don du ma la nges par sbyor bar 'dod pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that a single word is definitely applied to many things?

original: @77b rgyu mtshan gyis nges par sbyor bar bstan pa nyid do zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: @77b rgyu mtshan gyis nges par sbyor bar bstan pa nyid do zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIt is taught that it is applied by reason.‚Äù

original: de'i nus pa bstan pa'i phyir de la sgra gcig nges par sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i nus pa bstan pa'i phyir de la sgra gcig nges par sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In order to show its power, he says, ‚ÄúTherefore, a single word is applied.‚Äù

original: 'dir skabs yin no //
analyzed: 'dir skabs yin no //
translated: This is the context.

original: bsnan pa gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: bsnan pa gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúAnother addition,‚Äù and so on.

original: rten du mngon par 'dod pa'i yan lag can gyi rdzas de la de dag ldan pa'i 'bras bar 'brel pa'i phyir ji ltar gcig dang gcig tu 'brel pa med de 'gal ba khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rten du mngon par 'dod pa'i yan lag can gyi rdzas de la de dag ldan pa'i 'bras bar 'brel pa'i phyir ji ltar gcig dang gcig tu 'brel pa med de 'gal ba khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The substance that is the possessor of the parts, which is asserted to be the basis, is related to those parts as the effect of their possession, so how can it be that they are not related as one to the other? Because you have accepted a contradiction.

original: de lta ma yin na sgra gcig la yang lhan cig par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na sgra gcig la yang lhan cig par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: If it were not so, then even a single sound would not be simultaneous.

original: gzhan gyis smras pa kho bo ni gcig dang lhan cig 'brel par 'gal ba'i rgyu'i sgra gcig gzugs la sogs pa la mi 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis smras pa kho bo ni gcig dang lhan cig 'brel par 'gal ba'i rgyu'i sgra gcig gzugs la sogs pa la mi 'dod pa yin te /
translated: An opponent says: I do not assert that a single sound is related to a single thing as one to the other, because of the contradiction.

original: 'on te tha mi dad pa ma yin pa ni khyad par med pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te tha mi dad pa ma yin pa ni khyad par med pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'o //
translated: But if they are not different, then form and so on are not differentiated.

original: gang la zhe na /
analyzed: gang la zhe na /
translated: Where?

original: bum pa dang zla ba dang snam bu la sogs pa 'di dag ni yul tha dad pa'i don byed pa ste /
analyzed: bum pa dang zla ba dang snam bu la sogs pa 'di dag ni yul tha dad pa'i don byed pa ste /
translated: These things, such as a pot, the moon, and a cloth, are objects that perform different functions.

original: chu 'dzin pa dang gos la sogs pas mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: chu 'dzin pa dang gos la sogs pas mtshon pa'o //
translated: They are indicated by such things as holding water and covering.

original: de dang 'gal ba ltar de'i bum pa bstan pas sgra dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang 'gal ba ltar de'i bum pa bstan pas sgra dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is contradictory to that, it is contradictory to the sound that indicates the pot.

original: yang na de dag rten dang tha dad pa med pa de rdzas la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na de dag rten dang tha dad pa med pa de rdzas la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or else, they are not different from the basis, because they are not different from the substance.

original: 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba ni /
translated: This is clarified:

original: de gzugs la sogs pa de rnams rang bzhin gcig tu yod pa tshogs pa gzhan la bum pa la sogs pa chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa khyad par gyi don byed pa mi srid pa ma yin pa'i rgyu de'i phyir de'i don byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de gzugs la sogs pa de rnams rang bzhin gcig tu yod pa tshogs pa gzhan la bum pa la sogs pa chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa khyad par gyi don byed pa mi srid pa ma yin pa'i rgyu de'i phyir de'i don byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The pot, etc., which are the collection of form, etc., do not exist as a single nature, but it is not impossible for them to perform a distinctive function, such as holding water, etc. Therefore, they do not perform the function of that.

original: bstan pa'i ched du de'i don gyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ba'i sgra des kyang brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bstan pa'i ched du de'i don gyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ba'i sgra des kyang brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: For the sake of illustration, the word ‚Äúthat‚Äù should not be used to express the function of that object.

original: sbyor ba yang gang dang gang las rang bzhin khyad par med pa dang de las de'i don gyis bya ba byed pa srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba yang gang dang gang las rang bzhin khyad par med pa dang de las de'i don gyis bya ba byed pa srid pa ma yin te /
translated: The application is this: Whatever is not different from its nature, it is impossible for it to perform the function of that object.

original: dper na de nyid kyi rigs las zla bar rtogs pa'i gzugs la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na de nyid kyi rigs las zla bar rtogs pa'i gzugs la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, like the form, etc., which are recognized as the moon from that very class.

original: de bzhin du bum par rtogs pa'i gzugs la sogs par yang zla bar rtogs pa'i gzugs la sogs pas las rang bzhin khyad par med pas zhes bya ba ni khyab byed mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bum par rtogs pa'i gzugs la sogs par yang zla bar rtogs pa'i gzugs la sogs pas las rang bzhin khyad par med pas zhes bya ba ni khyab byed mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: Likewise, the form, etc. that are cognized as a pot are not different in nature from the form, etc. that are cognized as the moon. This is the non-apprehension of the pervader.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba phyogs snga ma'i tshigs la 'dir lan ni /üîΩ'gyur na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te 'dis ni gtan @78a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba phyogs snga ma'i tshigs la 'dir lan ni / 'gyur na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te 'dis ni gtan @78a * //
translated: Likewise, it should be applied to the other cases as well.

original: tshigs de ma grub par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: tshigs de ma grub par brjod pa yin no //
translated: Here, the response to the opponent's position is stated with If it were the case... and so on. This expresses the non-establishment of the reason.

original: 'dir ni don 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni don 'di yin te /
translated: Here, this is the meaning:

original: gzugs la sogs pa dang zla ba la sogs pa rnams la tha mi dad pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa dang zla ba la sogs pa rnams la tha mi dad pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Forms, etc. and the moon, etc. do not exist without distinction,

original: phan tshun dpen pa'i ngo bo nyid du tshad mas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun dpen pa'i ngo bo nyid du tshad mas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because their individual natures are ascertained by valid cognition.

original: de ltar mngon sum du gyur na ni ci 'dod pa 'di dag dang btang snyoms su byed /
analyzed: de ltar mngon sum du gyur na ni ci 'dod pa 'di dag dang btang snyoms su byed /
translated: If that were directly perceived, then one would be indifferent to these as desired.

original: ci ste ni mi bzod pa la dri ba'o //
analyzed: ci ste ni mi bzod pa la dri ba'o //
translated: But if not, then this is the question for the impatient one.

original: gdod pa med pa la bzod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gdod pa med pa la bzod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not the case that one is not patient with what is beginningless.

original: gzhan yang bum pa dang zla ba la sogs pa rnams gzugs la sogs pa tha dad pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang bum pa dang zla ba la sogs pa rnams gzugs la sogs pa tha dad pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i brjod pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, the assertion that such things as pots and moons are not different from form, etc., is a statement of your own belief.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gzugs la sogs pa dag la tshogs pa'i rdzas la mi ltos par rang gi rgyu'i stobs kyis rang bzhin tha dad par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa dag la tshogs pa'i rdzas la mi ltos par rang gi rgyu'i stobs kyis rang bzhin tha dad par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because you accept that form, etc., are by nature different, without depending on a collection of substances as their cause.

original: des na 'di khas blangs pa'i sgo nas kyang ma grub par rigs par bya'o //
analyzed: des na 'di khas blangs pa'i sgo nas kyang ma grub par rigs par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood that this is not established by your own belief.

original: snga ma ni mngon sum gyi sgo nas zhes bya lhag ma'o //
analyzed: snga ma ni mngon sum gyi sgo nas zhes bya lhag ma'o //
translated: The former is called ‚Äúby way of direct perception,‚Äù and the latter is the remainder.

original: sngar yang gzhan phrag dog gis smras pa /
analyzed: sngar yang gzhan phrag dog gis smras pa /
translated: Previously, out of jealousy, you said:

original: gal te gzugs la sogs pa las gzhan nyid bum par gyur na cir 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te gzugs la sogs pa las gzhan nyid bum par gyur na cir 'gyur /
translated: ‚ÄúIf a pot were different from form, etc., what would be the problem?‚Äù

original: cung zad kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: cung zad kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: You thought that there would be no problem at all.

original: khyod de mi 'dod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: khyod de mi 'dod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But you do not accept that,

original: phrag dog gis yin no //
analyzed: phrag dog gis yin no //
translated: because of jealousy.

original: 'on kyang de tsam gyis ci zhig 'dir brjod par bya ba yod par 'gyur mod /
analyzed: 'on kyang de tsam gyis ci zhig 'dir brjod par bya ba yod par 'gyur mod /
translated: But what is there to say about that?

original: yan lag can de mngon sum du yod na na mig dang lus kyi dbang pos gzung bar bya ba khas blangs pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa ma yin pa'i ngo bo ni /
analyzed: yan lag can de mngon sum du yod na na mig dang lus kyi dbang pos gzung bar bya ba khas blangs pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa ma yin pa'i ngo bo ni /
translated: If the possessor of parts is directly perceived, then one must accept that it is perceived by the eye and the body, and therefore it is not a nature that is not form, etc.

original: gzugs la sogs pa rtogs pa nyid la sogs pa rang bzhin spangs pa zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rtogs pa nyid la sogs pa rang bzhin spangs pa zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúabandoned by the nature of form, etc.,‚Äù is that it is abandoned by the nature of the perception of form, etc.

original: yon tan dang rdzas dag tha dad par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan dang rdzas dag tha dad par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is accepted that qualities and substances are different.

original: de tha dad pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin las tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: de tha dad pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin las tha dad pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Different‚Äù means different from the nature of form, etc.

original: blo ni mig dang lus kyi dbang po las skyes pa las snang ba la rag na cis bsgribs pa yin //
analyzed: blo ni mig dang lus kyi dbang po las skyes pa las snang ba la rag na cis bsgribs pa yin //
translated: The mind arises from the eye and the body, and if it is obstructed by the appearance of an object, why is it not obstructed?

original: gags byed pa 'ga' zhig kyang med pa'i don to //
analyzed: gags byed pa 'ga' zhig kyang med pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no obstruction at all.

original: 'ga' zhig shin tu gus pas dbang po ma nyams pas kyang spyod pa na sngon po dang mngar dri da ba dang / rtsub pa la sogs pa las tha dad pa de'i ngo bos dben pa'i ngo bo bum pa la sogs pa'i rdzas @78b 'di 'dra na dmigs su med do zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig shin tu gus pas dbang po ma nyams pas kyang spyod pa na sngon po dang mngar dri da ba dang / rtsub pa la sogs pa las tha dad pa de'i ngo bos dben pa'i ngo bo bum pa la sogs pa'i rdzas @78b 'di 'dra na dmigs su med do zhes dgongs so //
translated: Some, with great respect, say that when one engages in conduct with unimpaired faculties, one does not observe this entity of a vase, etc., which is separate from blue, sweet smell, soft, etc., by its own entity.

original: rnam phug gis smras pa /
analyzed: rnam phug gis smras pa /
translated: VƒÅlmƒ´ki says:

original: gzugs la sogs pa gzung yang rdzas ma bzung ba yod pa yin te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa gzung yang rdzas ma bzung ba yod pa yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúAlthough form, etc., is apprehended, substance is not apprehended.

original: gang snang ba'i 'grib ci byung ba'i tshe gzugs la sogs pa mi dmigs pa yin la rdzas ni dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: gang snang ba'i 'grib ci byung ba'i tshe gzugs la sogs pa mi dmigs pa yin la rdzas ni dmigs pa yin te /
translated: When the appearance of a form, etc., is obstructed, the form, etc., is not observed, but the substance is observed.

original: ba lang dam rta'i gzugs su ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ba lang dam rta'i gzugs su ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not ascertained as the form of a cow or a horse.

original: 'on kyang de yang mtho yor tsam dmigs so zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang de yang mtho yor tsam dmigs so zhe na /
translated: However, it is observed as just a cairn.‚Äù

original: dmigs pa ni bden na /
analyzed: dmigs pa ni bden na /
translated: If it is observed, that is true.

original: de'i bdag nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not by its own nature.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i bdag nyid yin na /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i bdag nyid yin na /
translated: If it is by the nature of form, etc.,

original: sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i bye brag 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i bye brag 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: it follows that it would apprehend the distinctions of blue, yellow, etc.

original: de bzhin du lcags kyi khrab kyi nang gi skyes bu'i gzugs la sogs pa ma bzung yang skyes bur shes pa mthong ba /
analyzed: de bzhin du lcags kyi khrab kyi nang gi skyes bu'i gzugs la sogs pa ma bzung yang skyes bur shes pa mthong ba /
translated: Likewise, although one does not apprehend the form of a man inside an iron suit of armor, one knows and sees that it is a man.

original: nub mo'i chu skyar gyi dkar po'i gzugs la sogs pa ma bzung yang byar shes pas mthong ngo //
analyzed: nub mo'i chu skyar gyi dkar po'i gzugs la sogs pa ma bzung yang byar shes pas mthong ngo //
translated: Although one does not apprehend the form of a white crane at night, one knows and sees that it is a crane.

original: de bzhin du sngon po la sogs pa nye bar len pa tha dad pa'i rjes su byed pa'i nor bu shel gyi gzugs la sogs pa mi 'dzin kyang shel du shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin du sngon po la sogs pa nye bar len pa tha dad pa'i rjes su byed pa'i nor bu shel gyi gzugs la sogs pa mi 'dzin kyang shel du shes so //
translated: Likewise, although one does not apprehend the form of a crystal jewel that is affected by the different things that are placed in it, such as blue, one knows it to be crystal.

original: de bzhin du tshon gyi ngo bos snyam bu'i gzugs la sogs pa zil gyis mnan pas snam bu'i gzugs ma bzung yang snam bur shes pas mthong ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshon gyi ngo bos snyam bu'i gzugs la sogs pa zil gyis mnan pas snam bu'i gzugs ma bzung yang snam bur shes pas mthong ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Likewise, although one does not apprehend the form of a cloth because it is outshone by the color of the dye, one knows and sees it to be a cloth.

original: des na 'di thams cad ni bskal pa mang por bsags pa'i lta ba ngan pa goms pa las skyes pa blos rlom pa yin no zhes gsal bar byed pa'i don to //
analyzed: des na 'di thams cad ni bskal pa mang por bsags pa'i lta ba ngan pa goms pa las skyes pa blos rlom pa yin no zhes gsal bar byed pa'i don to //
